67 namespace MQTT_NS {
68 
69 namespace as = boost::asio;
70 namespace mi = boost::multi_index;
71 
72 template <typename Mutex = std::mutex, template<typename...> class LockGuard = std::lock_guard, std::size_t PacketIdBytes = 2>
73 class endpoint : public std::enable_shared_from_this<endpoint<Mutex, LockGuard, PacketIdBytes>> {
74  using this_type = endpoint<Mutex, LockGuard, PacketIdBytes>;
75  using this_type_sp = std::shared_ptr<this_type>;
76 public:
77  using std::enable_shared_from_this<this_type>::shared_from_this;
78  using async_handler_t = std::function<void(boost::system::error_code const& ec)>;
79  using packet_id_t = typename packet_id_type<PacketIdBytes>::type;
80 
84  endpoint(protocol_version version = protocol_version::undetermined, bool async_send_store = false)
85  :async_send_store_{async_send_store},
86  h_mqtt_message_processed_(
87  [this]
88  (async_handler_t func) {
89  async_read_control_packet_type(std::move(func));
90  }
91  ),
92  version_(version)
93  {}
94 
99  template <typename Socket>
100  explicit endpoint(std::shared_ptr<Socket> socket, protocol_version version = protocol_version::undetermined, bool async_send_store = false)
101  :socket_(std::move(socket)),
102  connected_(true),
103  async_send_store_{async_send_store},
104  h_mqtt_message_processed_(
105  [this]
106  (async_handler_t func) {
107  async_read_control_packet_type(std::move(func));
108  }
109  ),
110  version_(version)
111  {}
112 
113  // MQTT Common handlers
114 
121  using pingreq_handler = std::function<bool()>;
122 
129  using pingresp_handler = std::function<bool()>;
130 
131 
132  // MQTT v3_1_1 handlers
133 
171  using connect_handler = std::function<
172  bool(MQTT_NS::buffer client_id,
173  MQTT_NS::optional<MQTT_NS::buffer> user_name,
174  MQTT_NS::optional<MQTT_NS::buffer> password,
175  MQTT_NS::optional<will> will,
176  bool clean_session,
177  std::uint16_t keep_alive)>;
178 
191  using connack_handler = std::function<bool(bool session_present, std::uint8_t return_code)>;
209  using publish_handler = std::function<bool(std::uint8_t fixed_header,
210  MQTT_NS::optional<packet_id_t> packet_id,
211  MQTT_NS::buffer topic_name,
212  MQTT_NS::buffer contents)>;
213 
222  using puback_handler = std::function<bool(packet_id_t packet_id)>;
223 
232  using pubrec_handler = std::function<bool(packet_id_t packet_id)>;
233 
242  using pubrel_handler = std::function<bool(packet_id_t packet_id)>;
243 
252  using pubcomp_handler = std::function<bool(packet_id_t packet_id)>;
253 
264  using subscribe_handler = std::function<bool(packet_id_t packet_id,
265  std::vector<std::tuple<MQTT_NS::buffer, std::uint8_t>> entries)>;
266 
278  using suback_handler = std::function<bool(packet_id_t packet_id,
279  std::vector<MQTT_NS::optional<std::uint8_t>> qoss)>;
280 
291  using unsubscribe_handler = std::function<bool(packet_id_t packet_id,
292  std::vector<MQTT_NS::buffer> topics)>;
293 
301  using unsuback_handler = std::function<bool(packet_id_t)>;
302 
308  using disconnect_handler = std::function<void()>;
309 
310  // MQTT v5 handlers
311 
355  using v5_connect_handler = std::function<
356  bool(MQTT_NS::buffer client_id,
357  MQTT_NS::optional<MQTT_NS::buffer> user_name,
358  MQTT_NS::optional<MQTT_NS::buffer> password,
359  MQTT_NS::optional<will> will,
360  bool clean_start,
361  std::uint16_t keep_alive,
362  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props)
363  >;
364 
381  using v5_connack_handler = std::function<
382  bool(bool session_present,
383  std::uint8_t reason_code,
384  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props)
385  >;
386 
412  using v5_publish_handler = std::function<
413  bool(std::uint8_t fixed_header,
414  MQTT_NS::optional<packet_id_t> packet_id,
415  MQTT_NS::buffer topic_name,
416  MQTT_NS::buffer contents,
417  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props)
418  >;
419 
436  using v5_puback_handler = std::function<
437  bool(packet_id_t packet_id,
438  std::uint8_t reason_code,
439  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props)
440  >;
441 
458  using v5_pubrec_handler = std::function<
459  bool(packet_id_t packet_id,
460  std::uint8_t reason_code,
461  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props)
462  >;
463 
480  using v5_pubrel_handler = std::function<
481  bool(packet_id_t packet_id,
482  std::uint8_t reason_code,
483  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props)
484  >;
485 
502  using v5_pubcomp_handler = std::function<
503  bool(packet_id_t packet_id,
504  std::uint8_t reason_code,
505  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props)
506  >;
507 
522  using v5_subscribe_handler = std::function<
523  bool(packet_id_t packet_id,
524  std::vector<std::tuple<MQTT_NS::buffer, std::uint8_t>> entries,
525  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props)
526  >;
527 
543  using v5_suback_handler = std::function<
544  bool(packet_id_t packet_id,
545  std::vector<std::uint8_t> reasons,
546  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props)
547  >;
548 
564  using v5_unsubscribe_handler = std::function<
565  bool(packet_id_t packet_id,
566  std::vector<MQTT_NS::buffer> topics,
567  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props)
568  >;
569 
585  using v5_unsuback_handler = std::function<
586  bool(packet_id_t,
587  std::vector<std::uint8_t> reasons,
588  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props)
589  >;
590 
604  using v5_disconnect_handler = std::function<
605  void(std::uint8_t reason_code,
606  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props)
607  >;
608 
623  using v5_auth_handler = std::function<
624  bool(std::uint8_t reason_code,
625  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props)
626  >;
627 
628 
629  // Original handlers
630 
637  using close_handler = std::function<void()>;
638 
646  using error_handler = std::function<void(boost::system::error_code const& ec)>;
647 
656  using pub_res_sent_handler = std::function<void(packet_id_t packet_id)>;
657 
664  using serialize_publish_message_handler = std::function<void(basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes> msg)>;
665 
672  using serialize_v5_publish_message_handler = std::function<void(v5::basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes> msg)>;
673 
682  using serialize_publish_handler = std::function<void(packet_id_t packet_id, char const* data, std::size_t size)>;
683 
692  using serialize_pubrel_message_handler = std::function<void(basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes> msg)>;
693 
702  using serialize_v5_pubrel_message_handler = std::function<void(v5::basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes> msg)>;
703 
714  using serialize_pubrel_handler = std::function<void(packet_id_t packet_id, char const* data, std::size_t size)>;
715 
720  using serialize_remove_handler = std::function<void(packet_id_t packet_id)>;
721 
726  using pre_send_handler = std::function<void()>;
727 
735  using is_valid_length_handler =
736  std::function<bool(std::uint8_t control_packet_type, std::size_t remaining_length)>;
737 
743  using mqtt_message_processed_handler =
744  std::function<void(async_handler_t func)>;
745 
746  endpoint(this_type const&) = delete;
747  endpoint(this_type&&) = delete;
748  endpoint& operator=(this_type const&) = delete;
749  endpoint& operator=(this_type&&) = delete;
750 
759  bool clean_session() const {
760  return clean_session_;
761  }
762 
771  bool clean_start() const {
772  return clean_session();
773  }
774 
782  void set_auto_pub_response(bool b = true, bool async = true) {
783  auto_pub_response_ = b;
784  auto_pub_response_async_ = async;
785  }

795  h_pingreq_ = std::move(h);
796  }
797

803  h_pingresp_ = std::move(h);
804  }

1261  void set_serialize_handlers(
1262  serialize_publish_message_handler h_publish,
1263  serialize_pubrel_message_handler h_pubrel,
1264  serialize_remove_handler h_remove) {
1265  h_serialize_publish_ = std::move(h_publish);
1266  h_serialize_pubrel_ = std::move(h_pubrel);
1267  h_serialize_remove_ = std::move(h_remove);
1268  }
1269 
1276  void set_v5_serialize_handlers(
1277  serialize_v5_publish_message_handler h_publish,
1278  serialize_v5_pubrel_message_handler h_pubrel,
1279  serialize_remove_handler h_remove) {
1280  h_serialize_v5_publish_ = std::move(h_publish);
1281  h_serialize_v5_pubrel_ = std::move(h_pubrel);
1282  h_serialize_remove_ = std::move(h_remove);
1283  }
1284 
1291  void set_serialize_handlers(
1292  serialize_publish_handler h_publish,
1293  serialize_pubrel_handler h_pubrel,
1294  serialize_remove_handler h_remove) {
1295  h_serialize_publish_ =
1296  [h_publish = std::move(h_publish)]
1297  (basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes> msg) {
1298  if (h_publish) {
1299  auto buf = continuous_buffer<PacketIdBytes>(msg);
1300  h_publish(msg.packet_id(), buf.data(), buf.size());
1301  }
1302  };
1303  h_serialize_pubrel_ =
1304  [h_pubrel = std::move(h_pubrel)]
1305  (basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes> msg) {
1306  if (h_pubrel) {
1307  auto buf = continuous_buffer<PacketIdBytes>(msg);
1308  h_pubrel(msg.packet_id(), buf.data(), buf.size());
1309  }
1310  };
1311  h_serialize_remove_ = std::move(h_remove);
1312  }
1313 
1320  void set_v5_serialize_handlers(
1321  serialize_publish_handler h_publish,
1322  serialize_pubrel_handler h_pubrel,
1323  serialize_remove_handler h_remove) {
1324  h_serialize_v5_publish_ =
1325  [h_publish = std::move(h_publish)]
1326  (v5::basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes> msg) {
1327  if (h_publish) {
1328  auto buf = continuous_buffer<PacketIdBytes>(msg);
1329  h_publish(msg.packet_id(), buf.data(), buf.size());
1330  }
1331  };
1332  h_serialize_v5_pubrel_ =
1333  [h_pubrel = std::move(h_pubrel)]
1334  (v5::basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes> msg) {
1335  if (h_pubrel) {
1336  auto buf = continuous_buffer<PacketIdBytes>(msg);
1337  h_pubrel(msg.packet_id(), buf.data(), buf.size());
1338  }
1339  };
1340  h_serialize_remove_ = std::move(h_remove);
1341  }
1342 
1346  void set_serialize_handlers() {
1347  h_serialize_publish_ = serialize_publish_message_handler();
1348  h_serialize_pubrel_ = serialize_pubrel_message_handler();
1349  h_serialize_v5_publish_ = serialize_v5_publish_message_handler();
1350  h_serialize_v5_pubrel_ = serialize_v5_pubrel_message_handler();
1351  h_serialize_remove_ = serialize_remove_handler();
1352  }
1353

1359  h_pre_send_ = std::move(h);
1360  }

1366  void set_is_valid_length_handler(is_valid_length_handler h = is_valid_length_handler()) {
1367  h_is_valid_length_ = std::move(h);
1368  }

1371  packet_bulk_read_limit_ = size;
1372  }

1374  void set_props_bulk_read_limit(std::size_t size) {
1375  props_bulk_read_limit_ = size;
1376  }

1401  }
1402 
1407  serialize_publish_message_handler const& get_serialize_publish_message_handler() const {
1408  return h_serialize_publish_;
1409  }
1410 
1415  serialize_pubrel_message_handler const& get_serialize_pubrel_message_handler() const {
1416  return h_serialize_pubrel_;
1417  }
1418 
1423  serialize_v5_publish_message_handler const& get_serialize_v5_publish_message_handler() const {
1424  return h_serialize_v5_publish_;
1425  }
1426 
1431  serialize_v5_pubrel_message_handler const& get_serialize_v5_pubrel_message_handler() const {
1432  return h_serialize_v5_pubrel_;
1433  }
1434 
1439  serialize_remove_handler const& get_serialize_remove_handler() const {
1440  return h_serialize_remove_;
1441  }
1442 
1447  pre_send_handler const& get_pre_send_handler() const {
1448  return h_pre_send_;
1449  }
1450 
1455  is_valid_length_handler const& get_is_valid_length_handler() const {
1456  return h_is_valid_length_;
1457  }
1458 
1459 
1465  void start_session(async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()) {
1466  async_read_control_packet_type(std::move(func));
1467  }
1468 
1469  // Blocking APIs
1470 
1486  void publish_at_most_once(
1487  MQTT_NS::string_view topic_name,
1488  MQTT_NS::string_view contents,
1489  bool retain = false,
1490  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1491  ) {
1492  publish_at_most_once(as::buffer(topic_name.data(), topic_name.size()),
1493  as::buffer(contents.data(), contents.size()),
1494  retain,
1495  std::move(props));
1496  }
1497 
1513  void publish_at_most_once(
1514  as::const_buffer topic_name,
1515  as::const_buffer contents,
1516  bool retain = false,
1517  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1518  ) {
1519  acquired_publish(0, topic_name, contents, MQTT_NS::any(), qos::at_most_once, retain, std::move(props));
1520  }
1521 
1539  packet_id_t publish_at_least_once(
1540  std::string topic_name,
1541  std::string contents,
1542  bool retain = false,
1543  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1544  ) {
1545  auto sp_topic = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
1546  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
1547 
1548  as::const_buffer topic_buf = as::buffer(sp_topic->data(), sp_topic->size());
1549  as::const_buffer contents_buf = as::buffer(sp_contents->data(), sp_contents->size());
1550 
1551  return publish_at_least_once(topic_buf,
1552  contents_buf,
1553  std::make_pair(std::move(sp_topic), std::move(sp_contents)),
1554  retain,
1555  std::move(props));
1556  }
1557 
1577  packet_id_t publish_at_least_once(
1578  as::const_buffer topic_name,
1579  as::const_buffer contents,
1580  MQTT_NS::any life_keeper,
1581  bool retain = false,
1582  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1583  ) {
1584  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
1585  acquired_publish_at_least_once(packet_id, topic_name, contents, std::move(life_keeper), retain, std::move(props));
1586  return packet_id;
1587  }
1588 
1606  packet_id_t publish_exactly_once(
1607  std::string topic_name,
1608  std::string contents,
1609  bool retain = false,
1610  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1611  ) {
1612  auto sp_topic = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
1613  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
1614 
1615  as::const_buffer topic_buf = as::buffer(sp_topic->data(), sp_topic->size());
1616  as::const_buffer contents_buf = as::buffer(sp_contents->data(), sp_contents->size());
1617 
1618  return publish_exactly_once(topic_buf,
1619  contents_buf,
1620  std::make_pair(std::move(sp_topic), std::move(sp_contents)),
1621  retain,
1622  std::move(props));
1623  }
1624 
1644  packet_id_t publish_exactly_once(
1645  as::const_buffer topic_name,
1646  as::const_buffer contents,
1647  MQTT_NS::any life_keeper,
1648  bool retain = false,
1649  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1650  ) {
1651  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
1652  acquired_publish_exactly_once(packet_id, topic_name, contents, std::move(life_keeper), retain, std::move(props));
1653  return packet_id;
1654  }
1655 
1678  packet_id_t publish(
1679  std::string topic_name,
1680  std::string contents,
1681  std::uint8_t qos = qos::at_most_once,
1682  bool retain = false,
1683  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1684  ) {
1685  BOOST_ASSERT(qos == qos::at_most_once || qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once);
1686  if(qos == qos::at_most_once)
1687  {
1688  publish_at_most_once(std::move(topic_name), std::move(contents), retain, std::move(props));
1689  return 0;
1690  }
1691  else
1692  {
1693  auto sp_topic = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
1694  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
1695 
1696  as::const_buffer topic_buf = as::buffer(sp_topic->data(), sp_topic->size());
1697  as::const_buffer contents_buf = as::buffer(sp_contents->data(), sp_contents->size());
1698 
1699  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
1700  acquired_publish(packet_id, topic_buf, contents_buf, std::make_pair(std::move(sp_topic), std::move(sp_contents)), qos, retain, std::move(props));
1701  return packet_id;
1702  }
1703  }
1704 
1729  packet_id_t publish(
1730  as::const_buffer topic_name,
1731  as::const_buffer contents,
1732  MQTT_NS::any life_keeper,
1733  std::uint8_t qos = qos::at_most_once,
1734  bool retain = false,
1735  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1736  ) {
1737  BOOST_ASSERT(qos == qos::at_most_once || qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once);
1738  if(qos == qos::at_most_once)
1739  {
1740  publish_at_most_once(topic_name, contents, retain, std::move(props));
1741  return 0;
1742  }
1743  else
1744  {
1745  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
1746  acquired_publish(packet_id, topic_name, contents, std::move(life_keeper), qos, retain, std::move(props));
1747  return packet_id;
1748  }
1749  }
1750 
1769  template <typename... Args>
1770  packet_id_t subscribe(
1771  MQTT_NS::string_view topic_name,
1772  std::uint8_t option,
1773  Args&&... args) {
1774  return subscribe(as::buffer(topic_name.data(), topic_name.size()), option, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
1775  }
1776 
1795  template <typename... Args>
1796  packet_id_t subscribe(
1797  as::const_buffer topic_name,
1798  std::uint8_t option,
1799  Args&&... args) {
1800  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
1801  acquired_subscribe(packet_id, topic_name, option, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
1802  return packet_id;
1803  }
1804 
1819  packet_id_t subscribe(
1820  std::vector<std::tuple<MQTT_NS::string_view, std::uint8_t>> const& params,
1821  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1822  ) {
1823  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
1824  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> asio_params;
1825  asio_params.reserve(params.size());
1826  for(auto const& p : params)
1827  {
1828  asio_params.emplace_back(as::buffer(std::get<0>(p).data(), std::get<0>(p).size()), std::get<1>(p));
1829  }
1830  acquired_subscribe(packet_id, std::move(asio_params), std::move(props));
1831  return packet_id;
1832  }
1833 
1848  packet_id_t subscribe(
1849  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> params,
1850  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1851  ) {
1852  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
1853  acquired_subscribe(packet_id, std::move(params), std::move(props));
1854  return packet_id;
1855  }
1856 
1869  packet_id_t unsubscribe(
1870  std::vector<MQTT_NS::string_view> const& params,
1871  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1872  ) {
1873  std::vector<as::const_buffer> asio_params;
1874  asio_params.reserve(params.size());
1875  for(auto const& p : params)
1876  {
1877  asio_params.emplace_back(as::buffer(p.data(), p.size()));
1878  }
1879  return unsubscribe(std::move(asio_params), std::move(props));
1880  }
1881 
1894  packet_id_t unsubscribe(
1895  std::vector<as::const_buffer> params,
1896  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1897  ) {
1898  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
1899  acquired_unsubscribe(packet_id, std::move(params), std::move(props));
1900  return packet_id;
1901  }
1902 
1917  template <typename... Args>
1918  packet_id_t unsubscribe(
1919  MQTT_NS::string_view topic_name,
1920  Args&&... args) {
1921  return unsubscribe(as::buffer(topic_name.data(), topic_name.size()), std::forward<Args>(args)...);
1922  }
1923 
1938  template <typename... Args>
1939  packet_id_t unsubscribe(
1940  as::const_buffer topic_name,
1941  Args&&... args) {
1942  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
1943  acquired_unsubscribe(packet_id, topic_name, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
1944  return packet_id;
1945  }
1946 
1962  void disconnect(
1963  MQTT_NS::optional<std::uint8_t> reason = MQTT_NS::nullopt,
1964  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
1965  ) {
1966  if (connected_ && mqtt_connected_) {
1967  disconnect_requested_ = true;
1968  send_disconnect(reason, std::move(props));
1969  }
1970  }
1971 
1977  void force_disconnect() {
1978  connected_ = false;
1979  mqtt_connected_ = false;
1980  shutdown_from_client(*socket_);
1981  }
1982 
1983  // packet_id manual setting version
1984 
1985 
2001  bool publish_at_most_once(
2002  packet_id_t packet_id,
2003  MQTT_NS::string_view topic_name,
2004  MQTT_NS::string_view contents,
2005  bool retain = false,
2006  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2007  ) {
2008  return publish_at_most_once(packet_id,
2009  as::buffer(topic_name.data(), topic_name.size()),
2010  as::buffer(contents.data(), contents.size()),
2011  retain,
2012  std::move(props));
2013  }
2014 
2030  bool publish_at_most_once(
2031  packet_id_t packet_id,
2032  as::const_buffer topic_name,
2033  as::const_buffer contents,
2034  bool retain = false,
2035  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2036  ) {
2037  acquired_publish_at_most_once(packet_id, topic_name, contents, MQTT_NS::any(), retain, std::move(props));
2038  return true;
2039  }
2040 
2060  bool publish_at_least_once(
2061  packet_id_t packet_id,
2062  std::string topic_name,
2063  std::string contents,
2064  bool retain = false,
2065  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2066  ) {
2067  auto sp_topic = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
2068  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
2069 
2070  as::const_buffer topic_buf = as::buffer(sp_topic->data(), sp_topic->size());
2071  as::const_buffer contents_buf = as::buffer(sp_contents->data(), sp_contents->size());
2072 
2073  return publish_at_least_once(packet_id, topic_buf, contents_buf, std::make_pair(std::move(sp_topic), std::move(sp_contents)), retain, std::move(props));
2074  }
2075 
2097  bool publish_at_least_once(
2098  packet_id_t packet_id,
2099  as::const_buffer topic_name,
2100  as::const_buffer contents,
2101  MQTT_NS::any life_keeper,
2102  bool retain = false,
2103  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2104  ) {
2105  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
2106  acquired_publish_at_least_once(packet_id, topic_name, contents, std::move(life_keeper), retain, std::move(props));
2107  return true;
2108  }
2109  return false;
2110  }

2137  ) {

2139  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));

2142  as::const_buffer contents_buf = as::buffer(sp_contents->data(), sp_contents->size());
2143 
2144  return publish_exactly_once(packet_id, topic_buf, contents_buf, std::make_pair(std::move(sp_topic), std::move(sp_contents)), retain, std::move(props));
2145  }

2204  bool publish(
2205  packet_id_t packet_id,

2209  bool retain = false,

2211  ) {

2213  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
2214

2216  as::const_buffer contents_buf = as::buffer(sp_contents->data(), sp_contents->size());

2244  bool publish(
2245  packet_id_t packet_id,
2246  as::const_buffer topic_name,
2247  as::const_buffer contents,
2248  MQTT_NS::any life_keeper,
2249  std::uint8_t qos = qos::at_most_once,
2250  bool retain = false,
2251  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2252  ) {
2253  BOOST_ASSERT(qos == qos::at_most_once || qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once);
2254  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
2255  acquired_publish(packet_id, topic_name, contents, std::move(life_keeper), qos, retain, std::move(props));
2256  return true;
2257  }
2258  return false;
2259  }

2282  bool publish_dup(
2283  packet_id_t packet_id,
2284  std::string topic_name,
2285  std::string contents,
2286  std::uint8_t qos = qos::at_most_once,
2287  bool retain = false,
2288  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2289  ) {
2290  auto sp_topic = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
2291  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
2292 
2293  as::const_buffer topic_buf = as::buffer(sp_topic->data(), sp_topic->size());
2294  as::const_buffer contents_buf = as::buffer(sp_contents->data(), sp_contents->size());
2295 
2296  return publish_dup(packet_id, topic_buf, contents_buf, std::make_pair(std::move(sp_topic), std::move(sp_contents)), qos, retain, std::move(props));
2297  }

2322  bool publish_dup(
2323  packet_id_t packet_id,
2324  as::const_buffer topic_name,
2325  as::const_buffer contents,
2326  MQTT_NS::any life_keeper,
2327  std::uint8_t qos = qos::at_most_once,
2328  bool retain = false,
2329  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2330  ) {
2331  BOOST_ASSERT(qos == qos::at_most_once || qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once);
2332  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
2333  acquired_publish_dup(packet_id, topic_name, contents, std::move(life_keeper), qos, retain, std::move(props));
2334  return true;
2335  }
2336  return false;
2337  }

2354  template <typename... Args>
2355  bool subscribe(
2356  packet_id_t packet_id,
2357  Args&&... args) {
2358  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
2359  acquired_subscribe(packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
2360  return true;
2361  }
2362  return false;
2363  }

2379  bool subscribe(
2380  packet_id_t packet_id,
2381  std::vector<std::tuple<MQTT_NS::string_view, std::uint8_t>> const& params,
2382  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2383  ) {
2384  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
2385  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> asio_params;
2386  asio_params.reserve(params.size());
2387  for(auto const& p : params)
2388  {
2389  asio_params.emplace_back(as::buffer(std::get<0>(p).data(), std::get<0>(p).size()), std::get<1>(p));
2390  }
2391  acquired_subscribe(packet_id, std::move(asio_params), std::move(props));
2392  return true;
2393  }
2394  return false;
2395  }

2440  Args&&... args) {

2442  acquired_unsubscribe(packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
2443  return true;
2444  }
2445  return false;
2446  }

2462  bool unsubscribe(
2463  packet_id_t packet_id,
2464  std::vector<MQTT_NS::string_view> const& params,
2465  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2466  ) {
2467  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
2468  std::vector<as::const_buffer> asio_params;
2469  asio_params.reserve(params.size());
2470  for(auto const& p : params)
2471  {
2472  asio_params.emplace_back(as::buffer(p.data(), p.size()));
2473  }

2475  return true;
2476  }

2501  return true;

2505 
2506  // packet_id has already been acquired version
2507 
2526  void acquired_publish_at_most_once(
2527  packet_id_t packet_id,
2528  MQTT_NS::string_view topic_name,
2529  MQTT_NS::string_view contents,
2530  bool retain = false,
2531  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2532  ) {
2533  acquired_publish_at_most_once(
2534  packet_id,
2535  as::buffer(topic_name.data(), topic_name.size()),
2536  as::buffer(contents.data(), contents.size()),
2537  MQTT_NS::any(),
2538  retain,
2539  std::move(props)
2540  );
2541  }
2542 
2563  void acquired_publish_at_most_once(
2564  packet_id_t packet_id,
2565  as::const_buffer topic_name,
2566  as::const_buffer contents,
2567  MQTT_NS::any life_keeper,
2568  bool retain = false,
2569  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2570  ) {
2571  BOOST_ASSERT(packet_id == 0);
2572  send_publish(
2573  topic_name,
2574  qos::at_most_once,
2575  retain,
2576  false,
2577  packet_id,
2578  std::move(props),
2579  contents,
2580  std::move(life_keeper)
2581  );
2582  }
2601  void acquired_publish_at_least_once(
2602  packet_id_t packet_id,
2603  std::string topic_name,
2604  std::string contents,
2605  bool retain = false,
2606  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2607  ) {
2608  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
2609  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
2610 
2611  auto topic_buf = as::buffer(*sp_topic_name);
2612  auto contents_buf = as::buffer(*sp_contents);
2613 
2614  acquired_publish_at_least_once(
2615  packet_id,
2616  topic_buf,
2617  contents_buf,
2618  std::make_pair(std::move(sp_topic_name), std::move(sp_contents)),
2619  retain,
2620  std::move(props)
2621  );
2622  }
2623 
2644  void acquired_publish_at_least_once(
2645  packet_id_t packet_id,
2646  as::const_buffer topic_name,
2647  as::const_buffer contents,
2648  MQTT_NS::any life_keeper,
2649  bool retain = false,
2650  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2651  ) {
2652  BOOST_ASSERT(packet_id != 0);
2653  send_publish(
2654  topic_name,
2655  qos::at_least_once,
2656  retain,
2657  false,
2658  packet_id,
2659  std::move(props),
2660  contents,
2661  std::move(life_keeper)
2662  );
2663  }
2664 
2683  void acquired_publish_exactly_once(
2684  packet_id_t packet_id,
2685  std::string topic_name,
2686  std::string contents,
2687  bool retain = false,
2688  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2689  ) {
2690  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
2691  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
2692 
2693  auto topic_buf = as::buffer(*sp_topic_name);
2694  auto contents_buf = as::buffer(*sp_contents);
2695 
2696  acquired_publish_exactly_once(
2697  packet_id,
2698  topic_buf,
2699  contents_buf,
2700  std::make_pair(std::move(sp_topic_name), std::move(sp_contents)),
2701  retain,
2702  std::move(props)
2703  );
2704  }
2705 
2726  void acquired_publish_exactly_once(
2727  packet_id_t packet_id,
2728  as::const_buffer topic_name,
2729  as::const_buffer contents,
2730  MQTT_NS::any life_keeper,
2731  bool retain = false,
2732  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2733  ) {
2734  BOOST_ASSERT(packet_id != 0);
2735  send_publish(
2736  topic_name,
2737  qos::exactly_once,
2738  retain,
2739  false,
2740  packet_id,
2741  std::move(props),
2742  contents,
2743  std::move(life_keeper)
2744  );
2745  }
2746 
2768  void acquired_publish(
2769  packet_id_t packet_id,
2770  std::string topic_name,
2771  std::string contents,
2772  std::uint8_t qos = qos::at_most_once,
2773  bool retain = false,
2774  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2775  ) {
2776  if(qos == qos::at_most_once)
2777  {
2778  // In the at_most_once case, we know a priori that send_publish won't track the lifetime.
2779  acquired_publish(packet_id,
2780  as::buffer(topic_name),
2781  as::buffer(contents),
2782  MQTT_NS::any(),
2783  qos,
2784  retain,
2785  std::move(props));
2786  }
2787  else
2788  {
2789  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
2790  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
2791 
2792  auto topic_buf = as::buffer(*sp_topic_name);
2793  auto contents_buf = as::buffer(*sp_contents);
2794 
2795  acquired_publish(packet_id,
2796  topic_buf,
2797  contents_buf,
2798  std::make_pair(std::move(sp_topic_name), std::move(sp_contents)),
2799  qos,
2800  retain,
2801  std::move(props));
2802  }
2803  }
2804 
2828  void acquired_publish(
2829  packet_id_t packet_id,
2830  as::const_buffer topic_name,
2831  as::const_buffer contents,
2832  MQTT_NS::any life_keeper,
2833  std::uint8_t qos = qos::at_most_once,
2834  bool retain = false,
2835  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2836  ) {
2837  BOOST_ASSERT(qos == qos::at_most_once || qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once);
2838  BOOST_ASSERT((qos == qos::at_most_once && packet_id == 0) || (qos != qos::at_most_once && packet_id != 0));
2839 
2840  send_publish(
2841  topic_name,
2842  qos,
2843  retain,
2844  false,
2845  packet_id,
2846  std::move(props),
2847  contents,
2848  std::move(life_keeper)
2849  );
2850  }
2851 
2873  void acquired_publish_dup(
2874  packet_id_t packet_id,
2875  std::string topic_name,
2876  std::string contents,
2877  std::uint8_t qos = qos::at_most_once,
2878  bool retain = false,
2879  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2880  ) {
2881  if(qos == qos::at_most_once)
2882  {
2883  // In the at_most_once case, we know a priori that send_publish won't track the lifetime.
2884  acquired_publish_dup(packet_id,
2885  as::buffer(topic_name),
2886  as::buffer(contents),
2887  MQTT_NS::any(),
2888  qos,
2889  retain,
2890  std::move(props));
2891  }
2892  else
2893  {
2894  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
2895  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
2896 
2897  auto topic_buf = as::buffer(*sp_topic_name);
2898  auto contents_buf = as::buffer(*sp_contents);
2899 
2900  acquired_publish_dup(packet_id,
2901  topic_buf,
2902  contents_buf,
2903  std::make_pair(std::move(sp_topic_name), std::move(sp_contents)),
2904  qos,
2905  retain,
2906  std::move(props));
2907  }
2908  }
2909 
2933  void acquired_publish_dup(
2934  packet_id_t packet_id,
2935  as::const_buffer topic_name,
2936  as::const_buffer contents,
2937  MQTT_NS::any life_keeper,
2938  std::uint8_t qos = qos::at_most_once,
2939  bool retain = false,
2940  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2941  ) {
2942  BOOST_ASSERT(qos == qos::at_most_once || qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once);
2943  BOOST_ASSERT((qos == qos::at_most_once && packet_id == 0) || (qos != qos::at_most_once && packet_id != 0));
2944 
2945  send_publish(
2946  topic_name,
2947  qos,
2948  retain,
2949  true,
2950  packet_id,
2951  std::move(props),
2952  contents,
2953  std::move(life_keeper)
2954  );
2955  }
2956 
2971  template <typename... Args>
2972  void acquired_subscribe(
2973  packet_id_t packet_id,
2974  Args&&... args) {
2975  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> params;
2976  params.reserve(sizeof...(args) / 2);
2977  send_subscribe(std::move(params), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
2978  }
2979 
2993  void acquired_subscribe(
2994  packet_id_t packet_id,
2995  std::vector<std::tuple<MQTT_NS::string_view, std::uint8_t>> params,
2996  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
2997  ) {
2998  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> cb_params;
2999  cb_params.reserve(params.size());
3000  for (auto const& e : params) {
3001  cb_params.emplace_back(as::buffer(std::get<0>(e).data(), std::get<0>(e).size()), std::get<1>(e));
3002  }
3003  send_subscribe(std::move(cb_params), packet_id, std::move(props));
3004  }
3005 
3019  void acquired_subscribe(
3020  packet_id_t packet_id,
3021  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> params,
3022  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
3023  ) {
3024  send_subscribe(std::move(params), packet_id, std::move(props));
3025  }
3026 
3041  template <typename... Args>
3042  void acquired_unsubscribe(
3043  packet_id_t packet_id,
3044  Args&&... args) {
3045 
3046  std::vector<as::const_buffer> params;
3047  params.reserve(sizeof...(args));
3048 
3049  send_unsubscribe(std::move(params), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
3050  }
3051 
3065  void acquired_unsubscribe(
3066  packet_id_t packet_id,
3067  std::vector<MQTT_NS::string_view> params,
3068  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
3069  ) {
3070  std::vector<as::const_buffer> cb_params;
3071  cb_params.reserve(params.size());
3072 
3073  for (auto const& e : params) {
3074  cb_params.emplace_back(as::buffer(e.data(), e.size()));
3075  }
3076  send_unsubscribe(std::move(cb_params), packet_id, std::move(props));
3077  }
3078 
3092  void acquired_unsubscribe(
3093  packet_id_t packet_id,
3094  std::vector<as::const_buffer> params,
3095  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
3096  ) {
3097  send_unsubscribe(std::move(params), packet_id, std::move(props));
3098  }

3106  }

3113  send_pingresp();
3114  }

3165  void connect(
3166  std::string const& client_id,
3167  MQTT_NS::optional<std::string> const& user_name,
3168  MQTT_NS::optional<std::string> const& password,
3169  MQTT_NS::optional<will> const& w,
3170  std::uint16_t keep_alive_sec,
3171  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
3172  ) {
3173  connect_requested_ = true;
3174  send_connect(client_id, user_name, password, w, keep_alive_sec, std::move(props));
3175  }

3389  ) {

3391  }

3499  ) {
3500  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
3501  acquired_async_publish_at_least_once(packet_id, std::move(topic_name), std::move(contents), retain, std::move(func));
3502  return packet_id;
3503  }

3736  packet_id_t async_publish(
3737  std::string topic_name,
3738  std::string contents,
3739  std::uint8_t qos = qos::at_most_once,
3740  bool retain = false,
3741  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
3742  ) {
3743  BOOST_ASSERT(qos == qos::at_most_once || qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once);
3744  packet_id_t packet_id = qos == qos::at_most_once ? 0 : acquire_unique_packet_id();
3745  acquired_async_publish(packet_id, std::move(topic_name), std::move(contents), qos, retain, std::move(func));
3746  return packet_id;
3747  }

3777  ) {
3778  BOOST_ASSERT(qos == qos::at_most_once || qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once);
3779  packet_id_t packet_id = qos == qos::at_most_once ? 0 : acquire_unique_packet_id();
3780  acquired_async_publish(packet_id, std::move(topic_name), std::move(contents), qos, retain, std::move(props), std::move(func));
3781  return packet_id;
3782  }

3844  std::uint8_t qos,
3845  bool retain,

3847  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
3848  ) {

3875  template <typename Arg0, typename... Args>
3876  packet_id_t async_subscribe(
3877  std::string topic_name,
3878  std::uint8_t option,
3879  Arg0&& arg0,
3880  Args&&... args) {
3881  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
3882  acquired_async_subscribe(packet_id, std::move(topic_name), option, std::forward<Arg0>(arg0), std::forward<Args>(args)...);
3883  return packet_id;
3884  }

3907  packet_id_t async_subscribe(
3908  as::const_buffer topic_name,
3909  std::uint8_t option,
3910  Arg0&& arg0,
3911  Args&&... args) {
3912  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
3913  acquired_async_subscribe(packet_id, topic_name, option, std::forward<Arg0>(arg0), std::forward<Args>(args)...);
3914  return packet_id;
3915  }

3996  }

4017  packet_id_t async_subscribe(
4018  as::const_buffer topic_name,
4019  std::uint8_t option,
4020  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
4021  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
4022  ) {
4023  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
4024  acquired_async_subscribe(packet_id, topic_name, option, std::move(props), std::move(func));
4025  return packet_id;
4026  }

4142  template <typename Arg0, typename... Args>
4143  packet_id_t async_unsubscribe(
4144  std::string topic_name,
4145  Arg0&& arg0,
4146  Args&&... args) {
4147  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
4148  acquired_async_unsubscribe(packet_id, std::move(topic_name), std::forward<Arg0>(arg0), std::forward<Args>(args)...);
4149  return packet_id;
4150  }
4151 
4168  template <typename Arg0, typename... Args>
4169  packet_id_t async_unsubscribe(
4170  as::const_buffer topic_name,
4171  Arg0&& arg0,
4172  Args&&... args) {
4173  packet_id_t packet_id = acquire_unique_packet_id();
4174  acquired_async_unsubscribe(packet_id, topic_name, std::forward<Arg0>(arg0), std::forward<Args>(args)...);
4175  return packet_id;
4176  }

4194  acquired_async_unsubscribe(packet_id, std::move(topic_name), std::move(func));
4195  return packet_id;
4196  }

4357 
4366  void async_disconnect(
4367  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
4368  ) {
4369  if (connected_ && mqtt_connected_) {
4370  disconnect_requested_ = true;
4371  async_send_disconnect(std::move(func));
4372  }
4373  }
4374 
4391  void async_disconnect(
4392  std::uint8_t reason,
4393  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
4394  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
4395  ) {
4396  if (connected_ && mqtt_connected_) {
4397  disconnect_requested_ = true;
4398  async_send_disconnect(reason, std::move(props), std::move(func));
4399  }
4400  }
4401 
4402  // packet_id manual setting version
4403 
4421  bool async_publish_at_least_once(
4422  packet_id_t packet_id,
4423  std::string topic_name,
4424  std::string contents,
4425  bool retain = false,
4426  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
4427  ) {
4428  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
4429  acquired_async_publish_at_least_once(packet_id, std::move(topic_name), std::move(contents), retain, std::move(func));
4430  return true;
4431  }
4432  return false;
4433  }
4434 
4456  bool async_publish_at_least_once(
4457  packet_id_t packet_id,
4458  std::string topic_name,
4459  std::string contents,
4460  bool retain,
4461  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
4462  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
4463  ) {
4464  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
4465  acquired_async_publish_at_least_once(packet_id, std::move(topic_name), std::move(contents), retain, std::move(props), std::move(func));
4466  return true;
4467  }
4468  return false;
4469  }
4470

4491  packet_id_t packet_id,

4494  MQTT_NS::any life_keeper,
4495  bool retain = false,
4496  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
4497  ) {
4498  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
4499  acquired_async_publish_at_least_once(packet_id, topic_name, contents, std::move(life_keeper), retain, std::move(func));
4500  return true;
4501  }
4502  return false;
4503  }

4668  bool async_publish_exactly_once(
4669  packet_id_t packet_id,
4670  as::const_buffer topic_name,
4671  as::const_buffer contents,
4672  MQTT_NS::any life_keeper,
4673  bool retain,
4674  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
4675  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
4676  ) {
4677  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
4678  acquired_async_publish_exactly_once(packet_id, topic_name, contents, std::move(life_keeper), retain, std::move(props), std::move(func));
4679  return true;

4683 
4703  bool async_publish(
4704  packet_id_t packet_id,
4705  std::string topic_name,
4706  std::string contents,
4707  std::uint8_t qos = qos::at_most_once,
4708  bool retain = false,
4709  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
4710  ) {
4711  BOOST_ASSERT(qos == qos::at_most_once || qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once);
4712  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
4713  acquired_async_publish(packet_id, std::move(topic_name), std::move(contents), qos, retain, std::move(func));
4714  return true;
4715  }
4716  return false;
4717  }
4718 
4742  bool async_publish(
4743  packet_id_t packet_id,
4744  std::string topic_name,
4745  std::string contents,
4746  std::uint8_t qos,
4747  bool retain,
4748  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
4749  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
4750  ) {
4751  BOOST_ASSERT(qos == qos::at_most_once || qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once);
4752  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
4753  acquired_async_publish(packet_id, std::move(topic_name), std::move(contents), qos, retain, std::move(props), std::move(func));
4754  return true;
4755  }
4756  return false;
4757  }

5016  template <typename Arg0, typename... Args>
5017  bool async_subscribe(
5018  packet_id_t packet_id,
5019  std::string topic_name,
5020  std::uint8_t option,
5021  Arg0&& arg0,
5022  Args&&... args) {
5023  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
5024  acquired_async_subscribe(packet_id, std::move(topic_name), option, std::forward<Arg0>(arg0), std::forward<Args>(args)...);
5025  return true;
5026  }
5027  return false;
5028  }

5061  return true;
5062  }

5393  }
5394  return false;
5395  }
5396 
5414  bool async_unsubscribe(
5415  packet_id_t packet_id,
5416  std::vector<std::string> const& params,
5417  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
5418  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5419  ) {
5420  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
5421  acquired_async_unsubscribe(packet_id, params, std::move(props), std::move(func));
5422  return true;
5423  }
5424  return false;
5425  }
5426 
5440  bool async_unsubscribe(
5441  packet_id_t packet_id,
5442  std::vector<as::const_buffer> const& params,
5443  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5444  ) {
5445  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
5446  acquired_async_unsubscribe(packet_id, params, std::move(func));
5447  return true;
5448  }
5449  return false;
5450  }
5451 
5469  bool async_unsubscribe(
5470  packet_id_t packet_id,
5471  std::vector<as::const_buffer> const& params,
5472  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
5473  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5474  ) {
5475  if (register_packet_id(packet_id)) {
5476  acquired_async_unsubscribe(packet_id, params, std::move(props), std::move(func));
5477  return true;
5478  }
5479  return false;
5480  }
5481 
5482  // packet_id has already been acquired version
5483 
5500  void acquired_async_publish_at_least_once(
5501  packet_id_t packet_id,
5502  std::string topic_name,
5503  std::string contents,
5504  bool retain = false,
5505  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5506  ) {
5507 
5508  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
5509  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
5510 
5511  async_send_publish(
5512  as::buffer(*sp_topic_name),
5513  qos::at_least_once,
5514  retain,
5515  false,
5516  packet_id,
5517  std::vector<v5::property_variant>{},
5518  as::buffer(*sp_contents),
5519  std::move(func),
5520  [sp_topic_name, sp_contents] {}
5521  );
5522  }
5523 
5544  void acquired_async_publish_at_least_once(
5545  packet_id_t packet_id,
5546  std::string topic_name,
5547  std::string contents,
5548  bool retain,
5549  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
5550  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5551  ) {
5552 
5553  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
5554  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
5555 
5556  async_send_publish(
5557  as::buffer(*sp_topic_name),
5558  qos::at_least_once,
5559  retain,
5560  false,
5561  packet_id,
5562  std::move(props),
5563  as::buffer(*sp_contents),
5564  std::move(func),
5565  [sp_topic_name, sp_contents] {}
5566  );
5567  }

5670  void acquired_async_publish_exactly_once(
5671  packet_id_t packet_id,
5672  std::string topic_name,
5673  std::string contents,
5674  bool retain = false,
5675  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5676  ) {
5677 
5678  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
5679  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
5680 
5681  async_send_publish(
5682  as::buffer(*sp_topic_name),
5683  qos::exactly_once,
5684  retain,
5685  false,
5686  packet_id,
5687  std::vector<v5::property_variant>{},
5688  as::buffer(*sp_contents),
5689  std::move(func),
5690  [sp_topic_name, sp_contents] {}
5691  );
5692  }
5693 
5714  void acquired_async_publish_exactly_once(
5715  packet_id_t packet_id,
5716  std::string topic_name,
5717  std::string contents,
5718  bool retain,
5719  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
5720  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5721  ) {
5722 
5723  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
5724  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
5725 
5726  auto topic_buf = as::buffer(*sp_topic_name);
5727  auto contents_buf = as::buffer(*sp_contents);
5728 
5729  async_send_publish(
5730  topic_buf,
5731  qos::at_least_once,
5732  retain,
5733  false,
5734  std::move(props),
5735  packet_id,
5736  contents_buf,
5737  std::move(func),
5738  std::make_pair(std::move(sp_topic_name), std::move(sp_contents))
5739  );
5740  }
5741

5761  packet_id_t packet_id,
5762  as::const_buffer topic_name,
5763  as::const_buffer contents,
5764  MQTT_NS::any life_keeper,
5765  bool retain = false,
5766  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()

5781 
5804  void acquired_async_publish_exactly_once(
5805  packet_id_t packet_id,
5806  as::const_buffer topic_name,
5807  as::const_buffer contents,
5808  MQTT_NS::any life_keeper,
5809  bool retain,
5810  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
5811  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5812  ) {
5813 
5814  async_send_publish(
5815  topic_name,
5816  qos::exactly_once,
5817  retain,
5818  false,
5819  packet_id,
5820  std::move(props),
5821  contents,
5822  std::move(func),
5823  std::move(life_keeper)
5824  );
5825  }
5826 
5846  void acquired_async_publish(
5847  packet_id_t packet_id,
5848  std::string topic_name,
5849  std::string contents,
5850  std::uint8_t qos = qos::at_most_once,
5851  bool retain = false,
5852  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5853  ) {
5854  BOOST_ASSERT(qos == qos::at_most_once || qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once);
5855  BOOST_ASSERT((qos == qos::at_most_once && packet_id == 0) || (qos != qos::at_most_once && packet_id != 0));
5856 
5857  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(topic_name);
5858  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(contents);
5859 
5860  auto topic_buf = as::buffer(*sp_topic_name);
5861  auto contents_buf = as::buffer(*sp_contents);
5862 
5863  async_send_publish(
5864  topic_buf,
5865  qos,
5866  retain,
5867  false,
5868  packet_id,
5869  std::vector<v5::property_variant>{},
5870  contents_buf,
5871  std::move(func),
5872  std::make_pair(std::move(sp_topic_name), std::move(sp_contents))
5873  );
5874  }
5875 
5899  void acquired_async_publish(
5900  packet_id_t packet_id,
5901  std::string topic_name,
5902  std::string contents,
5903  std::uint8_t qos,
5904  bool retain,
5905  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
5906  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
5907  ) {
5908  BOOST_ASSERT(qos == qos::at_most_once || qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once);
5909  BOOST_ASSERT((qos == qos::at_most_once && packet_id == 0) || (qos != qos::at_most_once && packet_id != 0));
5910 
5911  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
5912  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(contents));
5913 
5914  auto topic_buf = as::buffer(*sp_topic_name);
5915  auto contents_buf = as::buffer(*sp_contents);
5916 
5917  async_send_publish(
5918  topic_buf,
5919  qos,
5920  retain,
5921  false,
5922  packet_id,
5923  std::move(props),
5924  contents_buf,
5925  std::move(func),
5926  std::make_pair(std::move(sp_topic_name), std::move(sp_contents))
5927  );
5928  }

6046  void acquired_async_publish_dup(
6047  packet_id_t packet_id,
6048  std::string topic_name,
6049  std::string contents,
6050  std::uint8_t qos = qos::at_most_once,
6051  bool retain = false,
6052  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6053  ) {
6054  BOOST_ASSERT(qos == qos::at_most_once || qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once);
6055  BOOST_ASSERT((qos == qos::at_most_once && packet_id == 0) || (qos != qos::at_most_once && packet_id != 0));
6056 
6057  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(topic_name);
6058  auto sp_contents = std::make_shared<std::string>(contents);
6059 
6060  async_send_publish(
6061  as::buffer(*sp_topic_name),
6062  qos,
6063  retain,
6064  true,
6065  packet_id,
6066  std::vector<v5::property_variant>{},
6067  as::buffer(*sp_contents),
6068  std::move(func),
6069  [sp_topic_name, sp_contents] {}
6070  );
6071  }

6222 
6243  template <typename Arg0, typename... Args>
6244  void acquired_async_subscribe(
6245  packet_id_t packet_id,
6246  std::string topic_name,
6247  std::uint8_t option,
6248  Arg0&& arg0,
6249  Args&&... args) {
6250  acquired_async_subscribe_imp(packet_id, std::move(topic_name), option, std::forward<Arg0>(arg0), std::forward<Args>(args)...);
6251  }
6252 
6273  template <typename Arg0, typename... Args>
6274  void acquired_async_subscribe(
6275  packet_id_t packet_id,
6276  as::const_buffer topic_name,
6277  std::uint8_t option,
6278  Arg0&& arg0,
6279  Args&&... args) {
6280  acquired_async_subscribe_imp(packet_id, topic_name, option, std::forward<Arg0>(arg0), std::forward<Args>(args)...);
6281  }
6282 
6303  void acquired_async_subscribe(
6304  packet_id_t packet_id,
6305  std::string topic_name,
6306  std::uint8_t option,
6307  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6308  ) {
6309  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
6310  auto topic_buf = as::buffer(*sp_topic_name);
6311 
6312  async_send_subscribe(
6313  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>>({std::make_tuple(topic_buf, option)}),
6314  std::move(sp_topic_name),
6315  packet_id,
6316  std::move(func)
6317  );
6318  }
6319 
6340  void acquired_async_subscribe(
6341  packet_id_t packet_id,
6342  std::string topic_name,
6343  std::uint8_t option,
6344  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
6345  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6346  ) {
6347  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
6348  auto topic_buf = as::buffer(*sp_topic_name);
6349 
6350  async_send_subscribe(
6351  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>>({std::make_tuple(topic_buf, option)}),
6352  std::move(sp_topic_name),
6353  packet_id,
6354  std::move(props),
6355  std::move(func)
6356  );
6357  }
6358 
6375  void acquired_async_subscribe(
6376  packet_id_t packet_id,
6377  as::const_buffer topic_name,
6378  std::uint8_t option,
6379  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6380  ) {
6381  async_send_subscribe(
6382  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>>({std::make_tuple(topic_name, option)}),
6383  MQTT_NS::any(),
6384  packet_id,
6385  std::move(func)
6386  );
6387  }
6388 
6409  void acquired_async_subscribe(
6410  packet_id_t packet_id,
6411  as::const_buffer topic_name,
6412  std::uint8_t option,
6413  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
6414  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6415  ) {
6416 
6417  async_send_subscribe(
6418  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>>({std::make_tuple(topic_name, option)}),
6419  MQTT_NS::any(),
6420  packet_id,
6421  std::move(props),
6422  std::move(func)
6423  );
6424  }
6425 
6440  void acquired_async_subscribe(
6441  packet_id_t packet_id,
6442  std::vector<std::tuple<std::string, std::uint8_t>> params,
6443  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6444  ) {
6445 
6446  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> cb_params;
6447  cb_params.reserve(params.size());
6448 
6449  std::vector<std::shared_ptr<std::string>> life_keepers;
6450  life_keepers.reserve(params.size());
6451 
6452  for (auto const& e : params) {
6453  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(std::get<0>(e)));
6454  cb_params.emplace_back(as::buffer(*sp_topic_name), std::get<1>(e));
6455  life_keepers.emplace_back(std::move(sp_topic_name));
6456  }
6457  async_send_subscribe(
6458  std::move(cb_params),
6459  std::move(life_keepers),
6460  packet_id,
6461  std::move(func)
6462  );
6463  }
6464 
6483  void acquired_async_subscribe(
6484  packet_id_t packet_id,
6485  std::vector<std::tuple<std::string, std::uint8_t>> params,
6486  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
6487  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6488  ) {
6489 
6490  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> cb_params;
6491  cb_params.reserve(params.size());
6492 
6493  std::vector<std::shared_ptr<std::string>> life_keepers;
6494  life_keepers.reserve(params.size());
6495 
6496  for (auto const& e : params) {
6497  auto sp_topic_name = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(std::get<0>(e)));
6498  cb_params.emplace_back(as::buffer(*sp_topic_name), std::get<1>(e));
6499  life_keepers.emplace_back(std::move(sp_topic_name));
6500  }
6501  async_send_subscribe(
6502  std::move(cb_params),
6503  life_keepers,
6504  packet_id,
6505  std::move(props),
6506  std::move(func)
6507  );
6508  }
6509 
6521  void acquired_async_subscribe(
6522  packet_id_t packet_id,
6523  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> params,
6524  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6525  ) {
6526  async_send_subscribe(
6527  std::move(params),
6528  MQTT_NS::any(),
6529  packet_id,
6530  std::move(func)
6531  );
6532  }
6533 
6548  void acquired_async_subscribe(
6549  packet_id_t packet_id,
6550  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> params,
6551  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
6552  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6553  ) {
6554  async_send_subscribe(
6555  std::move(params),
6556  MQTT_NS::any(),
6557  packet_id,
6558  std::move(props),
6559  std::move(func)
6560  );
6561  }
6562 
6579  template <typename Arg0, typename... Args>
6580  void acquired_async_unsubscribe(
6581  packet_id_t packet_id,
6582  std::string topic_name,
6583  Arg0&& arg0,
6584  Args&&... args) {
6585  acquired_async_unsubscribe_imp(packet_id, std::move(topic_name), std::forward<Arg0>(arg0), std::forward<Args>(args)...);
6586  }
6587 
6604  template <typename Arg0, typename... Args>
6605  void acquired_async_unsubscribe(
6606  packet_id_t packet_id,
6607  as::const_buffer topic_name,
6608  Arg0&& arg0,
6609  Args&&... args) {
6610  acquired_async_unsubscribe_imp(packet_id, topic_name, std::forward<Arg0>(arg0), std::forward<Args>(args)...);
6611  }
6612 
6625  void acquired_async_unsubscribe(
6626  packet_id_t packet_id,
6627  std::vector<std::string> params,
6628  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6629  ) {
6630 
6631  std::vector<as::const_buffer> cb_params;
6632  cb_params.reserve(params.size());
6633 
6634  std::vector<std::shared_ptr<std::string>> life_keepers;
6635  life_keepers.reserve(params.size());
6636 
6637  for (auto const& e : params) {
6638  life_keepers.emplace_back(std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(e)));
6639  cb_params.emplace_back(as::buffer(*life_keepers.back()));
6640  }
6641 
6642  async_send_unsubscribe(
6643  std::move(cb_params),
6644  std::move(life_keepers),
6645  packet_id,
6646  std::move(func)
6647  );
6648  }
6649 
6666  void acquired_async_unsubscribe(
6667  packet_id_t packet_id,
6668  std::vector<std::string> params,
6669  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
6670  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6671  ) {
6672 
6673  std::vector<as::const_buffer> cb_params;
6674  cb_params.reserve(params.size());
6675 
6676  std::vector<std::shared_ptr<std::string>> life_keepers;
6677  life_keepers.reserve(params.size());
6678 
6679  for (auto const& e : params) {
6680  life_keepers.emplace_back(std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(e)));
6681  cb_params.emplace_back(as::buffer(*life_keepers.back()));
6682  }
6683 
6684  async_send_unsubscribe(
6685  std::move(cb_params),
6686  life_keepers,
6687  packet_id,
6688  std::move(props),
6689  std::move(func)
6690  );
6691  }
6692 
6705  void acquired_async_unsubscribe(
6706  packet_id_t packet_id,
6707  std::vector<as::const_buffer> params,
6708  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6709  ) {
6710 
6711  std::vector<std::shared_ptr<std::string>> life_keepers;
6712  async_send_unsubscribe(
6713  std::move(params),
6714  life_keepers,
6715  packet_id,
6716  std::move(func)
6717  );
6718  }
6719 
6736  void acquired_async_unsubscribe(
6737  packet_id_t packet_id,
6738  std::vector<as::const_buffer> params,
6739  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
6740  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6741  ) {
6742 
6743  std::vector<std::shared_ptr<std::string>> life_keepers;
6744  async_send_unsubscribe(
6745  std::move(params),
6746  life_keepers,
6747  packet_id,
6748  std::move(props),
6749  std::move(func)
6750  );
6751  }

6761  }

6787  void async_auth(
6788  MQTT_NS::optional<std::uint8_t> reason_code = MQTT_NS::nullopt,
6789  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {},
6790  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()) {
6791  async_send_auth(reason_code, std::move(props), std::move(func));
6792  }
6816  void async_connect(
6817  std::string const& client_id,
6818  MQTT_NS::optional<std::string> const& user_name,
6819  MQTT_NS::optional<std::string> const& password,
6820  MQTT_NS::optional<will> const& w,
6821  std::uint16_t keep_alive_sec,
6822  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6823  ) {
6824  async_connect(client_id,
6825  user_name,
6826  password,
6827  w,
6828  keep_alive_sec,
6829  std::vector<v5::property_variant>{},
6830  std::move(func));
6831  }
6832 
6860  void async_connect(
6861  std::string const& client_id,
6862  MQTT_NS::optional<std::string> const& user_name,
6863  MQTT_NS::optional<std::string> const& password,
6864  MQTT_NS::optional<will> const& w,
6865  std::uint16_t keep_alive_sec,
6866  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
6867  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6868  ) {
6869  connect_requested_ = true;
6870  async_send_connect(client_id,
6871  user_name,
6872  password,
6873  w,
6874  keep_alive_sec,
6875  std::move(props),
6876  std::move(func));
6877  }

6889  async_handler_t func = async_handler_t()
6890  ) {

6892  }

7303 
7308  void clear_stored_publish(packet_id_t packet_id) {
7309  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
7310  auto& idx = store_.template get<tag_packet_id>();
7311  auto r = idx.equal_range(packet_id);
7312  idx.erase(std::get<0>(r), std::get<1>(r));
7313  packet_id_.erase(packet_id);
7314  }
7315 
7320  void for_each_store(std::function<void(char const*, std::size_t)> const& f) {
7321  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
7322  auto const& idx = store_.template get<tag_seq>();
7323  for (auto const & e : idx) {
7324  auto const& m = e.message();
7325  auto cb = continuous_buffer(m);
7326  f(cb.data(), cb.size());
7327  }
7328  }
7329 
7334  void for_each_store(std::function<void(message_variant const&)> const& f) {
7335  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
7336  auto const& idx = store_.template get<tag_seq>();
7337  for (auto const & e : idx) {
7338  f(e.message());
7339  }
7340  }
7341 
7342  // manual packet_id management for advanced users
7343 
7352  packet_id_t acquire_unique_packet_id() {
7353  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
7354  if (packet_id_.size() == std::numeric_limits<packet_id_t>::max()) throw packet_id_exhausted_error();
7355  if (packet_id_master_ == std::numeric_limits<packet_id_t>::max()) {
7356  packet_id_master_ = 1U;
7357  }
7358  else {
7359  ++packet_id_master_;
7360  }
7361  auto ret = packet_id_.insert(packet_id_master_);
7362  if (ret.second) return packet_id_master_;
7363 
7364  auto last = packet_id_.end();
7365  auto e = last;
7366  --last;
7367 
7368  if (*last != std::numeric_limits<packet_id_t>::max()) {
7369  packet_id_master_ = static_cast<packet_id_t>(*last + 1U);
7370  packet_id_.insert(e, packet_id_master_);
7371  return packet_id_master_;
7372  }
7373 
7374  auto b = packet_id_.begin();
7375  auto prev = *b;
7376  if (prev != 1U) {
7377  packet_id_master_ = 1U;
7378  packet_id_.insert(b, packet_id_master_);
7379  return packet_id_master_;
7380  }
7381  ++b;
7382  while (*b - 1U == prev && b != e) {
7383  prev = *b;
7384  ++b;
7385  }
7386  packet_id_master_ = static_cast<packet_id_t>(prev + 1U);
7387  packet_id_.insert(b, packet_id_master_);
7388  return packet_id_master_;
7389  }
7390 
7398  bool register_packet_id(packet_id_t packet_id) {
7399  if (packet_id == 0) return false;
7400  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
7401  return packet_id_.insert(packet_id).second;
7402  }
7403 
7411  bool release_packet_id(packet_id_t packet_id) {
7412  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
7413  return packet_id_.erase(packet_id);
7414  }
7415 
7423  template <typename Iterator>
7424  typename std::enable_if<std::is_convertible<typename Iterator::value_type, char>::value>::type
7425  restore_serialized_message(packet_id_t /*packet_id*/, Iterator b, Iterator e) {
7426  static_assert(
7427  std::is_same<
7428  typename std::iterator_traits<Iterator>::iterator_category,
7429  std::random_access_iterator_tag
7430  >::value,
7431  "Iterators provided to restore_serialized_message() must be random access iterators."
7432  );
7433 
7434  if (b == e) return;
7435 
7436  auto fixed_header = static_cast<std::uint8_t>(*b);
7437  switch (get_control_packet_type(fixed_header)) {
7438  case control_packet_type::publish: {
7439  auto buf = allocate_buffer(b, e);
7440  restore_serialized_message(
7441  basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes>(
7442  buf
7443  ),
7444  buf
7445  );
7446  } break;
7447  case control_packet_type::pubrel: {
7448  restore_serialized_message(
7449  basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes>(
7450  // basic_pubrel_message have no member variable that type is MQTT_NS::buffer.
7451  // When creating basic_pubrel_message, the constructor just read MQTT_NS::buffer
7452  // and convert to some values.
7453  // So the argument buffer(...) doesn't need to hold the lifetime.
7454  buffer(string_view(&*b, static_cast<std::size_t>(std::distance(b, e))))
7455  )
7456  );
7457  } break;
7458  default:
7459  throw protocol_error();
7460  break;
7461  }
7462  }
7463 
7471  void restore_serialized_message(basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes> msg, MQTT_NS::any life_keeper) {
7472  auto packet_id = msg.packet_id();
7473  auto qos = msg.qos();
7474  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
7475  if (packet_id_.insert(packet_id).second) {
7476  auto ret = store_.emplace(
7477  packet_id,
7478  qos == qos::at_least_once ? control_packet_type::puback
7479  : control_packet_type::pubrec,
7480  std::move(msg),
7481  std::move(life_keeper)
7482  );
7483  // When client want to restore serialized messages,
7484  // endpoint might keep the message that has the same packet_id.
7485  // In this case, overwrite store_.
7486  if (!ret.second) {
7487  store_.modify(
7488  ret.first,
7489  [&] (auto& e) {
7490  e = store(
7491  packet_id,
7492  qos == qos::at_least_once ? control_packet_type::puback
7493  : control_packet_type::pubrec,
7494  std::move(msg),
7495  std::move(life_keeper)
7496  );
7497  }
7498  );
7499  }
7500  }
7501  }
7502 
7508  void restore_serialized_message(basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes> msg) {
7509  auto packet_id = msg.packet_id();
7510  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
7511  if (packet_id_.insert(packet_id).second) {
7512  auto ret = store_.emplace(
7513  packet_id,
7514  control_packet_type::pubcomp,
7515  std::move(msg)
7516  );
7517  // When client want to restore serialized messages,
7518  // endpoint might keep the message that has the same packet_id.
7519  // In this case, overwrite store_.
7520  if (!ret.second) {
7521  store_.modify(
7522  ret.first,
7523  [&] (auto& e) {
7524  e = store(
7525  packet_id,
7526  control_packet_type::pubcomp,
7527  std::move(msg)
7528  );
7529  }
7530  );
7531  }
7532  }
7533  }
7534 
7542  template <typename Iterator>
7543  typename std::enable_if<std::is_convertible<typename Iterator::value_type, char>::value>::type
7544  restore_v5_serialized_message(packet_id_t /*packet_id*/, Iterator b, Iterator e) {
7545  if (b == e) return;
7546 
7547  auto fixed_header = static_cast<std::uint8_t>(*b);
7548  switch (get_control_packet_type(fixed_header)) {
7549  case control_packet_type::publish: {
7550  auto buf = allocate_buffer(b, e);
7551  restore_v5_serialized_message(
7552  v5::basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes>(buf),
7553  buf
7554  );
7555  } break;
7556  case control_packet_type::pubrel: {
7557  auto buf = allocate_buffer(b, e);
7558  restore_v5_serialized_message(
7559  v5::basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes>(buf),
7560  buf
7561  );
7562  } break;
7563  default:
7564  throw protocol_error();
7565  break;
7566  }
7567  }
7568 
7576  void restore_v5_serialized_message(v5::basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes> msg, MQTT_NS::any life_keeper) {
7577  auto packet_id = msg.packet_id();
7578  auto qos = msg.qos();
7579  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
7580  if (packet_id_.insert(packet_id).second) {
7581  auto ret = store_.emplace(
7582  packet_id,
7583  qos == qos::at_least_once ? control_packet_type::puback
7584  : control_packet_type::pubrec,
7585  std::move(msg),
7586  std::move(life_keeper)
7587  );
7588  // When client want to restore serialized messages,
7589  // endpoint might keep the message that has the same packet_id.
7590  // In this case, overwrite store_.
7591  if (!ret.second) {
7592  store_.modify(
7593  ret.first,
7594  [&] (auto& e) {
7595  e = store(
7596  packet_id,
7597  qos == qos::at_least_once ? control_packet_type::puback
7598  : control_packet_type::pubrec,
7599  std::move(msg),
7600  std::move(life_keeper)
7601  );
7602  }
7603  );
7604  }
7605  }
7606  }
7607 
7615  void restore_v5_serialized_message(v5::basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes> msg, MQTT_NS::any life_keeper) {
7616  auto packet_id = msg.packet_id();
7617  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
7618  if (packet_id_.insert(packet_id).second) {
7619  auto ret = store_.emplace(
7620  packet_id,
7621  control_packet_type::pubcomp,
7622  std::move(msg),
7623  std::move(life_keeper)
7624  );
7625  // When client want to restore serialized messages,
7626  // endpoint might keep the message that has the same packet_id.
7627  // In this case, overwrite store_.
7628  if (!ret.second) {
7629  store_.modify(
7630  ret.first,
7631  [&] (auto& e) {
7632  e = store(
7633  packet_id,
7634  control_packet_type::pubcomp,
7635  std::move(msg)
7636  );
7637  }
7638  );
7639  }
7640  }
7641  }
7642 
7647  bool connected() const {
7648  return connected_ && mqtt_connected_;
7649  }
7650 
7663  void set_mqtt_message_processed_handler(
7664  mqtt_message_processed_handler h = mqtt_message_processed_handler()) {
7665  if (h) {
7666  h_mqtt_message_processed_ = std::move(h);
7667  }
7668  else {
7669  h_mqtt_message_processed_ =
7670  [this]
7671  (async_handler_t func) {
7672  async_read_control_packet_type(std::move(func));
7673  };
7674  }
7675  }
7676 
7681  mqtt_message_processed_handler get_mqtt_message_processed_handler() const {
7682  return h_mqtt_message_processed_;
7683  }
7684 
7690  void async_read_next_message(async_handler_t func) {
7691  async_read_control_packet_type(std::move(func));
7692  }
7693 
7706  void set_max_queue_send_count(std::size_t count) {
7707  max_queue_send_count_ = count;
7708  }
7709 
7722  void set_max_queue_send_size(std::size_t size) {
7723  max_queue_send_size_ = size;
7724  }
7725 
7726  protocol_version get_protocol_version() const {
7727  return version_;
7728  }
7729 
7730  MQTT_NS::socket const& socket() const {
7731  return socket_.value();
7732  }
7733 
7734  MQTT_NS::socket& socket() {
7735  return socket_.value();
7736  }
7737 
7738 protected:
7739 
7744  MQTT_NS::optional<MQTT_NS::socket>& socket_optional() {
7745  return socket_;
7746  }
7747 
7748  void async_read_control_packet_type(async_handler_t func) {
7749  auto self = shared_from_this();
7750  socket_->async_read(
7751  as::buffer(buf_.data(), 1),
7752  [this, self = std::move(self), func = std::move(func)](
7753  boost::system::error_code const& ec,
7754  std::size_t bytes_transferred) {
7755  if (!check_error_and_transferred_length(ec, func, bytes_transferred, 1)) return;
7756  handle_control_packet_type(std::move(func), std::move(self));
7757  }
7758  );
7759  }
7760 
7761  bool handle_close_or_error(boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
7762  if (!ec) return false;
7763  if (connected_) {
7764  connected_ = false;
7765  mqtt_connected_ = false;
7766  {
7767  boost::system::error_code ec;
7768  socket_->close(ec);
7769  }
7770  }
7771  if (ec == as::error::eof ||
7772  ec == as::error::connection_reset
7773 #if defined(MQTT_USE_WS)
7774  ||
7775  ec == boost::beast::websocket::error::closed
7776 #endif // defined(MQTT_USE_WS)
7777 #if !defined(MQTT_NO_TLS)
7778  ||
7779 #if defined(SSL_R_SHORT_READ)
7780  ERR_GET_REASON(ec.value()) == SSL_R_SHORT_READ
7781 #else // defined(SSL_R_SHORT_READ)
7782  ERR_GET_REASON(ec.value()) == boost::asio::ssl::error::stream_truncated
7783 #endif // defined(SSL_R_SHORT_READ)
7784 #endif // defined(MQTT_NO_TLS)
7785  ) {
7786  if (disconnect_requested_) {
7787  disconnect_requested_ = false;
7788  connect_requested_ = false;
7789  handle_close();
7790  return true;
7791  }
7792  }
7793  disconnect_requested_ = false;
7794  connect_requested_ = false;
7795  handle_error(ec);
7796  return true;
7797  }
7798 
7799  void set_connect() {
7800  connected_ = true;
7801  }
7802 
7803  void set_protocol_version(std::size_t version) {
7804  version_ = version;
7805  }
7806 
7807  void handle_close() {
7808  if (h_close_) h_close_();
7809  }
7810 
7811  void handle_error(boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
7812  if (h_error_) h_error_(ec);
7813  }
7814 
7815 private:
7816 
7817  bool check_error(
7818  boost::system::error_code const& ec,
7819  async_handler_t const& func) {
7820  if (handle_close_or_error(ec)) {
7821  if (func) func(ec);
7822  return false;
7823  }
7824  return true;
7825  }
7826 
7827  bool check_transferred_length(
7828  std::size_t bytes_transferred,
7829  std::size_t bytes_expected,
7830  async_handler_t const& func) {
7831  if (bytes_transferred != bytes_expected) {
7832  call_message_size_error_handlers(func);
7833  return false;
7834  }
7835  return true;
7836  }
7837 
7838  bool check_error_and_transferred_length(
7839  boost::system::error_code const& ec,
7840  async_handler_t const& func,
7841  std::size_t bytes_transferred,
7842  std::size_t bytes_expected) {
7843  if (!check_error(ec, func)) return false;
7844  if (!check_transferred_length(bytes_transferred, bytes_expected, func)) return false;
7845  return true;
7846  }
7847 
7848  void call_error_handlers(boost::system::error_code const& ec, async_handler_t const& func) {
7849  handle_error(ec);
7850  if (func) func(ec);
7851  }
7852 
7853  void call_message_size_error_handlers(async_handler_t const& func) {
7854  call_error_handlers(
7855  boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size),
7856  func
7857  );
7858  }
7859 
7860  void call_protocol_error_handlers(async_handler_t const& func) {
7861  call_error_handlers(
7862  boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::protocol_error),
7863  func
7864  );
7865  }
7866 
7867  template <typename T>
7868  void shutdown_from_client(T& socket) {
7869  boost::system::error_code ec;
7870  socket.lowest_layer().close(ec);
7871  }
7872 
7873  template <typename... Args>
7874  typename std::enable_if<
7875  std::is_convertible<
7876  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
7877  async_handler_t
7878  >::value
7879  >::type
7880  acquired_async_subscribe_imp(
7881  packet_id_t packet_id,
7882  std::string topic_name,
7883  std::uint8_t qos,
7884  Args&&... args) {
7885 
7886  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> params;
7887  params.reserve((sizeof...(args) + 2) / 2);
7888 
7889  async_send_subscribe(
7890  std::move(params),
7891  MQTT_NS::any(),
7892  packet_id,
7893  std::move(topic_name),
7894  qos,
7895  std::forward<Args>(args)...
7896  );
7897  }
7898 
7899  template <typename... Args>
7900  typename std::enable_if<
7901  std::is_convertible<
7902  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
7903  async_handler_t
7904  >::value
7905  >::type
7906  acquired_async_subscribe_imp(
7907  packet_id_t packet_id,
7908  as::const_buffer topic_name,
7909  std::uint8_t qos,
7910  Args&&... args) {
7911 
7912  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> params;
7913  params.reserve((sizeof...(args) + 2) / 2);
7914 
7915  async_send_subscribe(
7916  std::move(params),
7917  MQTT_NS::any(),
7918  packet_id,
7919  topic_name,
7920  qos,
7921  std::forward<Args>(args)...
7922  );
7923  }
7924 
7925  template <typename... Args>
7926  typename std::enable_if<
7927  !std::is_convertible<
7928  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
7929  async_handler_t
7930  >::value
7931  >::type
7932  acquired_async_subscribe_imp(
7933  packet_id_t packet_id,
7934  std::string topic_name,
7935  std::uint8_t qos,
7936  Args&&... args) {
7937 
7938  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> params;
7939  params.reserve((sizeof...(args) + 2) / 2);
7940 
7941  async_send_subscribe(
7942  std::move(params),
7943  MQTT_NS::any(),
7944  packet_id,
7945  std::move(topic_name),
7946  qos,
7947  std::forward<Args>(args)...,
7948  async_handler_t()
7949  );
7950  }
7951 
7952  template <typename... Args>
7953  typename std::enable_if<
7954  !std::is_convertible<
7955  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
7956  async_handler_t
7957  >::value
7958  >::type
7959  acquired_async_subscribe_imp(
7960  packet_id_t packet_id,
7961  as::const_buffer topic_name,
7962  std::uint8_t qos,
7963  Args&&... args) {
7964 
7965  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> params;
7966  params.reserve((sizeof...(args) + 2) / 2);
7967 
7968  async_send_subscribe(
7969  std::move(params),
7970  MQTT_NS::any(),
7971  packet_id,
7972  topic_name,
7973  qos,
7974  std::forward<Args>(args)...,
7975  async_handler_t()
7976  );
7977  }
7978 
7979  template <typename... Args>
7980  typename std::enable_if<
7981  std::is_convertible<
7982  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
7983  async_handler_t
7984  >::value
7985  >::type
7986  acquired_async_unsubscribe_imp(
7987  packet_id_t packet_id,
7988  std::string topic_name,
7989  Args&&... args) {
7990 
7991  std::vector<as::const_buffer> params;
7992  params.reserve(sizeof...(args));
7993 
7994  async_send_unsubscribe(
7995  std::move(params),
7996  MQTT_NS::any(),
7997  packet_id,
7998  std::move(topic_name),
7999  std::forward<Args>(args)...
8000  );
8001  }
8002

8005  std::is_convertible<
8006  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,

8008  >::value

8017

8019  std::move(params),
8020  MQTT_NS::any(),
8021  packet_id,
8022  topic_name,
8023  std::forward<Args>(args)...
8024  );
8025  }
8026 
8027  template <typename... Args>
8028  typename std::enable_if<
8029  !std::is_convertible<
8030  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
8031  async_handler_t
8032  >::value
8033  >::type
8034  acquired_async_unsubscribe_imp(
8035  packet_id_t packet_id,
8036  std::string topic_name,
8037  Args&&... args) {
8038

8040  params.reserve(sizeof...(args) + 1);
8041

8043  std::move(params),
8044  MQTT_NS::any(),
8045  packet_id,
8046  std::move(topic_name),
8047  std::forward<Args>(args)...,
8048  async_handler_t()
8049  );
8050  }
8051 
8052  template <typename... Args>
8053  typename std::enable_if<
8054  !std::is_convertible<
8055  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
8056  async_handler_t
8057  >::value
8058  >::type
8059  acquired_async_unsubscribe_imp(
8060  packet_id_t packet_id,
8061  as::const_buffer topic_name,
8062  Args&&... args) {

8065  params.reserve(sizeof...(args) + 1);
8066
