8068  std::move(params),
8069  MQTT_NS::any(),
8070  packet_id,
8071  topic_name,
8072  std::forward<Args>(args)...,
8073  async_handler_t()
8074  );
8075  }
8076 
8077  template <typename... Args>
8078  typename std::enable_if<
8079  std::is_convertible<
8080  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
8081  async_handler_t
8082  >::value
8083  >::type
8084  async_suback_imp(
8085  packet_id_t packet_id,
8086  std::uint8_t qos,
8087  Args&&... args) {
8088  async_send_suback(std::vector<std::uint8_t>{}, packet_id, qos, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
8089  }
8090 
8091  template <typename... Args>
8092  typename std::enable_if<
8093  !std::is_convertible<
8094  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
8095  async_handler_t
8096  >::value
8097  >::type
8098  async_suback_imp(
8099  packet_id_t packet_id,
8100  Args&&... qos) {
8101  async_send_suback(std::vector<std::uint8_t>({qos...}), packet_id, async_handler_t());
8102  }
8103 
8104  template <typename... Args>
8105  typename std::enable_if<
8106  std::is_convertible<
8107  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
8108  async_handler_t
8109  >::value
8110  >::type
8111  async_unsuback_imp(
8112  packet_id_t packet_id,
8113  std::uint8_t qos,
8114  Args&&... args) {
8115  async_send_unsuback(std::vector<std::uint8_t>{}, packet_id, qos, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
8116  }
8117 
8118  template <typename... Args>
8119  typename std::enable_if<
8120  !std::is_convertible<
8121  typename std::tuple_element<sizeof...(Args) - 1, std::tuple<Args...>>::type,
8122  async_handler_t
8123  >::value
8124  >::type
8125  async_unsuback_imp(
8126  packet_id_t packet_id,
8127  Args&&... qos) {
8128  async_send_unsuback(std::vector<std::uint8_t>({qos...}), packet_id, async_handler_t());
8129  }
8130 
8131  class send_buffer {
8132  public:
8133  send_buffer():buf_(std::make_shared<std::string>(static_cast<int>(payload_position_), 0)) {}
8134 
8135  std::shared_ptr<std::string> const& buf() const {
8136  return buf_;
8137  }
8138 
8139  std::shared_ptr<std::string>& buf() {
8140  return buf_;
8141  }
8142 
8143  std::pair<char*, std::size_t> finalize(std::uint8_t fixed_header) {
8144  auto rb = remaining_bytes(buf_->size() - payload_position_);
8145  std::size_t start_position = payload_position_ - rb.size() - 1;
8146  (*buf_)[start_position] = fixed_header;
8147  buf_->replace(start_position + 1, rb.size(), rb);
8148  return std::make_pair(
8149  &(*buf_)[start_position],
8150  buf_->size() - start_position);
8151  }
8152  private:
8153  static constexpr std::size_t const payload_position_ = 5;
8154  std::shared_ptr<std::string> buf_;
8155  };
8156 
8157  struct store {
8158  store(
8159  packet_id_t id,
8160  std::uint8_t type,
8161  basic_store_message_variant<PacketIdBytes> smv,
8162  MQTT_NS::any life_keeper = MQTT_NS::any())
8163  : packet_id_(id)
8164  , expected_control_packet_type_(type)
8165  , smv_(std::move(smv))
8166  , life_keeper_(std::move(life_keeper)) {}
8167  packet_id_t packet_id() const { return packet_id_; }
8168  std::uint8_t expected_control_packet_type() const { return expected_control_packet_type_; }
8169  basic_message_variant<PacketIdBytes> message() const {
8170  return get_basic_message_variant<PacketIdBytes>(smv_);
8171  }
8172  private:
8173  packet_id_t packet_id_;
8174  std::uint8_t expected_control_packet_type_;
8175  basic_store_message_variant<PacketIdBytes> smv_;
8176  MQTT_NS::any life_keeper_;
8177  };
8178 
8179  struct tag_packet_id {};
8180  struct tag_packet_id_type {};
8181  struct tag_seq {};
8182  using mi_store = mi::multi_index_container<
8183  store,
8184  mi::indexed_by<
8185  mi::ordered_unique<
8186  mi::tag<tag_packet_id_type>,
8187  mi::composite_key<
8188  store,
8189  mi::const_mem_fun<
8190  store, packet_id_t,
8191  &store::packet_id
8192  >,
8193  mi::const_mem_fun<
8194  store, std::uint8_t,
8195  &store::expected_control_packet_type
8196  >
8197  >
8198  >,
8199  mi::ordered_non_unique<
8200  mi::tag<tag_packet_id>,
8201  mi::const_mem_fun<
8202  store, packet_id_t,
8203  &store::packet_id
8204  >
8205  >,
8206  mi::sequenced<
8207  mi::tag<tag_seq>
8208  >
8209  >
8210  >;
8211 
8212  void handle_control_packet_type(async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) {
8213  fixed_header_ = static_cast<std::uint8_t>(buf_.front());
8214  remaining_length_ = 0;
8215  remaining_length_multiplier_ = 1;
8216  socket_->async_read(
8217  as::buffer(buf_.data(), 1),
8218  [this, self = std::move(self), func = std::move(func)](
8219  boost::system::error_code const& ec,
8220  std::size_t bytes_transferred){
8221  if (!check_error_and_transferred_length(ec, func, bytes_transferred, 1)) return;
8222  handle_remaining_length(std::move(func), std::move(self));
8223  }
8224  );
8225  }
8226 
8227  bool calc_variable_length(std::size_t& v, std::size_t& multiplier, char buf) {
8228  v += (buf & 0b01111111) * multiplier;
8229  multiplier *= 128;
8230  return multiplier <= 128 * 128 * 128 * 128;
8231  }
8232 
8233  void handle_remaining_length(async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) {
8234  if (!calc_variable_length(remaining_length_, remaining_length_multiplier_, buf_.front())) {
8235  handle_error(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8236  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8237  return;
8238  }
8239  if (buf_.front() & variable_length_continue_flag) {
8240  socket_->async_read(
8241  as::buffer(buf_.data(), 1),
8242  [self = std::move(self), func = std::move(func)](
8243  boost::system::error_code const& ec,
8244  std::size_t bytes_transferred){
8245  if (self->handle_close_or_error(ec)) {
8246  if (func) func(ec);
8247  return;
8248  }
8249  if (bytes_transferred != 1) {
8250  self->handle_error(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8251  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8252  return;
8253  }
8254  self->handle_remaining_length(std::move(func), std::move(self));
8255  }
8256  );
8257  }
8258  else {
8259  auto check =
8260  [&]() -> bool {
8261  auto cpt = get_control_packet_type(fixed_header_);
8262  switch (version_) {
8263  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
8264  switch (cpt) {
8265  case control_packet_type::connect:
8266  case control_packet_type::publish:
8267  case control_packet_type::subscribe:
8268  case control_packet_type::suback:
8269  case control_packet_type::unsubscribe:
8270  if (h_is_valid_length_) {
8271  return h_is_valid_length_(cpt, remaining_length_);
8272  }
8273  else {
8274  return true;
8275  }
8276  case control_packet_type::connack:
8277  return remaining_length_ == 2;
8278  case control_packet_type::puback:
8279  case control_packet_type::pubrec:
8280  case control_packet_type::pubrel:
8281  case control_packet_type::pubcomp:
8282  case control_packet_type::unsuback:
8283  return remaining_length_ == sizeof(packet_id_t);
8284  case control_packet_type::pingreq:
8285  case control_packet_type::pingresp:
8286  case control_packet_type::disconnect:
8287  return remaining_length_ == 0;
8288  default:
8289  return false;
8290  }
8291  break;
8292  case protocol_version::v5:
8293  default:
8294  switch (cpt) {
8295  case control_packet_type::connect:
8296  case control_packet_type::publish:
8297  case control_packet_type::subscribe:
8298  case control_packet_type::suback:
8299  case control_packet_type::unsubscribe:
8300  case control_packet_type::connack:
8301  case control_packet_type::puback:
8302  case control_packet_type::pubrec:
8303  case control_packet_type::pubrel:
8304  case control_packet_type::pubcomp:
8305  case control_packet_type::unsuback:
8306  case control_packet_type::disconnect:
8307  if (h_is_valid_length_) {
8308  return h_is_valid_length_(cpt, remaining_length_);
8309  }
8310  else {
8311  return true;
8312  }
8313  case control_packet_type::pingreq:
8314  case control_packet_type::pingresp:
8315  return remaining_length_ == 0;
8316  default:
8317  return false;
8318  }
8319  break;
8320  }
8321  };
8322  if (!check()) {
8323  handle_error(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8324  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::message_size));
8325  return;
8326  }
8327 
8328  process_payload(std::move(func), std::move(self));
8329  }
8330  }
8331 
8332  void process_payload(async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) {
8333  auto control_packet_type = get_control_packet_type(fixed_header_);
8334  switch (control_packet_type) {
8335  case control_packet_type::connect:
8336  process_connect(std::move(func), remaining_length_ < packet_bulk_read_limit_, std::move(self));
8337  break;
8338  case control_packet_type::connack:
8339  process_connack(std::move(func), remaining_length_ < packet_bulk_read_limit_, std::move(self));
8340  break;
8341  case control_packet_type::publish:
8342  if (mqtt_connected_) {
8343  process_publish(std::move(func), remaining_length_ < packet_bulk_read_limit_, std::move(self));
8344  }
8345  break;
8346  case control_packet_type::puback:
8347  if (mqtt_connected_) {
8348  process_puback(std::move(func), remaining_length_ < packet_bulk_read_limit_, std::move(self));
8349  }
8350  break;
8351  case control_packet_type::pubrec:
8352  if (mqtt_connected_) {
8353  process_pubrec(std::move(func), remaining_length_ < packet_bulk_read_limit_, std::move(self));
8354  }
8355  break;
8356  case control_packet_type::pubrel:
8357  if (mqtt_connected_) {
8358  process_pubrel(std::move(func), remaining_length_ < packet_bulk_read_limit_, std::move(self));
8359  }
8360  break;
8361  case control_packet_type::pubcomp:
8362  if (mqtt_connected_) {
8363  process_pubcomp(std::move(func), remaining_length_ < packet_bulk_read_limit_, std::move(self));
8364  }
8365  break;
8366  case control_packet_type::subscribe:
8367  if (mqtt_connected_) {
8368  process_subscribe(std::move(func), remaining_length_ < packet_bulk_read_limit_, std::move(self));
8369  }
8370  break;
8371  case control_packet_type::suback:
8372  if (mqtt_connected_) {
8373  process_suback(std::move(func), remaining_length_ < packet_bulk_read_limit_, std::move(self));
8374  }
8375  break;
8376  case control_packet_type::unsubscribe:
8377  if (mqtt_connected_) {
8378  process_unsubscribe(std::move(func), remaining_length_ < packet_bulk_read_limit_, std::move(self));
8379  }
8380  break;
8381  case control_packet_type::unsuback:
8382  if (mqtt_connected_) {
8383  process_unsuback(std::move(func), remaining_length_ < packet_bulk_read_limit_, std::move(self));
8384  }
8385  break;
8386  case control_packet_type::pingreq:
8387  if (mqtt_connected_) {
8388  process_pingreq(std::move(func));
8389  }
8390  break;
8391  case control_packet_type::pingresp:
8392  if (mqtt_connected_) {
8393  process_pingresp(std::move(func));
8394  }
8395  break;
8396  case control_packet_type::disconnect:
8397  process_disconnect(func, remaining_length_ < packet_bulk_read_limit_, std::move(self));
8398  break;
8399  case control_packet_type::auth:
8400  process_auth(func, remaining_length_ < packet_bulk_read_limit_, std::move(self));
8401  break;
8402  default:
8403  break;
8404  }
8405  }
8406 
8407  // primitive read functions
8408  void process_nbytes(
8409  async_handler_t func,
8410  buffer buf,
8411  std::size_t size,
8412  std::function<void(buffer, buffer, async_handler_t, this_type_sp)> handler,
8413  this_type_sp self
8414  ) {
8415  if (remaining_length_ < size) {
8416  call_message_size_error_handlers(func);
8417  return;
8418  }
8419  remaining_length_ -= size;
8420 
8421  if (buf.empty()) {
8422  auto spa = make_shared_ptr_array(size);
8423  auto ptr = spa.get();
8424  socket_->async_read(
8425  as::buffer(ptr, size),
8426  [
8427  this,
8428  self = std::move(self),
8429  func = std::move(func),
8430  handler = std::move(handler),
8431  buf = buffer(string_view(ptr, size), std::move(spa))
8432  ]
8433  (boost::system::error_code const& ec,
8434  std::size_t bytes_transferred) mutable {
8435  if (!check_error_and_transferred_length(ec, func, bytes_transferred, buf.size())) return;
8436  handler(
8437  std::move(buf),
8438  buffer(),
8439  std::move(func),
8440  std::move(self)
8441  );
8442  }
8443  );
8444  }
8445  else {
8446  if (buf.size() < size) {
8447  call_message_size_error_handlers(func);
8448  return;
8449  }
8450  socket_->post(
8451  [
8452  self = std::move(self),
8453  func = std::move(func),
8454  buf = std::move(buf),
8455  size,
8456  handler = std::move(handler)
8457  ]
8458  () mutable {
8459  handler(
8460  buf.substr(0, size),
8461  buf.substr(size),
8462  std::move(func),
8463  std::move(self)
8464  );
8465  }
8466  );
8467  }
8468  }
8469 
8470  template <std::size_t Bytes>
8471  void process_fixed_length(
8472  async_handler_t func,
8473  buffer buf,
8474  std::function<void(std::size_t, buffer, async_handler_t, this_type_sp)> handler,
8475  this_type_sp self
8476  ) {
8477  if (remaining_length_ < Bytes) {
8478  call_message_size_error_handlers(func);
8479  return;
8480  }
8481 
8482  remaining_length_ -= Bytes;
8483 
8484  if (buf.empty()) {
8485  socket_->async_read(
8486  as::buffer(buf_.data(), Bytes),
8487  [
8488  this,
8489  self = std::move(self),
8490  func = std::move(func),
8491  handler = std::move(handler)
8492  ]
8493  (boost::system::error_code const& ec,
8494  std::size_t bytes_transferred) mutable {
8495  if (!check_error_and_transferred_length(ec, func, bytes_transferred, Bytes)) return;
8496  handler(
8497  make_packet_id<Bytes>::apply(
8498  buf_.data(),
8499  std::next(buf_.data(), boost::numeric_cast<buffer::difference_type>(Bytes))
8500  ),
8501  buffer(),
8502  std::move(func),
8503  std::move(self)
8504  );
8505  }
8506  );
8507  }
8508  else {
8509  socket_->post(
8510  [
8511  self = std::move(self),
8512  func = std::move(func),
8513  buf = std::move(buf),
8514  handler = std::move(handler)
8515  ]
8516  () mutable {
8517  auto packet_id =
8518  make_packet_id<Bytes>::apply(
8519  buf.data(),
8520  std::next(buf.data(), boost::numeric_cast<buffer::difference_type>(Bytes))
8521  );
8522  buf.remove_prefix(Bytes);
8523  handler(
8524  packet_id,
8525  std::move(buf),
8526  std::move(func),
8527  std::move(self)
8528  );
8529  }
8530  );
8531  }
8532  }
8533 
8534  // This function isn't used for remaining lengh.
8535  void process_variable_length(
8536  async_handler_t func,
8537  buffer buf,
8538  std::function<void(std::size_t, buffer, async_handler_t, this_type_sp)> handler,
8539  this_type_sp self
8540  ) {
8541  process_variable_length_impl(
8542  std::move(func),
8543  std::move(buf),
8544  std::move(handler),
8545  0,
8546  1,
8547  std::move(self)
8548  );
8549  }
8550 
8551  void process_variable_length_impl(
8552  async_handler_t func,
8553  buffer buf,
8554  std::function<void(std::size_t, buffer, async_handler_t, this_type_sp)> handler,
8555  std::size_t size,
8556  std::size_t multiplier,
8557  this_type_sp self
8558  ) {
8559  if (remaining_length_ == 0) {
8560  call_message_size_error_handlers(func);
8561  return;
8562  }
8563  --remaining_length_;
8564 
8565  // I use rvalue reference parameter to reduce move constructor calling.
8566  // This is a local lambda expression invoked from this function, so
8567  // I can control all callers.
8568  auto proc =
8569  [this]
8570  (
8571  async_handler_t&& func,
8572  buffer&& buf,
8573  std::function<void(std::size_t, buffer, async_handler_t, this_type_sp)>&& handler,
8574  std::size_t size,
8575  std::size_t multiplier,
8576  this_type_sp&& self
8577  ) mutable {
8578  if (!calc_variable_length(size, multiplier, buf.front())) {
8579  call_message_size_error_handlers(func);
8580  return;
8581  }
8582  if (buf.front() & variable_length_continue_flag) {
8583  BOOST_ASSERT(!buf.empty());
8584  buf.remove_prefix(1);
8585  process_variable_length_impl(
8586  std::move(func),
8587  std::move(buf),
8588  std::move(handler),
8589  size,
8590  multiplier,
8591  std::move(self)
8592  );
8593  }
8594  else {
8595  buf.remove_prefix(1);
8596  handler(
8597  size,
8598  std::move(buf),
8599  std::move(func),
8600  std::move(self)
8601  );
8602  }
8603  };
8604 
8605  if (buf.empty()) {
8606  socket_->async_read(
8607  as::buffer(buf_.data(), 1),
8608  [
8609  this,
8610  self = std::move(self),
8611  func = std::move(func),
8612  handler = std::move(handler),
8613  size,
8614  multiplier,
8615  proc = std::move(proc)
8616  ]
8617  (boost::system::error_code const& ec,
8618  std::size_t bytes_transferred) mutable {
8619  if (!check_error_and_transferred_length(ec, func, bytes_transferred, 1)) return;
8620  proc(
8621  std::move(func),
8622  buffer(string_view(buf_.data(), 1)), // buf_'s lifetime is handled by `self`
8623  std::move(handler),
8624  size,
8625  multiplier,
8626  std::move(self)
8627  );
8628  }
8629  );
8630  }
8631  else {
8632  socket_->post(
8633  [
8634  func = std::move(func),
8635  handler = std::move(handler),
8636  buf = std::move(buf),
8637  size,
8638  multiplier,
8639  proc = std::move(proc),
8640  self = std::move(self)
8641  ]
8642  () mutable {
8643  proc(
8644  std::move(func),
8645  std::move(buf),
8646  std::move(handler),
8647  size,
8648  multiplier,
8649  std::move(self)
8650  );
8651  }
8652  );
8653  }
8654  }
8655 
8656  void process_packet_id(
8657  async_handler_t func,
8658  buffer buf,
8659  std::function<void(packet_id_t, buffer, async_handler_t, this_type_sp)> handler,
8660  this_type_sp self
8661  ) {
8662  process_fixed_length<sizeof(packet_id_t)>(
8663  std::move(func),
8664  std::move(buf),
8665  [
8666  handler = std::move(handler)
8667  ]
8668  (std::size_t packet_id, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8669  handler(static_cast<packet_id_t>(packet_id), std::move(buf), std::move(func), std::move(self));
8670  },
8671  std::move(self)
8672  );
8673  }
8674 
8675  void process_binary(
8676  async_handler_t func,
8677  buffer buf,
8678  std::function<void(buffer, buffer, async_handler_t, this_type_sp)> handler,
8679  this_type_sp self
8680  ) {
8681  if (remaining_length_ < 2) {
8682  call_message_size_error_handlers(func);
8683  return;
8684  }
8685  process_fixed_length<2>(
8686  std::move(func),
8687  std::move(buf),
8688  [
8689  this,
8690  handler = std::move(handler)
8691  ]
8692  (std::size_t size,
8693  buffer buf,
8694  async_handler_t func,
8695  this_type_sp self) mutable {
8696  if (remaining_length_ < size) {
8697  call_message_size_error_handlers(func);
8698  return;
8699  }
8700  process_nbytes(
8701  std::move(func),
8702  std::move(buf),
8703  size,
8704  std::move(handler),
8705  std::move(self)
8706  );
8707  },
8708  std::move(self)
8709  );
8710  }
8711 
8712  void process_string(
8713  async_handler_t func,
8714  buffer buf,
8715  std::function<void(buffer, buffer, async_handler_t, this_type_sp)> handler,
8716  this_type_sp self
8717  ) {
8718  process_binary(
8719  std::move(func),
8720  std::move(buf),
8721  [this, handler = std::move(handler)]
8722  (buffer str, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8723  auto r = utf8string::validate_contents(str);
8724  if (r != utf8string::validation::well_formed) {
8725  call_protocol_error_handlers(func);
8726  return;
8727  }
8728  handler(std::move(str), std::move(buf), std::move(func), std::move(self));
8729  },
8730  std::move(self)
8731  );
8732  }
8733 
8734 
8735  void process_properties(
8736  async_handler_t func,
8737  buffer buf,
8738  std::function<void(std::vector<v5::property_variant>, buffer, async_handler_t, this_type_sp)> handler,
8739  this_type_sp self
8740  ) {
8741  process_variable_length(
8742  std::move(func),
8743  std::move(buf),
8744  [
8745  this,
8746  handler = std::move(handler)
8747  ]
8748  (std::size_t property_length, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8749  if (property_length > remaining_length_) {
8750  call_message_size_error_handlers(func);
8751  return;
8752  }
8753  if (property_length == 0) {
8754  handler(std::vector<v5::property_variant>(), std::move(buf), std::move(func), std::move(self));
8755  return;
8756  }
8757 
8758  if (buf.empty()) {
8759  struct spa_address_len {
8760  shared_ptr_array spa;
8761  char* address;
8762  std::size_t len;
8763  };
8764  auto result =
8765  [&] () -> spa_address_len {
8766  if (property_length < props_bulk_read_limit_) {
8767  auto spa = make_shared_ptr_array(property_length);
8768  auto ptr = spa.get();
8769  return
8770  {
8771  std::move(spa),
8772  ptr,
8773  property_length
8774  };
8775  }
8776  return
8777  {
8778  nullptr,
8779  buf_.data(),
8780  1
8781  };
8782  } ();
8783  socket_->async_read(
8784  as::buffer(result.address, result.len),
8785  [
8786  this,
8787  self = std::move(self),
8788  func = std::move(func),
8789  handler = std::move(handler),
8790  property_length,
8791  result
8792  ]
8793  (boost::system::error_code const& ec,
8794  std::size_t bytes_transferred) mutable {
8795  if (!check_error_and_transferred_length(ec, func, bytes_transferred, result.len)) return;
8796  process_property_id(
8797  std::move(func),
8798  buffer(string_view(result.address, result.len), result.spa),
8799  property_length,
8800  std::vector<v5::property_variant>(),
8801  std::move(handler),
8802  std::move(self)
8803  );
8804  }
8805  );
8806  }
8807  else {
8808  socket_->post(
8809  [
8810  this,
8811  self = std::move(self),
8812  func = std::move(func),
8813  buf = std::move(buf),
8814  handler = std::move(handler),
8815  property_length
8816  ]
8817  () mutable {
8818  process_property_id(
8819  std::move(func),
8820  std::move(buf),
8821  property_length,
8822  std::vector<v5::property_variant>(),
8823  std::move(handler),
8824  std::move(self)
8825  );
8826  }
8827  );
8828  }
8829  },
8830  std::move(self)
8831  );
8832  }
8833 
8834  void process_property_id(
8835  async_handler_t func,
8836  buffer buf,
8837  std::size_t property_length_rest,
8838  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
8839  std::function<void(std::vector<v5::property_variant>, buffer, async_handler_t, this_type_sp)> handler,
8840  this_type_sp self
8841  ) {
8842 
8843  if (property_length_rest == 0) {
8844  handler(std::move(props), std::move(buf), std::move(func), std::move(self));
8845  return;
8846  }
8847 
8848  --remaining_length_;
8849  if (buf.empty()) {
8850  socket_->async_read(
8851  as::buffer(buf_.data(), 1),
8852  [
8853  this,
8854  self = std::move(self),
8855  func = std::move(func),
8856  props = std::move(props),
8857  handler = std::move(handler),
8858  property_length_rest
8859  ]
8860  (boost::system::error_code const& ec,
8861  std::size_t bytes_transferred) mutable {
8862  if (!check_error_and_transferred_length(ec, func, bytes_transferred, 1)) return;
8863  process_property_body(
8864  std::move(func),
8865  buffer(),
8866  static_cast<v5::property::id>(buf_.front()),
8867  property_length_rest - 1,
8868  std::move(props),
8869  std::move(handler),
8870  std::move(self)
8871  );
8872  }
8873  );
8874  }
8875  else {
8876  socket_->post(
8877  [
8878  this,
8879  self = std::move(self),
8880  func = std::move(func),
8881  buf = std::move(buf),
8882  props = std::move(props),
8883  handler = std::move(handler),
8884  property_length_rest
8885  ]
8886  () mutable {
8887  auto id = static_cast<v5::property::id>(buf.front());
8888  buf.remove_prefix(1);
8889  process_property_body(
8890  std::move(func),
8891  std::move(buf),
8892  id,
8893  property_length_rest - 1,
8894  std::move(props),
8895  std::move(handler),
8896  std::move(self)
8897  );
8898  }
8899  );
8900  }
8901  }
8902 
8903  void process_property_body(
8904  async_handler_t func,
8905  buffer buf,
8906  v5::property::id id,
8907  std::size_t property_length_rest,
8908  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
8909  std::function<void(std::vector<v5::property_variant>, buffer, async_handler_t, this_type_sp)> handler,
8910  this_type_sp self
8911  ) {
8912 
8913  static constexpr std::size_t const length_bytes = 2;
8914 
8915  if (property_length_rest == 0) {
8916  call_message_size_error_handlers(func);
8917  return;
8918  }
8919 
8920  switch (id) {
8921  case v5::property::id::payload_format_indicator: {
8922  std::size_t const len = 1;
8923  if (property_length_rest < len) {
8924  call_message_size_error_handlers(func);
8925  return;
8926  }
8927  process_nbytes(
8928  std::move(func),
8929  std::move(buf),
8930  len,
8931  [
8932  this,
8933  props = std::move(props),
8934  handler = std::move(handler),
8935  rest = property_length_rest - len
8936  ]
8937  (buffer body, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8938  props.emplace_back(
8939  v5::property::payload_format_indicator(body.begin(), body.end())
8940  );
8941  process_property_id(
8942  std::move(func),
8943  std::move(buf),
8944  rest,
8945  std::move(props),
8946  std::move(handler),
8947  std::move(self)
8948  );
8949  },
8950  std::move(self)
8951  );
8952  } break;
8953  case v5::property::id::message_expiry_interval: {
8954  std::size_t const len = 4;
8955  if (property_length_rest < len) {
8956  call_message_size_error_handlers(func);
8957  return;
8958  }
8959  process_nbytes(
8960  std::move(func),
8961  std::move(buf),
8962  len,
8963  [
8964  this,
8965  props = std::move(props),
8966  handler = std::move(handler),
8967  rest = property_length_rest - len
8968  ]
8969  (buffer body, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8970  props.emplace_back(
8971  v5::property::message_expiry_interval(body.begin(), body.end())
8972  );
8973  process_property_id(
8974  std::move(func),
8975  std::move(buf),
8976  rest,
8977  std::move(props),
8978  std::move(handler),
8979  std::move(self)
8980  );
8981  },
8982  std::move(self)
8983  );
8984  } break;
8985  case v5::property::id::content_type: {
8986  process_string(
8987  std::move(func),
8988  std::move(buf),
8989  [
8990  this,
8991  props = std::move(props),
8992  handler = std::move(handler),
8993  property_length_rest
8994  ]
8995  (buffer body, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
8996  auto rest = property_length_rest - length_bytes - body.size();
8997  props.emplace_back(
8998  v5::property::content_type(std::move(body), true)
8999  );
9000  process_property_id(
9001  std::move(func),
9002  std::move(buf),
9003  rest,
9004  std::move(props),
9005  std::move(handler),
9006  std::move(self)
9007  );
9008  },
9009  std::move(self)
9010  );
9011  } break;
9012  case v5::property::id::response_topic: {
9013  process_string(
9014  std::move(func),
9015  std::move(buf),
9016  [
9017  this,
9018  props = std::move(props),
9019  handler = std::move(handler),
9020  property_length_rest
9021  ]
9022  (buffer body, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9023  auto rest = property_length_rest - length_bytes - body.size();
9024  props.emplace_back(
9025  v5::property::response_topic(std::move(body), true)
9026  );
9027  process_property_id(
9028  std::move(func),
9029  std::move(buf),
9030  rest,
9031  std::move(props),
9032  std::move(handler),
9033  std::move(self)
9034  );
9035  },
9036  std::move(self)
9037  );
9038  } break;
9039  case v5::property::id::correlation_data: {
9040  process_string(
9041  std::move(func),
9042  std::move(buf),
9043  [
9044  this,
9045  props = std::move(props),
9046  handler = std::move(handler),
9047  property_length_rest
9048  ]
9049  (buffer body, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9050  auto rest = property_length_rest - length_bytes - body.size();
9051  props.emplace_back(
9052  v5::property::correlation_data(std::move(body), true)
9053  );
9054  process_property_id(
9055  std::move(func),
9056  std::move(buf),
9057  rest,
9058  std::move(props),
9059  std::move(handler),
9060  std::move(self)
9061  );
9062  },
9063  std::move(self)
9064  );
9065  } break;
9066  case v5::property::id::subscription_identifier: {
9067  process_variable_length(
9068  std::move(func),
9069  std::move(buf),
9070  [
9071  this,
9072  props = std::move(props),
9073  handler = std::move(handler),
9074  property_length_rest,
9075  remaining_length_before = remaining_length_
9076  ]
9077  (std::size_t size, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9078  auto consumed = remaining_length_before - remaining_length_;
9079  auto rest = property_length_rest - consumed;
9080  props.emplace_back(
9081  v5::property::subscription_identifier(size)
9082  );
9083  process_property_id(
9084  std::move(func),
9085  std::move(buf),
9086  rest,
9087  std::move(props),
9088  std::move(handler),
9089  std::move(self)
9090  );
9091  },
9092  std::move(self)
9093  );
9094  } break;
9095  case v5::property::id::session_expiry_interval: {
9096  std::size_t const len = 4;
9097  if (property_length_rest < len) {
9098  call_message_size_error_handlers(func);
9099  return;
9100  }
9101  process_nbytes(
9102  std::move(func),
9103  std::move(buf),
9104  len,
9105  [
9106  this,
9107  props = std::move(props),
9108  handler = std::move(handler),
9109  rest = property_length_rest - len
9110  ]
9111  (buffer body, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9112  props.emplace_back(
9113  v5::property::session_expiry_interval(body.begin(), body.end())
9114  );
9115  process_property_id(
9116  std::move(func),
9117  std::move(buf),
9118  rest,
9119  std::move(props),
9120  std::move(handler),
9121  std::move(self)
9122  );
9123  },
9124  std::move(self)
9125  );
9126  } break;
9127  case v5::property::id::assigned_client_identifier: {
9128  process_string(
9129  std::move(func),
9130  std::move(buf),
9131  [
9132  this,
9133  props = std::move(props),
9134  handler = std::move(handler),
9135  property_length_rest
9136  ]
9137  (buffer body, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9138  auto rest = property_length_rest - length_bytes - body.size();
9139  props.emplace_back(
9140  v5::property::assigned_client_identifier(std::move(body), true)
9141  );
9142  process_property_id(
9143  std::move(func),
9144  std::move(buf),
9145  rest,
9146  std::move(props),
9147  std::move(handler),
9148  std::move(self)
9149  );
9150  },
9151  std::move(self)
9152  );
9153 
9154  } break;
9155  case v5::property::id::server_keep_alive: {
9156  std::size_t const len = 2;
9157  if (property_length_rest < len) {
9158  call_message_size_error_handlers(func);
9159  return;
9160  }
9161  process_nbytes(
9162  std::move(func),
9163  std::move(buf),
9164  len,
9165  [
9166  this,
9167  props = std::move(props),
9168  handler = std::move(handler),
9169  rest = property_length_rest - len
9170  ]
9171  (buffer body, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9172  props.emplace_back(
9173  v5::property::server_keep_alive(body.begin(), body.end())
9174  );
9175  process_property_id(
9176  std::move(func),
9177  std::move(buf),
9178  rest,
9179  std::move(props),
9180  std::move(handler),
9181  std::move(self)
9182  );
9183  },
9184  std::move(self)
9185  );
9186  } break;
9187  case v5::property::id::authentication_method: {
9188  process_string(
9189  std::move(func),
9190  std::move(buf),
9191  [
9192  this,
9193  props = std::move(props),
9194  handler = std::move(handler),
9195  property_length_rest
9196  ]
9197  (buffer body, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9198  auto rest = property_length_rest - length_bytes - body.size();
9199  props.emplace_back(
9200  v5::property::authentication_method(std::move(body), true)
9201  );
9202  process_property_id(
9203  std::move(func),
9204  std::move(buf),
9205  rest,
9206  std::move(props),
9207  std::move(handler),
9208  std::move(self)
9209  );
9210  },
9211  std::move(self)
9212  );
9213  } break;
9214  case v5::property::id::authentication_data: {
9215  process_binary(
9216  std::move(func),
9217  std::move(buf),
9218  [
9219  this,
9220  props = std::move(props),
9221  handler = std::move(handler),
9222  property_length_rest
9223  ]
9224  (buffer body, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9225  auto rest = property_length_rest - length_bytes - body.size();
9226  props.emplace_back(
9227  v5::property::authentication_data(std::move(body))
9228  );
9229  process_property_id(
9230  std::move(func),
9231  std::move(buf),
9232  rest,
9233  std::move(props),
9234  std::move(handler),
9235  std::move(self)
9236  );
9237  },
9238  std::move(self)
9239  );
9240  } break;
9241  case v5::property::id::request_problem_information: {
9242  std::size_t const len = 1;
9243  if (property_length_rest < len) {
9244  call_message_size_error_handlers(func);
9245  return;
9246  }
9247  process_nbytes(
9248  std::move(func),
9249  std::move(buf),
9250  len,
9251  [
9252  this,
9253  props = std::move(props),
9254  handler = std::move(handler),
9255  rest = property_length_rest - len
9256  ]
9257  (buffer body, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9258  props.emplace_back(
9259  v5::property::request_problem_information(body.begin(), body.end())
9260  );
9261  process_property_id(
9262  std::move(func),
9263  std::move(buf),
9264  rest,
9265  std::move(props),
9266  std::move(handler),

9268  );
9269  },
9270  std::move(self)
9271  );
9272  } break;

9277  return;
9278  }

9280  std::move(func),

9303  );

9399  property_length_rest

9413  );
9414  },

9416  );
9417  } break;
9418  case v5::property::id::receive_maximum: {
9419  std::size_t const len = 2;

9421  call_message_size_error_handlers(func);
9422  return;
9423  }

9425  std::move(func),
9426  std::move(buf),
9427  len,
9428  [
9429  this,

9433  ]

9436  v5::property::receive_maximum(body.begin(), body.end())
9437  );
9438  process_property_id(
9439  std::move(func),
9440  std::move(buf),
9441  rest,
9442  std::move(props),

9444  std::move(self)
9445  );
9446  },
9447  std::move(self)
9448  );
9449  } break;
9450  case v5::property::id::topic_alias_maximum: {
9451  std::size_t const len = 2;
9452  if (property_length_rest < len) {
9453  call_message_size_error_handlers(func);
9454  return;
9455  }
9456  process_nbytes(
9457  std::move(func),
9458  std::move(buf),
9459  len,
9460  [
9461  this,
9462  props = std::move(props),
9463  handler = std::move(handler),

9471  std::move(func),

9475  std::move(handler),

9478  },

9480  );
9481  } break;
9482  case v5::property::id::topic_alias: {
9483  std::size_t const len = 2;
9484  if (property_length_rest < len) {
9485  call_message_size_error_handlers(func);
9486  return;
9487  }
9488  process_nbytes(
9489  std::move(func),
9490  std::move(buf),
9491  len,
9492  [
9493  this,
9494  props = std::move(props),
9495  handler = std::move(handler),
9496  rest = property_length_rest - len
9497  ]
9498  (buffer body, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9499  props.emplace_back(
9500  v5::property::topic_alias(body.begin(), body.end())
9501  );
9502  process_property_id(
9503  std::move(func),
9504  std::move(buf),
9505  rest,
9506  std::move(props),
9507  std::move(handler),
9508  std::move(self)
9509  );
9510  },
9511  std::move(self)
9512  );
9513  } break;
9514  case v5::property::id::maximum_qos: {
9515  std::size_t const len = 1;
9516  if (property_length_rest < len) {
9517  call_message_size_error_handlers(func);
9518  return;
9519  }
9520  process_nbytes(
9521  std::move(func),
9522  std::move(buf),
9523  len,
9524  [
9525  this,
9526  props = std::move(props),
9527  handler = std::move(handler),
9528  rest = property_length_rest - len
9529  ]
9530  (buffer body, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9531  props.emplace_back(
9532  v5::property::maximum_qos(body.begin(), body.end())
9533  );
9534  process_property_id(
9535  std::move(func),
9536  std::move(buf),
9537  rest,
9538  std::move(props),
9539  std::move(handler),
9540  std::move(self)
9541  );
9542  },
9543  std::move(self)
9544  );
9545  } break;
9546  case v5::property::id::retain_available: {
9547  std::size_t const len = 1;
9548  if (property_length_rest < len) {
9549  call_message_size_error_handlers(func);
9550  return;
9551  }
9552  process_nbytes(
9553  std::move(func),
9554  std::move(buf),
9555  len,
9556  [
9557  this,
9558  props = std::move(props),
9559  handler = std::move(handler),
9560  rest = property_length_rest - len
9561  ]
9562  (buffer body, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9563  props.emplace_back(
9564  v5::property::retain_available(body.begin(), body.end())
9565  );
9566  process_property_id(
9567  std::move(func),
9568  std::move(buf),
9569  rest,
9570  std::move(props),
9571  std::move(handler),
9572  std::move(self)
9573  );
9574  },
9575  std::move(self)
9576  );
9577  } break;
9578  case v5::property::id::user_property: {
9579  process_string(
9580  std::move(func),
9581  std::move(buf),
9582  [
9583  this,
9584  props = std::move(props),
9585  handler = std::move(handler),
9586  property_length_rest
9587  ]
9588  (buffer key, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9589  auto rest = property_length_rest - length_bytes - key.size();
9590  process_string(
9591  std::move(func),
9592  std::move(buf),
9593  [
9594  this,
9595  props = std::move(props),
9596  handler = std::move(handler),
9597  key = std::move(key),
9598  property_length_rest = rest
9599  ]
9600  (buffer val, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9601  auto rest = property_length_rest - length_bytes - val.size();
9602  props.emplace_back(
9603  v5::property::user_property(
9604  std::move(key),
9605  std::move(val),
9606  true,
9607  true
9608  )
9609  );
9610  process_property_id(
9611  std::move(func),
9612  std::move(buf),
9613  rest,
9614  std::move(props),
9615  std::move(handler),
9616  std::move(self)
9617  );
9618  },
9619  std::move(self)
9620  );
9621  },
9622  std::move(self)
9623  );
9624  } break;
9625  case v5::property::id::maximum_packet_size: {
9626  std::size_t const len = 4;
9627  if (property_length_rest < len) {
9628  call_message_size_error_handlers(func);
9629  return;
9630  }
9631  process_nbytes(
9632  std::move(func),
9633  std::move(buf),
9634  len,
9635  [
9636  this,
9637  props = std::move(props),
9638  handler = std::move(handler),
9639  rest = property_length_rest - len
9640  ]
9641  (buffer body, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9642  props.emplace_back(
9643  v5::property::maximum_packet_size(body.begin(), body.end())
9644  );
9645  process_property_id(
9646  std::move(func),
9647  std::move(buf),
9648  rest,
9649  std::move(props),
9650  std::move(handler),
9651  std::move(self)
9652  );
9653  },
9654  std::move(self)
9655  );
9656  } break;
9657  case v5::property::id::wildcard_subscription_available: {
9658  std::size_t const len = 1;
9659  if (property_length_rest < len) {
9660  call_message_size_error_handlers(func);
9661  return;
9662  }
9663  process_nbytes(
9664  std::move(func),
9665  std::move(buf),
9666  len,
9667  [
9668  this,
9669  props = std::move(props),
9670  handler = std::move(handler),
9671  rest = property_length_rest - len
9672  ]
9673  (buffer body, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9674  props.emplace_back(
9675  v5::property::wildcard_subscription_available(body.begin(), body.end())
9676  );
9677  process_property_id(
9678  std::move(func),
9679  std::move(buf),
9680  rest,
9681  std::move(props),
9682  std::move(handler),
9683  std::move(self)
9684  );
9685  },
9686  std::move(self)
9687  );
9688  } break;
9689  case v5::property::id::subscription_identifier_available: {
9690  std::size_t const len = 1;
9691  if (property_length_rest < len) {
9692  call_message_size_error_handlers(func);
9693  return;
9694  }
9695  process_nbytes(
9696  std::move(func),
9697  std::move(buf),
9698  len,
9699  [
9700  this,
9701  props = std::move(props),
9702  handler = std::move(handler),
9703  rest = property_length_rest - len
9704  ]
9705  (buffer body, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9706  props.emplace_back(
9707  v5::property::subscription_identifier_available(body.begin(), body.end())
9708  );
9709  process_property_id(
9710  std::move(func),
9711  std::move(buf),
9712  rest,
9713  std::move(props),
9714  std::move(handler),
9715  std::move(self)
9716  );
9717  },
9718  std::move(self)
9719  );
9720  } break;
9721  case v5::property::id::shared_subscription_available: {
9722  std::size_t const len = 1;
9723  if (property_length_rest < len) {
9724  call_message_size_error_handlers(func);
9725  return;
9726  }
9727  process_nbytes(
9728  std::move(func),
9729  std::move(buf),
9730  len,
9731  [
9732  this,
9733  props = std::move(props),
9734  handler = std::move(handler),
9735  rest = property_length_rest - len
9736  ]
9737  (buffer body, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9738  props.emplace_back(
9739  v5::property::shared_subscription_available(body.begin(), body.end())
9740  );
9741  process_property_id(
9742  std::move(func),
9743  std::move(buf),
9744  rest,
9745  std::move(props),
9746  std::move(handler),
9747  std::move(self)
9748  );
9749  },
9750  std::move(self)
9751  );
9752  } break;
9753  }
9754  }
9755 
9756  // process common
9757 
9758  template <typename NextFunc, typename NextPhase, typename Info>
9759  void process_header(
9760  async_handler_t func,
9761  bool all_read,
9762  std::size_t header_len,
9763  NextFunc&& next_func,
9764  NextPhase next_phase,
9765  Info&& info,
9766  this_type_sp self
9767  ) {
9768 
9769  if (all_read) {
9770  auto spa = make_shared_ptr_array(remaining_length_);
9771  auto ptr = spa.get();
9772  socket_->async_read(
9773  as::buffer(ptr, remaining_length_),
9774  [
9775  this,
9776  func = std::move(func),
9777  buf = buffer(string_view(ptr, remaining_length_), std::move(spa)),
9778  next_func = std::forward<NextFunc>(next_func),
9779  next_phase,
9780  info = std::forward<Info>(info),
9781  self = std::move(self)
9782  ]
9783  (boost::system::error_code const& ec, std::size_t bytes_transferred) mutable {
9784  if (!check_error_and_transferred_length(ec, func, bytes_transferred, remaining_length_)) return;
9785  (this->*next_func)(
9786  std::move(func),
9787  std::move(buf),
9788  next_phase,
9789  std::move(info),
9790  std::move(self)
9791  );
9792  }
9793  );
9794  return;
9795  }
9796 
9797  if (header_len == 0) {
9798  (this->*next_func)(
9799  std::move(func),
9800  buffer(),
9801  next_phase,
9802  std::move(info),
9803  std::move(self)
9804  );
9805  return;
9806  }
9807 
9808  socket_->async_read(
9809  as::buffer(buf_.data(), header_len),
9810  [
9811  this,
9812  func = std::move(func),
9813  header_len,
9814  next_func = std::forward<NextFunc>(next_func),
9815  next_phase,
9816  info = std::forward<Info>(info),
9817  self = std::move(self)
9818  ]
9819  (boost::system::error_code const& ec,
9820  std::size_t bytes_transferred) mutable {
9821  if (!check_error_and_transferred_length(ec, func, bytes_transferred, header_len)) return;
9822  (this->*next_func)(
9823  std::move(func),
9824  buffer(string_view(buf_.data(), header_len)),
9825  next_phase,
9826  std::move(info),
9827  std::move(self)
9828  );
9829  }
9830  );
9831  }
9832 
9833  // process connect
9834 
9835  enum class connect_phase {
9836  header,
9837  properties,
9838  client_id,
9839  will,
9840  user_name,
9841  password,
9842  finish,
9843  };
9844 
9845  struct connect_info {
9846  std::size_t header_len;
9847  char connect_flag;
9848  std::uint16_t keep_alive;
9849  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
9850  buffer client_id;
9851  std::vector<v5::property_variant> will_props;
9852  buffer will_topic;
9853  buffer will_payload;
9854  MQTT_NS::optional<buffer> user_name;
9855  MQTT_NS::optional<buffer> password;
9856  };
9857 
9858  void process_connect(
9859  async_handler_t func,
9860  bool all_read,
9861  this_type_sp self
9862  ) {
9863  static constexpr std::size_t const header_len =
9864  2 + // string length
9865  4 + // "MQTT" string
9866  1 + // ProtocolVersion
9867  1 + // ConnectFlag
9868  2; // KeepAlive
9869 
9870  if (remaining_length_ < header_len) {
9871  call_protocol_error_handlers(func);
9872  return;
9873  }
9874 
9875  connect_info info;
9876  info.header_len = header_len;
9877 
9878  process_header(
9879  std::move(func),
9880  all_read,
9881  header_len,
9882  &this_type::process_connect_impl,
9883  connect_phase::header,
9884  std::move(info),
9885  std::move(self)
9886  );
9887  }
9888 
9889  void process_connect_impl(
9890  async_handler_t func,
9891  buffer buf,
9892  connect_phase phase,
9893  connect_info&& info,
9894  this_type_sp self
9895  ) {
9896  switch (phase) {
9897  case connect_phase::header: {
9898  static constexpr char protocol_name[] = { 0x00, 0x04, 'M', 'Q', 'T', 'T' };
9899  if (std::memcmp(buf.data(), protocol_name, sizeof(protocol_name)) != 0) {
9900  call_protocol_error_handlers(func);
9901  return;
9902  }
9903  std::size_t i = sizeof(protocol_name);
9904  auto version = static_cast<protocol_version>(buf[i++]);
9905  if (version != protocol_version::v3_1_1 && version != protocol_version::v5) {
9906  if (func) {
9907  func(
9908  boost::system::errc::make_error_code(
9909  boost::system::errc::protocol_not_supported
9910  )
9911  );
9912  }
9913  return;
9914  }
9915 
9916  if (version_ == protocol_version::undetermined) {
9917  version_ = version;
9918  }
9919  else if (version_ != version) {
9920  if (func) {
9921  func(
9922  boost::system::errc::make_error_code(
9923  boost::system::errc::protocol_not_supported
9924  )
9925  );
9926  }
9927  return;
9928  }
9929 
9930  info.connect_flag = buf[i++];
9931 
9932  info.keep_alive = make_uint16_t(buf[i], buf[i + 1]);
9933  clean_session_ = connect_flags::has_clean_session(info.connect_flag);
9934 
9935  buf.remove_prefix(info.header_len); // consume buffer
9936  process_connect_impl(
9937  std::move(func),
9938  std::move(buf),
9939  [&] {
9940  if (version_ == protocol_version::v5) {
9941  return connect_phase::properties;
9942  }
9943  return connect_phase::client_id;
9944  } (),
9945  std::move(info),
9946  std::move(self)
9947  );
9948  } break;
9949  case connect_phase::properties:
9950  process_properties(
9951  std::move(func),
9952  std::move(buf),
9953  [
9954  this,
9955  info = std::move(info)
9956  ]
9957  (
9958  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
9959  buffer buf,
9960  async_handler_t func,
9961  this_type_sp self
9962  ) mutable {
9963  info.props = std::move(props);
9964  process_connect_impl(
9965  std::move(func),
9966  std::move(buf),
9967  connect_phase::client_id,
9968  std::move(info),
9969  std::move(self)
9970  );
9971  },
9972  std::move(self)
9973  );
9974  break;
9975  case connect_phase::client_id:
9976  process_string(
9977  std::move(func),
9978  std::move(buf),
9979  [
9980  this,
9981  info = std::move(info)
9982  ]
9983  (buffer client_id, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
9984  info.client_id = std::move(client_id);
9985  auto connect_flag = info.connect_flag;
9986  process_connect_impl(
9987  std::move(func),
9988  std::move(buf),
9989  [&] {
9990  if (connect_flags::has_will_flag(connect_flag)) {
9991  return connect_phase::will;
9992  }
9993  if (connect_flags::has_user_name_flag(connect_flag)) {
9994  return connect_phase::user_name;
9995  }
9996  if (connect_flags::has_password_flag(connect_flag)) {
9997  return connect_phase::password;
9998  }
9999  return connect_phase::finish;
10000  } (),
10001  std::move(info),
10002  std::move(self)
10003  );
10004  },
10005  std::move(self)
10006  );
10007  break;
10008  case connect_phase::will: {
10009  // I use rvalue reference parameter to reduce move constructor calling.
10010  // This is a local lambda expression invoked from this function, so
10011  // I can control all callers.
10012  auto topic_message_proc =
10013  [this]
10014  (
10015  async_handler_t&& func,
10016  buffer&& buf,
10017  connect_info&& info,
10018  this_type_sp&& self
10019  ) mutable {
10020  process_string(
10021  std::move(func),
10022  std::move(buf),
10023  [
10024  this,
10025  info = std::move(info)
10026  ]
10027  (buffer will_topic, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10028  info.will_topic = std::move(will_topic);
10029  process_binary(
10030  std::move(func),
10031  std::move(buf),
10032  [
10033  this,
10034  info = std::move(info)
10035  ]
10036  (buffer will_payload, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10037  info.will_payload = std::move(will_payload);
10038  auto connect_flag = info.connect_flag;
10039  process_connect_impl(
10040  std::move(func),
10041  std::move(buf),
10042  [&] {
10043  if (connect_flags::has_user_name_flag(connect_flag)) {
10044  return connect_phase::user_name;
10045  }
10046  if (connect_flags::has_password_flag(connect_flag)) {
10047  return connect_phase::password;
10048  }
10049  return connect_phase::finish;
10050  } (),
10051  std::move(info),
10052  std::move(self)
10053  );
10054  },
10055  std::move(self)
10056  );
10057  },
10058  std::move(self)
10059  );
10060  };
10061 
10062  if (version_ == protocol_version::v5) {
10063  process_properties(
10064  std::move(func),
10065  std::move(buf),
10066  [
10067  info = std::move(info),
10068  topic_message_proc
10069  ]
10070  (std::vector<v5::property_variant> will_props, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10071  info.will_props = std::move(will_props);
10072  topic_message_proc(
10073  std::move(func),
10074  std::move(buf),
10075  std::move(info),
10076  std::move(self)
10077  );
10078  },
10079  std::move(self)
10080  );
10081  return;
10082  }
10083  topic_message_proc(
10084  std::move(func),
10085  std::move(buf),
10086  std::move(info),
10087  std::move(self)
10088  );
10089  } break;
10090  case connect_phase::user_name:
10091  process_string(
10092  std::move(func),
10093  std::move(buf),
10094  [
10095  this,
10096  info = std::move(info)
10097  ]
10098  (buffer user_name, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10099  info.user_name = std::move(user_name);
10100  auto connect_flag = info.connect_flag;
10101  process_connect_impl(
10102  std::move(func),
10103  std::move(buf),
10104  [&] {
10105  if (connect_flags::has_password_flag(connect_flag)) {
10106  return connect_phase::password;
10107  }
10108  return connect_phase::finish;
10109  } (),
10110  std::move(info),
10111  std::move(self)
10112  );
10113  },
10114  std::move(self)
10115  );
10116  break;
10117  case connect_phase::password:
10118  process_binary(
10119  std::move(func),
10120  std::move(buf),
10121  [
10122  this,
10123  info = std::move(info)
10124  ]
10125  (buffer password, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10126  info.password = std::move(password);
10127  process_connect_impl(
10128  std::move(func),
10129  std::move(buf),
10130  connect_phase::finish,
10131  std::move(info),
10132  std::move(self)
10133  );
10134  },
10135  std::move(self)
10136  );
10137  break;
10138  case connect_phase::finish:
10139  mqtt_connected_ = true;
10140  switch (version_) {
10141  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
10142  if (h_connect_) {
10143  if (!h_connect_(
10144  std::move(info.client_id),
10145  std::move(info.user_name),
10146  std::move(info.password),
10147  [&] () -> optional<will> {
10148  if (connect_flags::has_will_flag(info.connect_flag)) {
10149  return
10150  will(
10151  std::move(info.will_topic),
10152  std::move(info.will_payload),
10153  connect_flags::has_will_retain(info.connect_flag),
10154  connect_flags::will_qos(info.connect_flag)
10155  );
10156  }
10157  return MQTT_NS::nullopt;
10158  } (),
10159  clean_session_,
10160  info.keep_alive
10161  )
10162  ) {
10163  return;
10164  }
10165  }
10166  h_mqtt_message_processed_(std::move(func));
10167  break;
10168  case protocol_version::v5:
10169  if (h_v5_connect_) {
10170  if (!h_v5_connect_(
10171  std::move(info.client_id),
10172  std::move(info.user_name),
10173  std::move(info.password),
10174  [&] () -> optional<will> {
10175  if (connect_flags::has_will_flag(info.connect_flag)) {
10176  return
10177  will(
10178  std::move(info.will_topic),
10179  std::move(info.will_payload),
10180  connect_flags::has_will_retain(info.connect_flag),
10181  connect_flags::will_qos(info.connect_flag),
10182  std::move(info.will_props)
10183  );
10184  }
10185  return MQTT_NS::nullopt;
10186  } (),
10187  clean_session_,
10188  info.keep_alive,
10189  std::move(info.props)
10190  )
10191  ) {
10192  return;
10193  }
10194  }
10195  h_mqtt_message_processed_(std::move(func));
10196  break;
10197  default:
10198  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
10199  }
10200  break;
10201  }
10202  }
10203 
10204  // process connack
10205 
10206  enum class connack_phase {
10207  header,
10208  properties,
10209  finish,
10210  };
10211 
10212  struct connack_info {
10213  std::size_t header_len;
10214  bool session_present;
10215  std::uint8_t reason_code;
10216  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
10217  };
10218 
10219  void process_connack(
10220  async_handler_t func,
10221  bool all_read,
10222  this_type_sp self
10223  ) {
10224  static constexpr std::size_t const header_len =
10225  1 + // Connect Acknowledge Flags
10226  1; // Reason Code
10227 
10228  if (remaining_length_ < header_len) {
10229  call_protocol_error_handlers(func);
10230  return;
10231  }
10232 
10233  connack_info info;
10234  info.header_len = header_len;
10235  process_header(
10236  std::move(func),
10237  all_read,
10238  header_len,
10239  &this_type::process_connack_impl,
10240  connack_phase::header,
10241  std::move(info),
10242  std::move(self)
10243  );
10244  }
10245 
10246  void process_connack_impl(
10247  async_handler_t func,
10248  buffer buf,
10249  connack_phase phase,
10250  connack_info&& info,
10251  this_type_sp self
10252  ) {
10253  switch (phase) {
10254  case connack_phase::header:
10255  info.session_present = is_session_present(buf[0]);
10256  info.reason_code = static_cast<std::uint8_t>(buf[1]);
10257 
10258  buf.remove_prefix(info.header_len); // consume buffer
10259  process_connack_impl(
10260  std::move(func),
10261  std::move(buf),
10262  [&] {
10263  if (version_ == protocol_version::v5) {
10264  return connack_phase::properties;
10265  }
10266  return connack_phase::finish;
10267  } (),
10268  std::move(info),
10269  std::move(self)
10270  );
10271  break;
10272  case connack_phase::properties:
10273  process_properties(
10274  std::move(func),
10275  std::move(buf),
10276  [
10277  this,
10278  info = std::move(info)
10279  ]
10280  (std::vector<v5::property_variant> props, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10281  info.props = std::move(props);
10282  process_connack_impl(
10283  std::move(func),
10284  std::move(buf),
10285  connack_phase::finish,
10286  std::move(info),
10287  std::move(self)
10288  );
10289  },
10290  std::move(self)
10291  );
10292  break;
10293  case connack_phase::finish: {
10294  mqtt_connected_ = true;
10295  // I use rvalue reference parameter to reduce move constructor calling.
10296  // This is a local lambda expression invoked from this function, so
10297  // I can control all callers.
10298  auto connack_proc =
10299  [this]
10300  (
10301  async_handler_t&& func,
10302  connack_info&& info
10303  ) mutable {
10304 
10305  switch (version_) {
10306  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
10307  if (h_connack_) {
10308  if (!h_connack_(info.session_present, info.reason_code)) {
10309  return;
10310  }
10311  }
10312  h_mqtt_message_processed_(std::move(func));
10313  break;
10314  case protocol_version::v5:
10315  if (h_v5_connack_) {
10316  if (!h_v5_connack_(info.session_present, info.reason_code, std::move(info.props))) {
10317  return;
10318  }
10319  }
10320  h_mqtt_message_processed_(std::move(func));
10321  break;
10322  default:
10323  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
10324  }
10325  };
10326 
10327  if (info.reason_code == v5::reason_code::success) {
10328  if (clean_session_) {
10329  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
10330  store_.clear();
10331  packet_id_.clear();
10332  }
10333  else {
10334  if (async_send_store_) {
10335  // Store and replace mqtt_message_processed handler
10336  // Until all stored messages are written to internal send buffer,
10337  // stop the next async read.
10338  auto org = get_mqtt_message_processed_handler();
10339  set_mqtt_message_processed_handler(
10340  []
10341  (async_handler_t) {
10342  }
10343  );
10344 
10345  auto async_connack_proc =
10346  [
10347  this,
10348  self = std::move(self),
10349  func = std::move(func),
10350  connack_proc = std::move(connack_proc),
10351  org = std::move(org),
10352  info = std::move(info)
10353  ]
10354  () mutable {
10355  // All stored messages are sent, then restore the original handler
10356  // and do the connack process. If it returns true, read the next mqtt message.
10357  set_mqtt_message_processed_handler(std::move(org));
10358  connack_proc(std::move(func), std::move(info));
10359  };
10360  async_send_store(std::move(async_connack_proc));
10361  return;
10362  }
10363  send_store();
10364  }
10365  }
10366  connack_proc(std::move(func), std::move(info));
10367  } break;
10368  }
10369  }
10370 
10371  // process publish
10372 
10373  enum class publish_phase {
10374  topic_name,
10375  packet_id,
10376  properties,
10377  payload,
10378  };
10379 
10380  struct publish_info {
10381  buffer topic_name;
10382  MQTT_NS::optional<packet_id_t> packet_id;
10383  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
10384  };
10385 
10386  void process_publish(
10387  async_handler_t func,
10388  bool all_read,
10389  this_type_sp self
10390  ) {
10391  std::size_t const min_len =
10392  2; // topic name length
10393 
10394  if (remaining_length_ < min_len) {
10395  call_protocol_error_handlers(func);
10396  return;
10397  }
10398 
10399  process_header(
10400  std::move(func),
10401  all_read,
10402  0,
10403  &this_type::process_publish_impl,
10404  publish_phase::topic_name,
10405  publish_info(),
10406  std::move(self)
10407  );
10408  }
10409 
10410  void process_publish_impl(
10411  async_handler_t func,
10412  buffer buf,
10413  publish_phase phase,
10414  publish_info&& info,
10415  this_type_sp self
10416  ) {
10417  switch (phase) {
10418  case publish_phase::topic_name:
10419  process_string(
10420  std::move(func),
10421  std::move(buf),
10422  [
10423  this,
10424  info = std::move(info)
10425  ]
10426  (buffer topic_name, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10427  info.topic_name = std::move(topic_name);
10428  auto qos = publish::get_qos(fixed_header_);
10429  if (qos != qos::at_most_once &&
10430  qos != qos::at_least_once &&
10431  qos != qos::exactly_once) {
10432  call_protocol_error_handlers(func);
10433  return;
10434  }
10435  process_publish_impl(
10436  std::move(func),
10437  std::move(buf),
10438  [&] {
10439  if (qos == qos::at_most_once) {
10440  if (version_ == protocol_version::v5) {
10441  return publish_phase::properties;
10442  }
10443  return publish_phase::payload;
10444  }
10445  return publish_phase::packet_id;
10446  } (),
10447  std::move(info),
10448  std::move(self)
10449  );
10450  },
10451  std::move(self)
10452  );
10453  break;
10454  case publish_phase::packet_id:
10455  process_packet_id(
10456  std::move(func),
10457  std::move(buf),
10458  [
10459  this,
10460  info = std::move(info)
10461  ]
10462  (packet_id_t packet_id, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10463  info.packet_id = packet_id;
10464  process_publish_impl(
10465  std::move(func),
10466  std::move(buf),
10467  [&] {
10468  if (version_ == protocol_version::v5) {
10469  return publish_phase::properties;
10470  }
10471  return publish_phase::payload;
10472  } (),
10473  std::move(info),
10474  std::move(self)
10475  );
10476 
10477  },
10478  std::move(self)
10479  );
10480  break;
10481  case publish_phase::properties:
10482  process_properties(
10483  std::move(func),
10484  std::move(buf),
10485  [
10486  this,
10487  info = std::move(info)
10488  ]
10489  (std::vector<v5::property_variant> props, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10490  info.props = std::move(props);
10491  process_publish_impl(
10492  std::move(func),
10493  std::move(buf),
10494  publish_phase::payload,
10495  std::move(info),
10496  std::move(self)
10497  );
10498  },
10499  std::move(self)
10500  );
10501  break;
10502  case publish_phase::payload:
10503  process_nbytes(
10504  std::move(func),
10505  std::move(buf),
10506  remaining_length_,
10507  [
10508  this,
10509  info = std::move(info)
10510  ]
10511  (buffer payload, buffer /*buf*/, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp /*self*/) mutable {
10512  auto handler_call =
10513  [&] {
10514  switch (version_) {
10515  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
10516  if (h_publish_) {
10517  if (!h_publish_(fixed_header_, info.packet_id, std::move(info.topic_name), std::move(payload))) {
10518  return false;
10519  }
10520  }
10521  h_mqtt_message_processed_(std::move(func));
10522  break;
10523  case protocol_version::v5:
10524  if (h_v5_publish_) {
10525  if (!h_v5_publish_(
10526  fixed_header_,
10527  info.packet_id,
10528  std::move(info.topic_name),
10529  std::move(payload),
10530  std::move(info.props)
10531  )
10532  ) {
10533  return false;
10534  }
10535  }
10536  h_mqtt_message_processed_(std::move(func));
10537  break;
10538  default:
10539  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
10540  }
10541  return true;
10542  };
10543  switch (publish::get_qos(fixed_header_)) {
10544  case qos::at_most_once:
10545  handler_call();
10546  break;
10547  case qos::at_least_once:
10548  if (handler_call()) {
10549  auto_pub_response(
10550  [this, &info] {
10551  if (connected_) {
10552  send_puback(*info.packet_id);
10553  }
10554  },
10555  [this, &info, &func] {
10556  if (connected_) {
10557  async_send_puback(
10558  *info.packet_id,
10559  MQTT_NS::nullopt,
10560  std::vector<v5::property_variant>{},
10561  func
10562  );
10563  }
10564  }
10565  );
10566  }
10567  break;
10568  case qos::exactly_once:
10569  if (handler_call()) {
10570  qos2_publish_handled_.emplace(*info.packet_id);
10571  auto_pub_response(
10572  [this, &info] {
10573  if (connected_) {
10574  send_pubrec(*info.packet_id);
10575  }
10576  },
10577  [this, &info, &func] {
10578  if (connected_) {
10579  async_send_pubrec(
10580  *info.packet_id,
10581  MQTT_NS::nullopt,
10582  std::vector<v5::property_variant>{},
10583  func
10584  );
10585  }
10586  }
10587  );
10588  }
10589  break;
10590  }
10591  },
10592  std::move(self)
10593  );
10594  break;
10595  }
10596  }
10597 
10598  // process puback
10599 
10600  enum class puback_phase {
10601  packet_id,
10602  reason_code,
10603  properties,
10604  finish,
10605  };
10606 
10607  struct puback_info {
10608  packet_id_t packet_id;
10609  std::uint8_t reason_code;
10610  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
10611  };
10612 
10613  void process_puback(
10614  async_handler_t func,
10615  bool all_read,
10616  this_type_sp self
10617  ) {
10618  std::size_t const header_len =
10619  sizeof(packet_id_t); // Packet Id
10620 
10621  if (remaining_length_ < header_len) {
10622  call_protocol_error_handlers(func);
10623  return;
10624  }
10625 
10626  puback_info info;
10627  process_header(
10628  std::move(func),
10629  all_read,
10630  header_len,
10631  &this_type::process_puback_impl,
10632  puback_phase::packet_id,
10633  std::move(info),
10634  std::move(self)
10635  );
10636  }
10637 
10638  void process_puback_impl(
10639  async_handler_t func,
10640  buffer buf,
10641  puback_phase phase,
10642  puback_info&& info,
10643  this_type_sp self
10644  ) {
10645  switch (phase) {
10646  case puback_phase::packet_id:
10647  process_packet_id(
10648  std::move(func),
10649  std::move(buf),
10650  [
10651  this,
10652  info = std::move(info)
10653  ]
10654  (packet_id_t packet_id, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10655  info.packet_id = packet_id;
10656  process_puback_impl(
10657  std::move(func),
10658  std::move(buf),
10659  [&] {
10660  if (remaining_length_ == 0) {
10661  info.reason_code = v5::reason_code::success;
10662  return puback_phase::finish;
10663  }
10664  return puback_phase::reason_code;
10665  } (),
10666  std::move(info),
10667  std::move(self)
10668  );
10669  },
10670  std::move(self)
10671  );
10672  break;
10673  case puback_phase::reason_code:
10674  process_nbytes(
10675  std::move(func),
10676  std::move(buf),
10677  1, // reason_code
10678  [
10679  this,
10680  info = std::move(info)
10681  ]
10682  (buffer body, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10683  info.reason_code = static_cast<std::uint8_t>(body[0]);
10684  process_puback_impl(
10685  std::move(func),
10686  std::move(buf),
10687  puback_phase::properties,
10688  std::move(info),
10689  std::move(self)
10690  );
10691  },
10692  std::move(self)
10693  );
10694  break;
10695  case puback_phase::properties:
10696  process_properties(
10697  std::move(func),
10698  std::move(buf),
10699  [
10700  this,
10701  info = std::move(info)
10702  ]
10703  (std::vector<v5::property_variant> props, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10704  info.props = std::move(props);
10705  process_puback_impl(
10706  std::move(func),
10707  std::move(buf),
10708  puback_phase::finish,
10709  std::move(info),
10710  std::move(self)
10711  );
10712  },
10713  std::move(self)
10714  );
10715  break;
10716  case puback_phase::finish:
10717  {
10718  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
10719  auto& idx = store_.template get<tag_packet_id_type>();
10720  auto r = idx.equal_range(std::make_tuple(info.packet_id, control_packet_type::puback));
10721  idx.erase(std::get<0>(r), std::get<1>(r));
10722  packet_id_.erase(info.packet_id);
10723  }
10724  if (h_serialize_remove_) h_serialize_remove_(info.packet_id);
10725  switch (version_) {
10726  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
10727  if (h_puback_) {
10728  if (!h_puback_(info.packet_id)) {
10729  return;
10730  }
10731  }
10732  h_mqtt_message_processed_(std::move(func));
10733  break;
10734  case protocol_version::v5:
10735  if (h_v5_puback_) {
10736  if (!h_v5_puback_(info.packet_id, info.reason_code, std::move(info.props))) {
10737  return;
10738  }
10739  }
10740  h_mqtt_message_processed_(std::move(func));
10741  break;
10742  default:
10743  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
10744  }
10745  break;
10746  }
10747  }
10748 
10749  // process pubrec
10750 
10751  enum class pubrec_phase {
10752  packet_id,
10753  reason_code,
10754  properties,
10755  finish,
10756  };
10757 
10758  struct pubrec_info {
10759  packet_id_t packet_id;
10760  std::uint8_t reason_code;
10761  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
10762  };
10763 
10764  void process_pubrec(
10765  async_handler_t func,
10766  bool all_read,
10767  this_type_sp self
10768  ) {
10769  std::size_t const header_len =
10770  sizeof(packet_id_t); // Packet Id
10771 
10772  if (remaining_length_ < header_len) {
10773  call_protocol_error_handlers(func);
10774  return;
10775  }
10776 
10777  pubrec_info info;
10778  process_header(
10779  std::move(func),
10780  all_read,
10781  header_len,
10782  &this_type::process_pubrec_impl,
10783  pubrec_phase::packet_id,
10784  std::move(info),
10785  std::move(self)
10786  );
10787  }
10788 
10789  void process_pubrec_impl(
10790  async_handler_t func,
10791  buffer buf,
10792  pubrec_phase phase,
10793  pubrec_info&& info,
10794  this_type_sp self
10795  ) {
10796  switch (phase) {
10797  case pubrec_phase::packet_id:
10798  process_packet_id(
10799  std::move(func),
10800  std::move(buf),
10801  [
10802  this,
10803  info = std::move(info)
10804  ]
10805  (packet_id_t packet_id, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10806  info.packet_id = packet_id;
10807  process_pubrec_impl(
10808  std::move(func),
10809  std::move(buf),
10810  [&] {
10811  if (remaining_length_ == 0) {
10812  info.reason_code = v5::reason_code::success;
10813  return pubrec_phase::finish;
10814  }
10815  return pubrec_phase::reason_code;
10816  } (),
10817  std::move(info),
10818  std::move(self)
10819  );
10820  },
10821  std::move(self)
10822  );
10823  break;
10824  case pubrec_phase::reason_code:
10825  process_nbytes(
10826  std::move(func),
10827  std::move(buf),
10828  1, // reason_code
10829  [
10830  this,
10831  info = std::move(info)
10832  ]
10833  (buffer body, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10834  info.reason_code = static_cast<std::uint8_t>(body[0]);
10835  process_pubrec_impl(
10836  std::move(func),
10837  std::move(buf),
10838  pubrec_phase::properties,
10839  std::move(info),
10840  std::move(self)
10841  );
10842  },
10843  std::move(self)
10844  );
10845  break;
10846  case pubrec_phase::properties:
10847  process_properties(
10848  std::move(func),
10849  std::move(buf),
10850  [
10851  this,
10852  info = std::move(info)
10853  ]
10854  (std::vector<v5::property_variant> props, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10855  info.props = std::move(props);
10856  process_pubrec_impl(
10857  std::move(func),
10858  std::move(buf),
10859  pubrec_phase::finish,
10860  std::move(info),
10861  std::move(self)
10862  );
10863  },
10864  std::move(self)
10865  );
10866  break;
10867  case pubrec_phase::finish: {
10868  {
10869  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
10870  auto& idx = store_.template get<tag_packet_id_type>();
10871  auto r = idx.equal_range(std::make_tuple(info.packet_id, control_packet_type::pubrec));
10872  idx.erase(std::get<0>(r), std::get<1>(r));
10873  // packet_id shouldn't be erased here.
10874  // It is reused for pubrel/pubcomp.
10875  }
10876  auto res =
10877  [&] {
10878  auto_pub_response(
10879  [&] {
10880  if (connected_) {
10881  send_pubrel(info.packet_id);
10882  }
10883  else {
10884  store_pubrel(info.packet_id);
10885  }
10886  },
10887  [&] {
10888  if (connected_) {
10889  async_send_pubrel(
10890  info.packet_id,
10891  MQTT_NS::nullopt,
10892  std::vector<v5::property_variant>{},
10893  func
10894  );
10895  }
10896  else {
10897  store_pubrel(info.packet_id);
10898  }
10899  }
10900  );
10901  };
10902  switch (version_) {
10903  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
10904  if (h_pubrec_) {
10905  if (!h_pubrec_(info.packet_id)) {
10906  return;
10907  }
10908  }
10909  res();
10910  h_mqtt_message_processed_(std::move(func));
10911  break;
10912  case protocol_version::v5:
10913  if (h_v5_pubrec_) {
10914  if (!h_v5_pubrec_(info.packet_id, info.reason_code, std::move(info.props))) {
10915  return;
10916  }
10917  }
10918  res();
10919  h_mqtt_message_processed_(std::move(func));
10920  break;
10921  default:
10922  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
10923  }
10924  } break;
10925  }
10926  }
10927 
10928  // process pubrel
10929 
10930  enum class pubrel_phase {
10931  packet_id,
10932  reason_code,
10933  properties,
10934  finish,
10935  };
10936 
10937  struct pubrel_info {
10938  packet_id_t packet_id;
10939  std::uint8_t reason_code;
10940  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
10941  };
10942 
10943  void process_pubrel(
10944  async_handler_t func,
10945  bool all_read,
10946  this_type_sp self
10947  ) {
10948  std::size_t const header_len =
10949  sizeof(packet_id_t); // Packet Id
10950 
10951  if (remaining_length_ < header_len) {
10952  call_protocol_error_handlers(func);
10953  return;
10954  }
10955 
10956  pubrel_info info;
10957  process_header(
10958  std::move(func),
10959  all_read,
10960  header_len,
10961  &this_type::process_pubrel_impl,
10962  pubrel_phase::packet_id,
10963  std::move(info),
10964  std::move(self)
10965  );
10966  }
10967 
10968  void process_pubrel_impl(
10969  async_handler_t func,
10970  buffer buf,
10971  pubrel_phase phase,
10972  pubrel_info&& info,
10973  this_type_sp self
10974  ) {
10975  switch (phase) {
10976  case pubrel_phase::packet_id:
10977  process_packet_id(
10978  std::move(func),
10979  std::move(buf),
10980  [
10981  this,
10982  info = std::move(info)
10983  ]
10984  (packet_id_t packet_id, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
10985  info.packet_id = packet_id;
10986  process_pubrel_impl(
10987  std::move(func),
10988  std::move(buf),
10989  [&] {
10990  if (remaining_length_ == 0) {
10991  info.reason_code = v5::reason_code::success;
10992  return pubrel_phase::finish;
10993  }
10994  return pubrel_phase::reason_code;
10995  } (),
10996  std::move(info),
10997  std::move(self)
10998  );
10999  },
11000  std::move(self)
11001  );
11002  break;
11003  case pubrel_phase::reason_code:
11004  process_nbytes(
11005  std::move(func),
11006  std::move(buf),
11007  1, // reason_code
11008  [
11009  this,
11010  info = std::move(info)
11011  ]
11012  (buffer body, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
11013  info.reason_code = static_cast<std::uint8_t>(body[0]);
11014  process_pubrel_impl(
11015  std::move(func),
11016  std::move(buf),
11017  pubrel_phase::properties,
11018  std::move(info),
11019  std::move(self)
11020  );
11021  },
11022  std::move(self)
11023  );
11024  break;
11025  case pubrel_phase::properties:
11026  process_properties(
11027  std::move(func),
11028  std::move(buf),
11029  [
11030  this,
11031  info = std::move(info)
11032  ]
11033  (std::vector<v5::property_variant> props, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
11034  info.props = std::move(props);
11035  process_pubrel_impl(
11036  std::move(func),
11037  std::move(buf),
11038  pubrel_phase::finish,
11039  std::move(info),
11040  std::move(self)
11041  );
11042  },
11043  std::move(self)
11044  );
11045  break;
11046  case pubrel_phase::finish: {
11047  auto res =
11048  [&] {
11049  auto_pub_response(
11050  [&] {
11051  if (connected_) {
11052  send_pubcomp(info.packet_id);
11053  }
11054  },
11055  [&] {
11056  if (connected_) {
11057  async_send_pubcomp(
11058  info.packet_id,
11059  MQTT_NS::nullopt,
11060  std::vector<v5::property_variant>{},
11061  func
11062  );
11063  }
11064  }
11065  );
11066  };
11067  qos2_publish_handled_.erase(info.packet_id);
11068  switch (version_) {
11069  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
11070  if (h_pubrel_) {
11071  if (!h_pubrel_(info.packet_id)) {
11072  return;
11073  }
11074  }
11075  res();
11076  h_mqtt_message_processed_(std::move(func));
11077  break;
11078  case protocol_version::v5:
11079  if (h_v5_pubrel_) {
11080  if (!h_v5_pubrel_(info.packet_id, info.reason_code, std::move(info.props))) {
11081  return;
11082  }
11083  }
11084  res();
11085  h_mqtt_message_processed_(std::move(func));
11086  break;
11087  default:
11088  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11089  }
11090  } break;
11091  }
11092  }
11093 
11094  // process pubcomp
11095 
11096  enum class pubcomp_phase {
11097  packet_id,
11098  reason_code,
11099  properties,
11100  finish,
11101  };
11102 
11103  struct pubcomp_info {
11104  packet_id_t packet_id;
11105  std::uint8_t reason_code;
11106  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
11107  };
11108 
11109  void process_pubcomp(
11110  async_handler_t func,
11111  bool all_read,
11112  this_type_sp self
11113  ) {
11114  std::size_t const header_len =
11115  sizeof(packet_id_t); // Packet Id
11116 
11117  if (remaining_length_ < header_len) {
11118  call_protocol_error_handlers(func);
11119  return;
11120  }
11121 
11122  pubcomp_info info;
11123  process_header(
11124  std::move(func),
11125  all_read,
11126  header_len,
11127  &this_type::process_pubcomp_impl,
11128  pubcomp_phase::packet_id,
11129  std::move(info),
11130  std::move(self)
11131  );
11132  }
11133 
11134  void process_pubcomp_impl(
11135  async_handler_t func,
11136  buffer buf,
11137  pubcomp_phase phase,
11138  pubcomp_info&& info,
11139  this_type_sp self
11140  ) {
11141  switch (phase) {
11142  case pubcomp_phase::packet_id:
11143  process_packet_id(
11144  std::move(func),
11145  std::move(buf),
11146  [
11147  this,
11148  info = std::move(info)
11149  ]
11150  (packet_id_t packet_id, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
11151  info.packet_id = packet_id;
11152  process_pubcomp_impl(
11153  std::move(func),
11154  std::move(buf),
11155  [&] {
11156  if (remaining_length_ == 0) {
11157  info.reason_code = v5::reason_code::success;
11158  return pubcomp_phase::finish;
11159  }
11160  return pubcomp_phase::reason_code;
11161  } (),
11162  std::move(info),
11163  std::move(self)
11164  );
11165  },
11166  std::move(self)
11167  );
11168  break;
11169  case pubcomp_phase::reason_code:
11170  process_nbytes(
11171  std::move(func),
11172  std::move(buf),
11173  1, // reason_code
11174  [
11175  this,
11176  info = std::move(info)
11177  ]
11178  (buffer body, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
11179  info.reason_code = static_cast<std::uint8_t>(body[0]);
11180  process_pubcomp_impl(
11181  std::move(func),
11182  std::move(buf),
11183  pubcomp_phase::properties,
11184  std::move(info),
11185  std::move(self)
11186  );
11187  },
11188  std::move(self)
11189  );
11190  break;
11191  case pubcomp_phase::properties:
11192  process_properties(
11193  std::move(func),
11194  std::move(buf),
11195  [
11196  this,
11197  info = std::move(info)
11198  ]
11199  (std::vector<v5::property_variant> props, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
11200  info.props = std::move(props);
11201  process_pubcomp_impl(
11202  std::move(func),
11203  std::move(buf),
11204  pubcomp_phase::finish,
11205  std::move(info),
11206  std::move(self)
11207  );
11208  },
11209  std::move(self)
11210  );
11211  break;
11212  case pubcomp_phase::finish:
11213  {
11214  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
11215  auto& idx = store_.template get<tag_packet_id_type>();
11216  auto r = idx.equal_range(std::make_tuple(info.packet_id, control_packet_type::pubcomp));
11217  idx.erase(std::get<0>(r), std::get<1>(r));
11218  // packet_id shouldn't be erased here.
11219  // It is reused for pubrel/pubcomp.
11220  }
11221  if (h_serialize_remove_) h_serialize_remove_(info.packet_id);
11222  switch (version_) {
11223  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
11224  if (h_pubcomp_) {
11225  if (!h_pubcomp_(info.packet_id)) {
11226  return;
11227  }
11228  }
11229  h_mqtt_message_processed_(std::move(func));
11230  break;
11231  case protocol_version::v5:
11232  if (h_v5_pubcomp_) {
11233  if (!h_v5_pubcomp_(info.packet_id, info.reason_code, std::move(info.props))) {
11234  return;
11235  }
11236  }
11237  h_mqtt_message_processed_(std::move(func));
11238  break;
11239  default:
11240  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11241  }
11242  break;
11243  }
11244  }
11245 
11246  // process subscribe
11247 
11248  enum class subscribe_phase {
11249  packet_id,
11250  properties,
11251  topic,
11252  finish,
11253  };
11254 
11255  struct subscribe_info {
11256  packet_id_t packet_id;
11257  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
11258  std::vector<std::tuple<buffer, std::uint8_t>> entries;
11259  };
11260 
11261  void process_subscribe(
11262  async_handler_t func,
11263  bool all_read,
11264  this_type_sp self
11265  ) {
11266  std::size_t const header_len =
11267  sizeof(packet_id_t); // Packet Id
11268 
11269  if (remaining_length_ < header_len) {
11270  call_protocol_error_handlers(func);
11271  return;
11272  }
11273 
11274  subscribe_info info;
11275  process_header(
11276  std::move(func),
11277  all_read,
11278  header_len,
11279  &this_type::process_subscribe_impl,
11280  subscribe_phase::packet_id,
11281  std::move(info),
11282  std::move(self)
11283  );
11284  }
11285 
11286  void process_subscribe_impl(
11287  async_handler_t func,
11288  buffer buf,
11289  subscribe_phase phase,
11290  subscribe_info&& info,
