11291  this_type_sp self
11292  ) {
11293  switch (phase) {
11294  case subscribe_phase::packet_id:
11295  process_packet_id(
11296  std::move(func),
11297  std::move(buf),
11298  [
11299  this,
11300  info = std::move(info)
11301  ]
11302  (packet_id_t packet_id, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
11303  info.packet_id = packet_id;
11304  process_subscribe_impl(
11305  std::move(func),
11306  std::move(buf),
11307  [&] {
11308  if (version_ == protocol_version::v5) {
11309  return subscribe_phase::properties;
11310  }
11311  return subscribe_phase::topic;
11312  } (),
11313  std::move(info),
11314  std::move(self)
11315  );
11316  },
11317  std::move(self)
11318  );
11319  break;
11320  case subscribe_phase::properties:
11321  process_properties(
11322  std::move(func),
11323  std::move(buf),
11324  [
11325  this,
11326  info = std::move(info)
11327  ]
11328  (std::vector<v5::property_variant> props, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
11329  info.props = std::move(props);
11330  process_subscribe_impl(
11331  std::move(func),
11332  std::move(buf),
11333  subscribe_phase::topic,
11334  std::move(info),
11335  std::move(self)
11336  );
11337  },
11338  std::move(self)
11339  );
11340  break;
11341  case subscribe_phase::topic:
11342  process_string(
11343  std::move(func),
11344  std::move(buf),
11345  [
11346  this,
11347  info = std::move(info)
11348  ]
11349  (buffer topic_filter, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
11350  process_nbytes(
11351  std::move(func),
11352  std::move(buf),
11353  1, // requested_qos
11354  [
11355  this,
11356  info = std::move(info),
11357  topic_filter = std::move(topic_filter)
11358  ]
11359  (buffer body, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
11360  auto requested_qos = static_cast<std::uint8_t>(body[0]);
11361  if (requested_qos != qos::at_most_once &&
11362  requested_qos != qos::at_least_once &&
11363  requested_qos != qos::exactly_once) {
11364  call_protocol_error_handlers(func);
11365  return;
11366  }
11367  info.entries.emplace_back(std::move(topic_filter), requested_qos);
11368  process_subscribe_impl(
11369  std::move(func),
11370  std::move(buf),
11371  [&] {
11372  if (remaining_length_ == 0) {
11373  return subscribe_phase::finish;
11374  }
11375  return subscribe_phase::topic;
11376  } (),
11377  std::move(info),
11378  std::move(self)
11379  );
11380  },
11381  std::move(self)
11382  );
11383  },
11384  std::move(self)
11385  );
11386  break;
11387  case subscribe_phase::finish:
11388  switch (version_) {
11389  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
11390  if (h_subscribe_) {
11391  if (!h_subscribe_(info.packet_id, std::move(info.entries))) {
11392  return;
11393  }
11394  }
11395  h_mqtt_message_processed_(std::move(func));
11396  break;
11397  case protocol_version::v5:
11398  if (h_v5_subscribe_) {
11399  if (!h_v5_subscribe_(info.packet_id, std::move(info.entries), std::move(info.props))) {
11400  return;
11401  }
11402  }
11403  h_mqtt_message_processed_(std::move(func));
11404  break;
11405  default:
11406  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11407  }
11408  break;
11409  }
11410  }
11411 
11412  // process suback
11413 
11414  enum class suback_phase {
11415  packet_id,
11416  properties,
11417  reasons,
11418  };
11419 
11420  struct suback_info {
11421  packet_id_t packet_id;
11422  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
11423  };
11424 
11425  void process_suback(
11426  async_handler_t func,
11427  bool all_read,
11428  this_type_sp self
11429  ) {
11430  std::size_t const header_len =
11431  sizeof(packet_id_t); // Packet Id
11432 
11433  if (remaining_length_ < header_len) {
11434  call_protocol_error_handlers(func);
11435  return;
11436  }
11437 
11438  suback_info info;
11439  process_header(
11440  std::move(func),
11441  all_read,
11442  header_len,
11443  &this_type::process_suback_impl,
11444  suback_phase::packet_id,
11445  std::move(info),
11446  std::move(self)
11447  );
11448  }
11449 
11450  void process_suback_impl(
11451  async_handler_t func,
11452  buffer buf,
11453  suback_phase phase,
11454  suback_info&& info,
11455  this_type_sp self
11456  ) {
11457  switch (phase) {
11458  case suback_phase::packet_id:
11459  process_packet_id(
11460  std::move(func),
11461  std::move(buf),
11462  [
11463  this,
11464  info = std::move(info)
11465  ]
11466  (packet_id_t packet_id, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
11467  info.packet_id = packet_id;
11468  process_suback_impl(
11469  std::move(func),
11470  std::move(buf),
11471  [&] {
11472  if (version_ == protocol_version::v5) {
11473  return suback_phase::properties;
11474  }
11475  return suback_phase::reasons;
11476  } (),
11477  std::move(info),
11478  std::move(self)
11479  );
11480  },
11481  std::move(self)
11482  );
11483  break;
11484  case suback_phase::properties:
11485  process_properties(
11486  std::move(func),
11487  std::move(buf),
11488  [
11489  this,
11490  info = std::move(info)
11491  ]
11492  (std::vector<v5::property_variant> props, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
11493  info.props = std::move(props);
11494  process_suback_impl(
11495  std::move(func),
11496  std::move(buf),
11497  suback_phase::reasons,
11498  std::move(info),
11499  std::move(self)
11500  );
11501  },
11502  std::move(self)
11503  );
11504  break;
11505  case suback_phase::reasons:
11506  process_nbytes(
11507  std::move(func),
11508  std::move(buf),
11509  remaining_length_, // Reason Codes
11510  [
11511  this,
11512  info = std::move(info)
11513  ]
11514  (buffer body, buffer /*buf*/, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp /*self*/) mutable {
11515  {
11516  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
11517  packet_id_.erase(info.packet_id);
11518  }
11519  switch (version_) {
11520  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
11521  if (h_suback_) {
11522  std::vector<MQTT_NS::optional<std::uint8_t>> results;
11523  results.resize(body.size());
11524  std::transform(
11525  body.begin(),
11526  body.end(),
11527  results.begin(),
11528  [&](auto const& e) -> MQTT_NS::optional<std::uint8_t> {
11529  if (e & variable_length_continue_flag) {
11530  return MQTT_NS::nullopt;
11531  }
11532  else {
11533  return static_cast<std::uint8_t>(e);
11534  }
11535  }
11536  );
11537  if (!h_suback_(info.packet_id, std::move(results))) {
11538  return;
11539  }
11540  }
11541  h_mqtt_message_processed_(std::move(func));
11542  break;
11543  case protocol_version::v5:
11544  if (h_v5_suback_) {
11545  std::vector<std::uint8_t> reasons;
11546  reasons.resize(body.size());
11547  std::transform(
11548  body.begin(),
11549  body.end(),
11550  reasons.begin(),
11551  [&](auto const& e) {
11552  return static_cast<uint8_t>(e);
11553  }
11554  );
11555  if (!h_v5_suback_(info.packet_id, std::move(reasons), std::move(info.props))) {
11556  return;
11557  }
11558  }
11559  h_mqtt_message_processed_(std::move(func));
11560  break;
11561  default:
11562  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11563  }
11564  },
11565  std::move(self)
11566  );
11567  break;
11568  }
11569  }
11570 
11571  // process unsubscribe
11572 
11573  enum class unsubscribe_phase {
11574  packet_id,
11575  properties,
11576  topic,
11577  finish,
11578  };
11579 
11580  struct unsubscribe_info {
11581  packet_id_t packet_id;
11582  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
11583  std::vector<buffer> entries;
11584  };
11585 
11586  void process_unsubscribe(
11587  async_handler_t func,
11588  bool all_read,
11589  this_type_sp self
11590  ) {
11591  std::size_t const header_len =
11592  sizeof(packet_id_t); // Packet Id
11593 
11594  if (remaining_length_ < header_len) {
11595  call_protocol_error_handlers(func);
11596  return;
11597  }
11598 
11599  unsubscribe_info info;
11600  process_header(
11601  std::move(func),
11602  all_read,
11603  header_len,
11604  &this_type::process_unsubscribe_impl,
11605  unsubscribe_phase::packet_id,
11606  std::move(info),
11607  std::move(self)
11608  );
11609  }
11610 
11611  void process_unsubscribe_impl(
11612  async_handler_t func,
11613  buffer buf,
11614  unsubscribe_phase phase,
11615  unsubscribe_info&& info,
11616  this_type_sp self
11617  ) {
11618  switch (phase) {
11619  case unsubscribe_phase::packet_id:
11620  process_packet_id(
11621  std::move(func),
11622  std::move(buf),
11623  [
11624  this,
11625  info = std::move(info)
11626  ]
11627  (packet_id_t packet_id, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
11628  info.packet_id = packet_id;
11629  process_unsubscribe_impl(
11630  std::move(func),
11631  std::move(buf),
11632  [&] {
11633  if (version_ == protocol_version::v5) {
11634  return unsubscribe_phase::properties;
11635  }
11636  return unsubscribe_phase::topic;
11637  } (),
11638  std::move(info),
11639  std::move(self)
11640  );
11641  },
11642  std::move(self)
11643  );
11644  break;
11645  case unsubscribe_phase::properties:
11646  process_properties(
11647  std::move(func),
11648  std::move(buf),
11649  [
11650  this,
11651  info = std::move(info)
11652  ]
11653  (std::vector<v5::property_variant> props, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
11654  info.props = std::move(props);
11655  process_unsubscribe_impl(
11656  std::move(func),
11657  std::move(buf),
11658  unsubscribe_phase::topic,
11659  std::move(info),
11660  std::move(self)
11661  );
11662  },
11663  std::move(self)
11664  );
11665  break;
11666  case unsubscribe_phase::topic:
11667  process_string(
11668  std::move(func),
11669  std::move(buf),
11670  [
11671  this,
11672  info = std::move(info)
11673  ]
11674  (buffer topic_filter, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
11675  info.entries.emplace_back(std::move(topic_filter));
11676  process_unsubscribe_impl(
11677  std::move(func),
11678  std::move(buf),
11679  [&] {
11680  if (remaining_length_ == 0) {
11681  return unsubscribe_phase::finish;
11682  }
11683  return unsubscribe_phase::topic;
11684  } (),
11685  std::move(info),
11686  std::move(self)
11687  );
11688  },
11689  std::move(self)
11690  );
11691  break;
11692  case unsubscribe_phase::finish:
11693  switch (version_) {
11694  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
11695  if (h_unsubscribe_) {
11696  if (!h_unsubscribe_(info.packet_id, std::move(info.entries))) {
11697  return;
11698  }
11699  }
11700  h_mqtt_message_processed_(std::move(func));
11701  break;
11702  case protocol_version::v5:
11703  if (h_v5_unsubscribe_) {
11704  if (!h_v5_unsubscribe_(info.packet_id, std::move(info.entries), std::move(info.props))) {
11705  return;
11706  }
11707  }
11708  h_mqtt_message_processed_(std::move(func));
11709  break;
11710  default:
11711  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11712  }
11713  break;
11714  }
11715  }
11716 
11717  // process unsuback
11718 
11719  enum class unsuback_phase {
11720  packet_id,
11721  properties,
11722  reasons,
11723  };
11724 
11725  struct unsuback_info {
11726  packet_id_t packet_id;
11727  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
11728  };
11729 
11730  void process_unsuback(
11731  async_handler_t func,
11732  bool all_read,
11733  this_type_sp self
11734  ) {
11735  std::size_t const header_len =
11736  sizeof(packet_id_t); // Packet Id
11737 
11738  if (remaining_length_ < header_len) {
11739  call_protocol_error_handlers(func);
11740  return;
11741  }
11742 
11743  unsuback_info info;
11744  process_header(
11745  std::move(func),
11746  all_read,
11747  header_len,
11748  &this_type::process_unsuback_impl,
11749  unsuback_phase::packet_id,
11750  std::move(info),
11751  std::move(self)
11752  );
11753  }
11754 
11755  void process_unsuback_impl(
11756  async_handler_t func,
11757  buffer buf,
11758  unsuback_phase phase,
11759  unsuback_info&& info,
11760  this_type_sp self
11761  ) {
11762  switch (phase) {
11763  case unsuback_phase::packet_id:
11764  process_packet_id(
11765  std::move(func),
11766  std::move(buf),
11767  [
11768  this,
11769  info = std::move(info)
11770  ]
11771  (packet_id_t packet_id, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
11772  info.packet_id = packet_id;
11773  {
11774  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
11775  packet_id_.erase(info.packet_id);
11776  }
11777  switch (version_) {
11778  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
11779  if (h_unsuback_) {
11780  if (!h_unsuback_(info.packet_id)) {
11781  return;
11782  }
11783  }
11784  h_mqtt_message_processed_(std::move(func));
11785  break;
11786  case protocol_version::v5:
11787  process_unsuback_impl(
11788  std::move(func),
11789  std::move(buf),
11790  unsuback_phase::properties,
11791  std::move(info),
11792  std::move(self)
11793  );
11794  break;
11795  default:
11796  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
11797  }
11798  },
11799  std::move(self)
11800  );
11801  break;
11802  case unsuback_phase::properties:
11803  process_properties(
11804  std::move(func),
11805  std::move(buf),
11806  [
11807  this,
11808  info = std::move(info)
11809  ]
11810  (std::vector<v5::property_variant> props, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
11811  info.props = std::move(props);
11812  process_unsuback_impl(
11813  std::move(func),
11814  std::move(buf),
11815  unsuback_phase::reasons,
11816  std::move(info),
11817  std::move(self)
11818  );
11819  },
11820  std::move(self)
11821  );
11822  break;
11823  case unsuback_phase::reasons:
11824  process_nbytes(
11825  std::move(func),
11826  std::move(buf),
11827  remaining_length_, // Reason Codes
11828  [
11829  this,
11830  info = std::move(info)
11831  ]
11832  (buffer body, buffer /*buf*/, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp /*self*/) mutable {
11833  BOOST_ASSERT(version_ == protocol_version::v5);
11834  {
11835  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
11836  packet_id_.erase(info.packet_id);
11837  }
11838  if (h_v5_unsuback_) {
11839  std::vector<std::uint8_t> reasons;
11840  reasons.resize(body.size());
11841  std::transform(
11842  body.begin(),
11843  body.end(),
11844  reasons.begin(),
11845  [&](auto const& e) {
11846  return static_cast<uint8_t>(e);
11847  }
11848  );
11849  if (!h_v5_unsuback_(info.packet_id, std::move(reasons), std::move(info.props))) {
11850  return;
11851  }
11852  h_mqtt_message_processed_(std::move(func));
11853  }
11854  },
11855  std::move(self)
11856  );
11857  break;
11858  }
11859  }
11860 
11861  // process pingreq
11862 
11863  void process_pingreq(
11864  async_handler_t func
11865  ) {
11866  std::size_t const header_len = 0;
11867 
11868  if (remaining_length_ != header_len) {
11869  call_protocol_error_handlers(func);
11870  return;
11871  }
11872  if (h_pingreq_) {
11873  if (!h_pingreq_()) return;
11874  }
11875  h_mqtt_message_processed_(std::move(func));
11876  }
11877 
11878  // process pingresp
11879 
11880  void process_pingresp(
11881  async_handler_t func
11882  ) {
11883  std::size_t const header_len = 0;
11884 
11885  if (remaining_length_ != header_len) {
11886  call_protocol_error_handlers(func);
11887  return;
11888  }
11889  if (h_pingresp_) {
11890  if (!h_pingresp_()) return;
11891  }
11892  h_mqtt_message_processed_(std::move(func));
11893  }
11894 
11895  // process disconnect
11896 
11897  enum class disconnect_phase {
11898  reason_code,
11899  properties,
11900  finish,
11901  };
11902 
11903  struct disconnect_info {
11904  std::uint8_t reason_code;
11905  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
11906  };
11907 
11908  void process_disconnect(
11909  async_handler_t func,
11910  bool all_read,
11911  this_type_sp self
11912  ) {
11913  if (remaining_length_ == 0) {
11914  disconnect_info info { v5::reason_code::normal_disconnection, std::vector<v5::property_variant>() };
11915  process_disconnect_impl(
11916  std::move(func),
11917  buffer(),
11918  disconnect_phase::finish,
11919  std::move(info),
11920  std::move(self)
11921  );
11922  return;
11923  }
11924 
11925  if (version_ != protocol_version::v5) {
11926  call_protocol_error_handlers(func);
11927  return;
11928  }
11929 
11930  std::size_t const header_len =
11931  1; // Reason Code
11932 
11933  if (remaining_length_ < header_len) {
11934  call_protocol_error_handlers(func);
11935  return;
11936  }
11937 
11938  disconnect_info info;
11939  process_header(
11940  std::move(func),
11941  all_read,
11942  header_len,
11943  &this_type::process_disconnect_impl,
11944  disconnect_phase::reason_code,
11945  std::move(info),
11946  std::move(self)
11947  );
11948  }
11949 
11950  void process_disconnect_impl(
11951  async_handler_t func,
11952  buffer buf,
11953  disconnect_phase phase,
11954  disconnect_info&& info,
11955  this_type_sp self
11956  ) {
11957  switch (phase) {
11958  case disconnect_phase::reason_code:
11959  process_nbytes(
11960  std::move(func),
11961  std::move(buf),
11962  1, // reason_code
11963  [
11964  this,
11965  info = std::move(info)
11966  ]
11967  (buffer body, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
11968  info.reason_code = static_cast<std::uint8_t>(body[0]);
11969  process_disconnect_impl(
11970  std::move(func),
11971  std::move(buf),
11972  disconnect_phase::properties,
11973  std::move(info),
11974  std::move(self)
11975  );
11976  },
11977  std::move(self)
11978  );
11979  break;
11980  case disconnect_phase::properties:
11981  process_properties(
11982  std::move(func),
11983  std::move(buf),
11984  [
11985  this,
11986  info = std::move(info)
11987  ]
11988  (std::vector<v5::property_variant> props, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
11989  info.props = std::move(props);
11990  process_disconnect_impl(
11991  std::move(func),
11992  std::move(buf),
11993  disconnect_phase::finish,
11994  std::move(info),
11995  std::move(self)
11996  );
11997  },
11998  std::move(self)
11999  );
12000  break;
12001  case disconnect_phase::finish:
12002  switch (version_) {
12003  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12004  if (h_disconnect_) {
12005  h_disconnect_();
12006  }
12007  break;
12008  case protocol_version::v5:
12009  if (h_v5_disconnect_) {
12010  h_v5_disconnect_(info.reason_code, std::move(info.props));
12011  }
12012  break;
12013  default:
12014  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12015  }
12016  break;
12017  }
12018  }
12019 
12020  // process auth
12021 
12022  enum class auth_phase {
12023  reason_code,
12024  properties,
12025  finish,
12026  };
12027 
12028  struct auth_info {
12029  std::uint8_t reason_code;
12030  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props;
12031  };
12032 
12033  void process_auth(
12034  async_handler_t func,
12035  bool all_read,
12036  this_type_sp self
12037  ) {
12038  if (version_ != protocol_version::v5) {
12039  call_protocol_error_handlers(func);
12040  return;
12041  }
12042 
12043  if (remaining_length_ == 0) {
12044  auth_info info { v5::reason_code::success, std::vector<v5::property_variant>() };
12045  process_auth_impl(
12046  std::move(func),
12047  buffer(),
12048  auth_phase::finish,
12049  std::move(info),
12050  std::move(self)
12051  );
12052  return;
12053  }
12054 
12055  std::size_t const header_len =
12056  1; // Reason Code
12057 
12058  if (remaining_length_ < header_len) {
12059  call_protocol_error_handlers(func);
12060  return;
12061  }
12062 
12063  auth_info info;
12064  process_header(
12065  std::move(func),
12066  all_read,
12067  header_len,
12068  &this_type::process_auth_impl,
12069  auth_phase::reason_code,
12070  std::move(info),
12071  std::move(self)
12072  );
12073  }
12074 
12075  void process_auth_impl(
12076  async_handler_t func,
12077  buffer buf,
12078  auth_phase phase,
12079  auth_info&& info,
12080  this_type_sp self
12081  ) {
12082  switch (phase) {
12083  case auth_phase::reason_code:
12084  process_nbytes(
12085  std::move(func),
12086  std::move(buf),
12087  1, // reason_code
12088  [
12089  this,
12090  info = std::move(info)
12091  ]
12092  (buffer body, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
12093  info.reason_code = static_cast<std::uint8_t>(body[0]);
12094  process_auth_impl(
12095  std::move(func),
12096  std::move(buf),
12097  auth_phase::properties,
12098  std::move(info),
12099  std::move(self)
12100  );
12101  },
12102  std::move(self)
12103  );
12104  break;
12105  case auth_phase::properties:
12106  process_properties(
12107  std::move(func),
12108  std::move(buf),
12109  [
12110  this,
12111  info = std::move(info)
12112  ]
12113  (std::vector<v5::property_variant> props, buffer buf, async_handler_t func, this_type_sp self) mutable {
12114  info.props = std::move(props);
12115  process_auth_impl(
12116  std::move(func),
12117  std::move(buf),
12118  auth_phase::finish,
12119  std::move(info),
12120  std::move(self)
12121  );
12122  },
12123  std::move(self)
12124  );
12125  break;
12126  case auth_phase::finish:
12127  BOOST_ASSERT(version_ == protocol_version::v5);
12128  if (h_v5_auth_) {
12129  if (!h_v5_auth_(info.reason_code, std::move(info.props))) {
12130  return;
12131  }
12132  }
12133  h_mqtt_message_processed_(std::move(func));
12134  break;
12135  }
12136  }
12137 
12138  template <typename F, typename AF>
12139  void auto_pub_response(F const& f, AF const& af) {
12140  if (auto_pub_response_) {
12141  if (auto_pub_response_async_) af();
12142  else f();
12143  }
12144  }
12145 
12146  // Blocking senders.
12147  void send_connect(
12148  std::string const& client_id,
12149  MQTT_NS::optional<std::string> const& user_name,
12150  MQTT_NS::optional<std::string> const& password,
12151  MQTT_NS::optional<will> const& w,
12152  std::uint16_t keep_alive_sec,
12153  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props
12154  ) {
12155  switch (version_) {
12156  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12157  do_sync_write(
12158  v3_1_1::connect_message(
12159  keep_alive_sec,
12160  client_id,
12161  clean_session_,
12162  w,
12163  user_name,
12164  password
12165  )
12166  );
12167  break;
12168  case protocol_version::v5:
12169  do_sync_write(
12170  v5::connect_message(
12171  keep_alive_sec,
12172  client_id,
12173  clean_session_,
12174  w,
12175  user_name,
12176  password,
12177  std::move(props)
12178  )
12179  );
12180  break;
12181  default:
12182  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12183  break;
12184  }
12185  }
12186 
12187  void send_connack(
12188  bool session_present,
12189  std::uint8_t reason_code,
12190  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props
12191  ) {
12192  switch (version_) {
12193  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12194  do_sync_write(
12195  v3_1_1::connack_message(
12196  session_present,
12197  reason_code
12198  )
12199  );
12200  break;
12201  case protocol_version::v5:
12202  do_sync_write(
12203  v5::connack_message(
12204  session_present,
12205  reason_code,
12206  std::move(props)
12207  )
12208  );
12209  break;
12210  default:
12211  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12212  break;
12213  }
12214  }
12215 
12216  void send_publish(
12217  as::const_buffer topic_name,
12218  std::uint8_t qos,
12219  bool retain,
12220  bool dup,
12221  packet_id_t packet_id,
12222  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
12223  as::const_buffer payload,
12224  MQTT_NS::any life_keeper) {
12225 
12226  auto msg =
12227  basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes>(
12228  topic_name,
12229  qos,
12230  retain,
12231  dup,
12232  packet_id,
12233  payload
12234  );
12235 
12236  auto do_send_publish =
12237  [&](auto msg, auto const& serialize_publish) {
12238 
12239  if (qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once) {
12240  auto store_msg = msg;
12241  store_msg.set_dup(true);
12242  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
12243  store_.emplace(
12244  packet_id,
12245  qos == qos::at_least_once
12246  ? control_packet_type::puback
12247  : control_packet_type::pubrec,
12248  store_msg,
12249  std::move(life_keeper)
12250  );
12251  if (serialize_publish) {
12252  serialize_publish(store_msg);
12253  }
12254  }
12255  do_sync_write(msg);
12256  };
12257 
12258  switch (version_) {
12259  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12260  do_send_publish(
12261  v3_1_1::basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes>(
12262  topic_name,
12263  qos,
12264  retain,
12265  dup,
12266  packet_id,
12267  payload
12268  ),
12269  h_serialize_publish_
12270  );
12271  break;
12272  case protocol_version::v5:
12273  do_send_publish(
12274  v5::basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes>(
12275  topic_name,
12276  qos,
12277  retain,
12278  dup,
12279  packet_id,
12280  std::move(props),
12281  payload
12282  ),
12283  h_serialize_v5_publish_
12284  );
12285  break;
12286  default:
12287  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12288  break;
12289  }
12290  }
12291 
12292  void send_puback(
12293  packet_id_t packet_id,
12294  MQTT_NS::optional<std::uint8_t> reason = MQTT_NS::nullopt,
12295  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
12296  ) {
12297  switch (version_) {
12298  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12299  do_sync_write(v3_1_1::basic_puback_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id));
12300  break;
12301  case protocol_version::v5:
12302  do_sync_write(v5::basic_puback_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id, reason, std::move(props)));
12303  break;
12304  default:
12305  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12306  break;
12307  }
12308 
12309  if (h_pub_res_sent_) h_pub_res_sent_(packet_id);
12310  }
12311 
12312  void send_pubrec(
12313  packet_id_t packet_id,
12314  MQTT_NS::optional<std::uint8_t> reason = MQTT_NS::nullopt,
12315  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
12316  ) {
12317  switch (version_) {
12318  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12319  do_sync_write(v3_1_1::basic_pubrec_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id));
12320  break;
12321  case protocol_version::v5:
12322  do_sync_write(v5::basic_pubrec_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id, reason, std::move(props)));
12323  break;
12324  default:
12325  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12326  break;
12327  }
12328  }
12329 
12330  void send_pubrel(
12331  packet_id_t packet_id,
12332  MQTT_NS::optional<std::uint8_t> reason = MQTT_NS::nullopt,
12333  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {},
12334  MQTT_NS::any life_keeper = MQTT_NS::any()
12335  ) {
12336 
12337  auto impl =
12338  [&](auto msg, auto const& serialize) {
12339  {
12340  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
12341 
12342  // insert if not registerd (start from pubrel sending case)
12343  packet_id_.insert(packet_id);
12344 
12345  auto ret = store_.emplace(
12346  packet_id,
12347  control_packet_type::pubcomp,
12348  msg,
12349  std::move(life_keeper)
12350  );
12351  BOOST_ASSERT(ret.second);
12352  }
12353 
12354  if (serialize) {
12355  serialize(msg);
12356  }
12357  do_sync_write(std::move(msg));
12358  };
12359 
12360  switch (version_) {
12361  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12362  impl(
12363  v3_1_1::basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id),
12364  h_serialize_pubrel_
12365  );
12366  break;
12367  case protocol_version::v5:
12368  impl(
12369  v5::basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id, reason, std::move(props)),
12370  h_serialize_v5_pubrel_
12371  );
12372  break;
12373  default:
12374  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12375  break;
12376  }
12377  }
12378 
12379  void store_pubrel(
12380  packet_id_t packet_id,
12381  MQTT_NS::optional<std::uint8_t> reason = MQTT_NS::nullopt,
12382  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
12383  ) {
12384 
12385  auto impl =
12386  [&](auto msg, auto const& serialize) {
12387  {
12388  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
12389 
12390  // insert if not registerd (start from pubrel sending case)
12391  packet_id_.insert(packet_id);
12392 
12393  auto ret = store_.emplace(
12394  packet_id,
12395  control_packet_type::pubcomp,
12396  msg
12397  );
12398  BOOST_ASSERT(ret.second);
12399  }
12400 
12401  if (serialize) {
12402  serialize(std::move(msg));
12403  }
12404  };
12405 
12406  switch (version_) {
12407  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12408  impl(
12409  v3_1_1::basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id),
12410  h_serialize_pubrel_
12411  );
12412  break;
12413  case protocol_version::v5:
12414  impl(
12415  v5::basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id, reason, std::move(props)),
12416  h_serialize_v5_pubrel_
12417  );
12418  break;
12419  default:
12420  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12421  break;
12422  }
12423  }
12424 
12425  void send_pubcomp(
12426  packet_id_t packet_id,
12427  MQTT_NS::optional<std::uint8_t> reason = MQTT_NS::nullopt,
12428  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
12429  ) {
12430  switch (version_) {
12431  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12432  do_sync_write(v3_1_1::basic_pubcomp_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id));
12433  break;
12434  case protocol_version::v5:
12435  do_sync_write(v5::basic_pubcomp_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id, reason, std::move(props)));
12436  break;
12437  default:
12438  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12439  break;
12440  }
12441 
12442  if (h_pub_res_sent_) h_pub_res_sent_(packet_id);
12443  }
12444 
12445  template <typename... Args>
12446  void send_subscribe(
12447  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> params,
12448  packet_id_t packet_id,
12449  as::const_buffer topic_name,
12450  std::uint8_t qos,
12451  Args&&... args) {
12452  params.emplace_back(topic_name, qos);
12453  send_subscribe(std::move(params), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
12454  }
12455 
12456  template <typename... Args>
12457  void send_subscribe(
12458  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> params,
12459  packet_id_t packet_id,
12460  MQTT_NS::string_view topic_name,
12461  std::uint8_t qos,
12462  Args&&... args) {
12463  params.emplace_back(as::buffer(topic_name.data(), topic_name.size()), qos);
12464  send_subscribe(std::move(params), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
12465  }
12466 
12467  void send_subscribe(
12468  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> params,
12469  packet_id_t packet_id,
12470  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
12471  ) {
12472  for(auto const& p : params)
12473  {
12474  BOOST_ASSERT(
12475  subscribe::get_qos(std::get<1>(p)) == qos::at_most_once ||
12476  subscribe::get_qos(std::get<1>(p)) == qos::at_least_once ||
12477  subscribe::get_qos(std::get<1>(p)) == qos::exactly_once
12478  );
12479  }
12480  switch (version_) {
12481  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12482  do_sync_write(v3_1_1::basic_subscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(std::move(params), packet_id));
12483  break;
12484  case protocol_version::v5:
12485  do_sync_write(v5::basic_subscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(std::move(params), packet_id, std::move(props)));
12486  break;
12487  default:
12488  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12489  break;
12490  }
12491  }
12492 
12493  template <typename... Args>
12494  void send_suback(
12495  std::vector<std::uint8_t> params,
12496  packet_id_t packet_id,
12497  std::uint8_t reason,
12498  Args&&... args) {
12499  params.push_back(reason);
12500  send_suback(std::move(params), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
12501  }
12502 
12503  void send_suback(
12504  std::vector<std::uint8_t> params,
12505  packet_id_t packet_id,
12506  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
12507  ) {
12508  switch (version_) {
12509  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12510  do_sync_write(v3_1_1::basic_suback_message<PacketIdBytes>(std::move(params), packet_id));
12511  break;
12512  case protocol_version::v5:
12513  do_sync_write(v5::basic_suback_message<PacketIdBytes>(std::move(params), packet_id, std::move(props)));
12514  break;
12515  default:
12516  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12517  break;
12518  }
12519  }
12520 
12521  template <typename... Args>
12522  void send_unsubscribe(
12523  std::vector<as::const_buffer> params,
12524  packet_id_t packet_id,
12525  as::const_buffer topic_name,
12526  Args&&... args) {
12527  params.emplace_back(topic_name);
12528  send_unsubscribe(std::move(params), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
12529  }
12530 
12531  template <typename... Args>
12532  void send_unsubscribe(
12533  std::vector<as::const_buffer> params,
12534  packet_id_t packet_id,
12535  MQTT_NS::string_view topic_name,
12536  Args&&... args) {
12537  params.emplace_back(as::buffer(topic_name.data(), topic_name.size()));
12538  send_unsubscribe(std::move(params), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
12539  }
12540 
12541  void send_unsubscribe(
12542  std::vector<as::const_buffer> params,
12543  packet_id_t packet_id,
12544  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
12545  ) {
12546  switch (version_) {
12547  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12548  do_sync_write(v3_1_1::basic_unsubscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(std::move(params), packet_id));
12549  break;
12550  case protocol_version::v5:
12551  do_sync_write(v5::basic_unsubscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(std::move(params), packet_id, std::move(props)));
12552  break;
12553  default:
12554  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12555  break;
12556  }
12557  }
12558 
12559  void send_unsuback(
12560  packet_id_t packet_id
12561  ) {
12562  switch (version_) {
12563  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12564  do_sync_write(v3_1_1::basic_unsuback_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id));
12565  break;
12566  case protocol_version::v5:
12567  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12568  break;
12569  default:
12570  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12571  break;
12572  }
12573  }
12574 
12575  template <typename... Args>
12576  void send_unsuback(
12577  std::vector<std::uint8_t> params,
12578  packet_id_t packet_id,
12579  std::uint8_t reason,
12580  Args&&... args) {
12581  params.push_back(reason);
12582  send_suback(std::move(params), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
12583  }
12584 
12585  void send_unsuback(
12586  std::vector<std::uint8_t> params,
12587  packet_id_t packet_id,
12588  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
12589  ) {
12590  switch (version_) {
12591  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12592  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12593  break;
12594  case protocol_version::v5:
12595  do_sync_write(v5::basic_unsuback_message<PacketIdBytes>(std::move(params), packet_id, std::move(props)));
12596  break;
12597  default:
12598  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12599  break;
12600  }
12601  }
12602 
12603  void send_pingreq() {
12604  switch (version_) {
12605  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12606  do_sync_write(v3_1_1::pingreq_message());
12607  break;
12608  case protocol_version::v5:
12609  do_sync_write(v5::pingreq_message());
12610  break;
12611  default:
12612  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12613  break;
12614  }
12615  }
12616 
12617  void send_pingresp() {
12618  switch (version_) {
12619  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12620  do_sync_write(v3_1_1::pingresp_message());
12621  break;
12622  case protocol_version::v5:
12623  do_sync_write(v5::pingresp_message());
12624  break;
12625  default:
12626  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12627  break;
12628  }
12629  }
12630 
12631  void send_auth(
12632  MQTT_NS::optional<std::uint8_t> reason = MQTT_NS::nullopt,
12633  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
12634  ) {
12635  switch (version_) {
12636  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12637  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12638  break;
12639  case protocol_version::v5:
12640  do_sync_write(v5::auth_message(reason, std::move(props)));
12641  break;
12642  default:
12643  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12644  break;
12645  }
12646  }
12647 
12648  void send_disconnect(
12649  MQTT_NS::optional<std::uint8_t> reason = MQTT_NS::nullopt,
12650  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props = {}
12651  ) {
12652  switch (version_) {
12653  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12654  do_sync_write(v3_1_1::disconnect_message());
12655  break;
12656  case protocol_version::v5:
12657  do_sync_write(v5::disconnect_message(reason, std::move(props)));
12658  break;
12659  default:
12660  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12661  break;
12662  }
12663  }
12664 
12665  void send_store() {
12666  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
12667  auto const& idx = store_.template get<tag_seq>();
12668  for (auto const& e : idx) {
12669  do_sync_write(e.message());
12670  }
12671  }
12672 
12673  // Blocking write
12674  template <typename MessageVariant>
12675  void do_sync_write(MessageVariant&& mv) {
12676  boost::system::error_code ec;
12677  if (!connected_) return;
12678  if (h_pre_send_) h_pre_send_();
12679  socket_->write(const_buffer_sequence<PacketIdBytes>(std::forward<MessageVariant>(mv)), ec);
12680  if (ec) handle_error(ec);
12681  }
12682 
12683  // Non blocking (async) senders
12684  void async_send_connect(
12685  std::string const& client_id,
12686  MQTT_NS::optional<std::string> const& user_name,
12687  MQTT_NS::optional<std::string> const& password,
12688  MQTT_NS::optional<will> const& w,
12689  bool clean_session,
12690  std::uint16_t keep_alive_sec,
12691  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
12692  async_handler_t func) {
12693 
12694  clean_session_ = clean_session;
12695 
12696  switch (version_) {
12697  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12698  do_async_write(
12699  v3_1_1::connect_message(
12700  keep_alive_sec,
12701  client_id,
12702  clean_session_,
12703  w,
12704  user_name,
12705  password
12706  ),
12707  std::move(func)
12708  );
12709  break;
12710  case protocol_version::v5:
12711  do_async_write(
12712  v5::connect_message(
12713  keep_alive_sec,
12714  client_id,
12715  clean_session_,
12716  w,
12717  user_name,
12718  password,
12719  std::move(props)
12720  ),
12721  std::move(func)
12722  );
12723  break;
12724  default:
12725  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12726  break;
12727  }
12728  }
12729 
12730  void async_send_connack(
12731  bool session_present,
12732  std::uint8_t reason_code,
12733  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
12734  async_handler_t func
12735  ) {
12736  switch (version_) {
12737  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12738  do_async_write(
12739  v3_1_1::connack_message(
12740  session_present,
12741  reason_code
12742  ),
12743  std::move(func)
12744  );
12745  break;
12746  case protocol_version::v5:
12747  do_async_write(
12748  v5::connack_message(
12749  session_present,
12750  reason_code,
12751  std::move(props)
12752  ),
12753  std::move(func)
12754  );
12755  break;
12756  default:
12757  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12758  break;
12759  }
12760  }
12761 
12762  void async_send_publish(
12763  as::const_buffer topic_name,
12764  std::uint8_t qos,
12765  bool retain,
12766  bool dup,
12767  packet_id_t packet_id,
12768  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
12769  as::const_buffer payload,
12770  async_handler_t func,
12771  MQTT_NS::any life_keeper) {
12772 
12773  auto do_async_send_publish =
12774  [&](auto msg, auto const& serialize_publish) {
12775  if (qos == qos::at_least_once || qos == qos::exactly_once) {
12776  auto store_msg = msg;
12777  store_msg.set_dup(true);
12778  {
12779  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
12780  auto ret = store_.emplace(
12781  packet_id,
12782  qos == qos::at_least_once ? control_packet_type::puback
12783  : control_packet_type::pubrec,
12784  store_msg,
12785  life_keeper
12786  );
12787  BOOST_ASSERT(ret.second);
12788  }
12789 
12790  if (serialize_publish) {
12791  serialize_publish(store_msg);
12792  }
12793  }
12794  do_async_write(
12795  std::move(msg),
12796  [life_keeper = std::move(life_keeper), func = std::move(func)](boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
12797  if (func) func(ec);
12798  }
12799  );
12800  };
12801 
12802  switch (version_) {
12803  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12804  do_async_send_publish(
12805  v3_1_1::basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes>(
12806  topic_name,
12807  qos,
12808  retain,
12809  dup,
12810  packet_id,
12811  payload
12812  ),
12813  h_serialize_publish_
12814  );
12815  break;
12816  case protocol_version::v5:
12817  do_async_send_publish(
12818  v5::basic_publish_message<PacketIdBytes>(
12819  topic_name,
12820  qos,
12821  retain,
12822  dup,
12823  packet_id,
12824  std::move(props),
12825  payload
12826  ),
12827  h_serialize_v5_publish_
12828  );
12829  break;
12830  default:
12831  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12832  break;
12833  }
12834  }
12835 
12836  void async_send_puback(
12837  packet_id_t packet_id,
12838  MQTT_NS::optional<std::uint8_t> reason,
12839  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
12840  async_handler_t func
12841  ) {
12842 
12843  auto impl =
12844  [&] (auto msg) {
12845  auto self = shared_from_this();
12846  do_async_write(
12847  std::move(msg),
12848  [this, self, packet_id, func = std::move(func)]
12849  (boost::system::error_code const& ec){
12850  if (func) func(ec);
12851  if (h_pub_res_sent_) h_pub_res_sent_(packet_id);
12852  }
12853  );
12854  };
12855 
12856  switch (version_) {
12857  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12858  impl(
12859  v3_1_1::basic_puback_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id)
12860  );
12861  break;
12862  case protocol_version::v5:
12863  impl(
12864  v5::basic_puback_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id, reason, std::move(props))
12865  );
12866  break;
12867  default:
12868  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12869  break;
12870  }
12871  }
12872 
12873  void async_send_pubrec(
12874  packet_id_t packet_id,
12875  MQTT_NS::optional<std::uint8_t> reason,
12876  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
12877  async_handler_t func
12878  ) {
12879  switch (version_) {
12880  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12881  do_async_write(
12882  v3_1_1::basic_pubrec_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id),
12883  std::move(func)
12884  );
12885  break;
12886  case protocol_version::v5:
12887  do_async_write(
12888  v5::basic_pubrec_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id, reason, std::move(props)),
12889  std::move(func)
12890  );
12891  break;
12892  default:
12893  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12894  break;
12895  }
12896  }
12897 
12898  void async_send_pubrel(
12899  packet_id_t packet_id,
12900  MQTT_NS::optional<std::uint8_t> reason,
12901  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
12902  async_handler_t func,
12903  MQTT_NS::any life_keeper = MQTT_NS::any()
12904  ) {
12905 
12906  auto msg = basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id);
12907 
12908  auto impl =
12909  [&](auto msg, auto const& serialize) {
12910  {
12911  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
12912 
12913  // insert if not registerd (start from pubrel sending case)
12914  packet_id_.insert(packet_id);
12915 
12916  auto ret = store_.emplace(
12917  packet_id,
12918  control_packet_type::pubcomp,
12919  msg
12920  );
12921  // publish store is erased when pubrec is received.
12922  // pubrel store is erased when pubcomp is received.
12923  // If invalid client send pubrec twice with the same packet id,
12924  // then send corresponding pubrel twice is a possible client/server
12925  // implementation.
12926  // In this case, overwrite store_.
12927  if (!ret.second) {
12928  store_.modify(
12929  ret.first,
12930  [&] (auto& e) {
12931  e = store(
12932  packet_id,
12933  control_packet_type::pubcomp,
12934  std::move(msg),
12935  life_keeper
12936  );
12937  }
12938  );
12939  }
12940  }
12941 
12942  if (serialize) {
12943  serialize(msg);
12944  }
12945  do_async_write(
12946  std::move(msg),
12947  [life_keeper = std::move(life_keeper), func = std::move(func)](boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
12948  if (func) func(ec);
12949  }
12950  );
12951  };
12952 
12953  switch (version_) {
12954  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12955  impl(
12956  v3_1_1::basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id),
12957  h_serialize_pubrel_
12958  );
12959  break;
12960  case protocol_version::v5:
12961  impl(
12962  v5::basic_pubrel_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id, reason, std::move(props)),
12963  h_serialize_v5_pubrel_
12964  );
12965  break;
12966  default:
12967  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
12968  break;
12969  }
12970  }
12971 
12972  void async_send_pubcomp(
12973  packet_id_t packet_id,
12974  MQTT_NS::optional<std::uint8_t> reason,
12975  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
12976  async_handler_t func
12977  ) {
12978  auto impl =
12979  [&] (auto msg) {
12980  auto self = shared_from_this();
12981  do_async_write(
12982  std::move(msg),
12983  [this, self = std::move(self), packet_id, func = std::move(func)]
12984  (boost::system::error_code const& ec){
12985  if (func) func(ec);
12986  if (h_pub_res_sent_) h_pub_res_sent_(packet_id);
12987  }
12988  );
12989  };
12990  switch (version_) {
12991  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
12992  impl(
12993  v3_1_1::basic_pubcomp_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id)
12994  );
12995  break;
12996  case protocol_version::v5:
12997  impl(
12998  v5::basic_pubcomp_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id, reason, std::move(props))
12999  );
13000  break;
13001  default:
13002  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
13003  break;
13004  }
13005  }
13006 
13007  template <typename... Args>
13008  void async_send_subscribe(
13009  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> params,
13010  MQTT_NS::any life_keepers,
13011  packet_id_t packet_id,
13012  as::const_buffer topic_name,
13013  std::uint8_t qos,
13014  Args&&... args) {
13015  params.emplace_back(topic_name, qos);
13016  async_send_subscribe(std::move(params), std::move(life_keepers), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
13017  }
13018 
13019  template <typename... Args>
13020  void async_send_subscribe(
13021  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> params,
13022  MQTT_NS::any life_keepers,
13023  packet_id_t packet_id,
13024  std::string topic_name,
13025  std::uint8_t qos,
13026  Args&&... args) {
13027 
13028  auto sp_topic = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
13029  params.emplace_back(as::buffer(*sp_topic), qos);
13030  async_send_subscribe(std::move(params), std::make_pair(std::move(life_keepers), std::move(sp_topic)), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
13031  }
13032 
13033  void async_send_subscribe(
13034  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> params,
13035  MQTT_NS::any life_keepers,
13036  packet_id_t packet_id,
13037  async_handler_t func) {
13038 
13039  switch (version_) {
13040  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
13041  do_async_write(
13042  v3_1_1::basic_subscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(std::move(params), packet_id),
13043  [life_keepers = std::move(life_keepers), func = std::move(func)]
13044  (boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
13045  if (func) func(ec);
13046  }
13047  );
13048  break;
13049  case protocol_version::v5:
13050  do_async_write(
13051  v5::basic_subscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(std::move(params), packet_id, {}),
13052  [life_keepers = std::move(life_keepers), func = std::move(func)]
13053  (boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
13054  if (func) func(ec);
13055  }
13056  );
13057  break;
13058  default:
13059  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
13060  break;
13061  }
13062  }
13063 
13064  void async_send_subscribe(
13065  std::vector<std::tuple<as::const_buffer, std::uint8_t>> params,
13066  MQTT_NS::any life_keepers,
13067  packet_id_t packet_id,
13068  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
13069  async_handler_t func) {
13070 
13071  switch (version_) {
13072  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
13073  do_async_write(
13074  v3_1_1::basic_subscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(std::move(params), packet_id),
13075  [life_keepers = std::move(life_keepers), func = std::move(func)]
13076  (boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
13077  if (func) func(ec);
13078  }
13079  );
13080  break;
13081  case protocol_version::v5:
13082  do_async_write(
13083  v5::basic_subscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(std::move(params), packet_id, std::move(props)),
13084  [life_keepers = std::move(life_keepers), func = std::move(func)]
13085  (boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
13086  if (func) func(ec);
13087  }
13088  );
13089  break;
13090  default:
13091  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
13092  break;
13093  }
13094  }
13095 
13096  template <typename... Args>
13097  void async_send_suback(
13098  std::vector<std::uint8_t> params,
13099  packet_id_t packet_id,
13100  std::uint8_t qos,
13101  Args&&... args) {
13102  params.push_back(qos);
13103  async_send_suback(std::move(params), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
13104  }
13105 
13106  void async_send_suback(
13107  std::vector<std::uint8_t> params,
13108  packet_id_t packet_id,
13109  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
13110  async_handler_t func
13111  ) {
13112  switch (version_) {
13113  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
13114  do_async_write(
13115  v3_1_1::basic_suback_message<PacketIdBytes>(std::move(params), packet_id), std::move(func)
13116  );
13117  break;
13118  case protocol_version::v5:
13119  do_async_write(
13120  v5::basic_suback_message<PacketIdBytes>(std::move(params), packet_id, std::move(props)), std::move(func)
13121  );
13122  break;
13123  default:
13124  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
13125  break;
13126  }
13127  }
13128 
13129  template <typename... Args>
13130  void async_send_unsubscribe(
13131  std::vector<as::const_buffer> params,
13132  MQTT_NS::any life_keepers,
13133  packet_id_t packet_id,
13134  as::const_buffer topic_name,
13135  Args&&... args) {
13136  params.emplace_back(topic_name);
13137  async_send_unsubscribe(std::move(params), std::move(life_keepers), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
13138  }
13139 
13140  template <typename... Args>
13141  void async_send_unsubscribe(
13142  std::vector<as::const_buffer> params,
13143  MQTT_NS::any life_keepers,
13144  packet_id_t packet_id,
13145  std::string topic_name,
13146  Args&&... args) {
13147 
13148  auto sp_topic = std::make_shared<std::string>(std::move(topic_name));
13149  params.emplace_back(as::buffer(*sp_topic));
13150  async_send_unsubscribe(std::move(params), std::make_pair(std::move(life_keepers), std::move(sp_topic)), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
13151  }
13152 
13153  void async_send_unsubscribe(
13154  std::vector<as::const_buffer> params,
13155  MQTT_NS::any life_keepers,
13156  packet_id_t packet_id,
13157  async_handler_t func) {
13158 
13159  switch (version_) {
13160  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
13161  do_async_write(
13162  v3_1_1::basic_unsubscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(
13163  std::move(params),
13164  packet_id
13165  ),
13166  [life_keepers = std::move(life_keepers), func = std::move(func)]
13167  (boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
13168  if (func) func(ec);
13169  }
13170  );
13171  break;
13172  case protocol_version::v5:
13173  do_async_write(
13174  v5::basic_unsubscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(
13175  std::move(params),
13176  packet_id,
13177  {}
13178  ),
13179  [life_keepers = std::move(life_keepers), func = std::move(func)]
13180  (boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
13181  if (func) func(ec);
13182  }
13183  );
13184  break;
13185  default:
13186  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
13187  break;
13188  }
13189  }
13190 
13191  void async_send_unsubscribe(
13192  std::vector<as::const_buffer> params,
13193  MQTT_NS::any life_keepers,
13194  packet_id_t packet_id,
13195  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
13196  async_handler_t func) {
13197 
13198  switch (version_) {
13199  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
13200  do_async_write(
13201  v3_1_1::basic_unsubscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(
13202  std::move(params),
13203  packet_id
13204  ),
13205  [life_keepers = std::move(life_keepers), func = std::move(func)]
13206  (boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
13207  if (func) func(ec);
13208  }
13209  );
13210  break;
13211  case protocol_version::v5:
13212  do_async_write(
13213  v5::basic_unsubscribe_message<PacketIdBytes>(
13214  std::move(params),
13215  packet_id,
13216  std::move(props)
13217  ),
13218  [life_keepers = std::move(life_keepers), func = std::move(func)]
13219  (boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
13220  if (func) func(ec);
13221  }
13222  );
13223  break;
13224  default:
13225  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
13226  break;
13227  }
13228  }
13229 
13230  void async_send_unsuback(
13231  packet_id_t packet_id, async_handler_t func) {
13232  switch (version_) {
13233  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
13234  do_async_write(
13235  v3_1_1::basic_unsuback_message<PacketIdBytes>(packet_id), std::move(func)
13236  );
13237  break;
13238  case protocol_version::v5:
13239  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
13240  break;
13241  default:
13242  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
13243  break;
13244  }
13245  }
13246 
13247  template <typename... Args>
13248  void async_send_unsuback(
13249  std::vector<std::uint8_t> params,
13250  packet_id_t packet_id,
13251  std::uint8_t qos,
13252  Args&&... args) {
13253  params.push_back(qos);
13254  async_send_unsuback(std::move(params), packet_id, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
13255  }
13256 
13257  void async_send_unsuback(
13258  std::vector<std::uint8_t> params,
13259  packet_id_t packet_id,
13260  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
13261  async_handler_t func
13262  ) {
13263  switch (version_) {
13264  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
13265  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
13266  break;
13267  case protocol_version::v5:
13268  do_async_write(
13269  v5::basic_unsuback_message<PacketIdBytes>(
13270  std::move(params),
13271  packet_id,
13272  std::move(props)
13273  ),
13274  std::move(func)
13275  );
13276  break;
13277  default:
13278  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
13279  break;
13280  }
13281  }
13282 
13283  void async_send_pingreq(async_handler_t func) {
13284  switch (version_) {
13285  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
13286  do_async_write(v3_1_1::pingreq_message(), std::move(func));
13287  break;
13288  case protocol_version::v5:
13289  do_async_write(v5::pingreq_message(), std::move(func));
13290  break;
13291  default:
13292  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
13293  break;
13294  }
13295  }
13296 
13297  void async_send_pingresp(async_handler_t func) {
13298  switch (version_) {
13299  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
13300  do_async_write(v3_1_1::pingresp_message(), std::move(func));
13301  break;
13302  case protocol_version::v5:
13303  do_async_write(v5::pingresp_message(), std::move(func));
13304  break;
13305  default:
13306  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
13307  break;
13308  }
13309  }
13310 
13311  void async_send_auth(
13312  std::uint8_t reason,
13313  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
13314  async_handler_t func
13315  ) {
13316  switch (version_) {
13317  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
13318  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
13319  break;
13320  case protocol_version::v5:
13321  do_async_write(v5::auth_message(reason, std::move(props)), std::move(func));
13322  break;
13323  default:
13324  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
13325  break;
13326  }
13327  }
13328 
13329  void async_send_disconnect(
13330  async_handler_t func
13331  ) {
13332  switch (version_) {
13333  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
13334  do_async_write(v3_1_1::disconnect_message(), std::move(func));
13335  break;
13336  case protocol_version::v5:
13337  do_async_write(v5::disconnect_message(MQTT_NS::nullopt, {}), std::move(func));
13338  break;
13339  default:
13340  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
13341  break;
13342  }
13343  }
13344 
13345  void async_send_disconnect(
13346  std::uint8_t reason,
13347  std::vector<v5::property_variant> props,
13348  async_handler_t func
13349  ) {
13350  switch (version_) {
13351  case protocol_version::v3_1_1:
13352  do_async_write(v3_1_1::disconnect_message(), std::move(func));
13353  break;
13354  case protocol_version::v5:
13355  do_async_write(v5::disconnect_message(reason, std::move(props)), std::move(func));
13356  break;
13357  default:
13358  BOOST_ASSERT(false);
13359  break;
13360  }
13361  }
13362 
13363  void async_send_store(std::function<void()> func) {
13364  auto g = shared_scope_guard(
13365  [func = std::move(func)] {
13366  func();
13367  }
13368  );
13369  LockGuard<Mutex> lck (store_mtx_);
13370  auto const& idx = store_.template get<tag_seq>();
13371  for (auto const& e : idx) {
13372  do_async_write(
13373  e.message(),
13374  [g]
13375  (boost::system::error_code const& /*ec*/) {
13376  }
13377  );
13378  }
13379  }
13380 
13381  // Non blocking (async) write
13382 
13383  class async_packet {
13384  public:
13385  async_packet(
13386  basic_message_variant<PacketIdBytes> mv,
13387  async_handler_t h = async_handler_t())
13388  : mv_(std::move(mv))
13389  , handler_(std::move(h)) {}
13390  basic_message_variant<PacketIdBytes> const& message() const {
13391  return mv_;
13392  }
13393  basic_message_variant<PacketIdBytes>& message() {
13394  return mv_;
13395  }
13396  async_handler_t const& handler() const { return handler_; }
13397  async_handler_t& handler() { return handler_; }
13398  private:
13399  basic_message_variant<PacketIdBytes> mv_;
13400  async_handler_t handler_;
13401  };
13402 
13403  struct write_completion_handler {
13404  write_completion_handler(
13405  std::shared_ptr<this_type> self,
13406  async_handler_t func,
13407  std::size_t num_of_messages,
13408  std::size_t expected)
13409  :self_(std::move(self)),
13410  func_(std::move(func)),
13411  num_of_messages_(num_of_messages),
13412  bytes_to_transfer_(expected)
13413  {}
13414  void operator()(boost::system::error_code const& ec) const {
13415  if (func_) func_(ec);
13416  for (std::size_t i = 0; i != num_of_messages_; ++i) {
13417  self_->queue_.pop_front();
13418  }
13419  if (ec || // Error is handled by async_read.
13420  !self_->connected_) {
13421  self_->connected_ = false;
13422  while (!self_->queue_.empty()) {
13423  self_->queue_.front().handler()(ec);
13424  self_->queue_.pop_front();
13425  }
13426  return;
13427  }
13428  if (!self_->queue_.empty()) {
13429  self_->do_async_write();
13430  }
13431  }
13432  void operator()(
13433  boost::system::error_code const& ec,
13434  std::size_t bytes_transferred) const {
13435  if (func_) func_(ec);
13436  for (std::size_t i = 0; i != num_of_messages_; ++i) {
13437  self_->queue_.pop_front();
13438  }
13439  if (ec || // Error is handled by async_read.
13440  !self_->connected_) {
13441  self_->connected_ = false;
13442  while (!self_->queue_.empty()) {
13443  self_->queue_.front().handler()(ec);
13444  self_->queue_.pop_front();
13445  }
13446  return;
13447  }
13448  if (bytes_to_transfer_ != bytes_transferred) {
13449  self_->connected_ = false;
13450  while (!self_->queue_.empty()) {
13451  self_->queue_.front().handler()(ec);
13452  self_->queue_.pop_front();
13453  }
13454  throw write_bytes_transferred_error(bytes_to_transfer_, bytes_transferred);
13455  }
13456  if (!self_->queue_.empty()) {
13457  self_->do_async_write();
13458  }
13459  }
13460  std::shared_ptr<this_type> self_;
13461  async_handler_t func_;
13462  std::size_t num_of_messages_;
13463  std::size_t bytes_to_transfer_;
13464  };
13465 
13466  void do_async_write() {
13467  // Only attempt to send up to the user specified maximum items
13468  using difference_t = typename decltype(queue_)::difference_type;
13469  std::size_t iterator_count = (max_queue_send_count_ == 0)
13470  ? queue_.size()
13471  : std::min(max_queue_send_count_, queue_.size());
13472  auto const& start = queue_.cbegin();
13473  auto end = std::next(start, boost::numeric_cast<difference_t>(iterator_count));
13474 
13475  // And further, only up to the specified maximum bytes
13476  std::size_t total_bytes = 0;
13477  std::size_t total_const_buffer_sequence = 0;
13478  for (auto it = start; it != end; ++it) {
13479  auto const& elem = *it;
13480  auto const& mv = elem.message();
13481  std::size_t const size = MQTT_NS::size<PacketIdBytes>(mv);
13482 
13483  // If we hit the byte limit, we don't include this buffer for this send.
13484  if (max_queue_send_size_ != 0 && max_queue_send_size_ < total_bytes + size) {
13485  end = it;
13486  iterator_count = boost::numeric_cast<std::size_t>(std::distance(start, end));
13487  break;
13488  }
13489  total_bytes += size;
13490  total_const_buffer_sequence += num_of_const_buffer_sequence(mv);
13491  }
13492 
13493  std::vector<as::const_buffer> buf;
13494  std::vector<async_handler_t> handlers;
13495 
13496  buf.reserve(total_const_buffer_sequence);
13497  handlers.reserve(iterator_count);
13498 
13499  for (auto it = start; it != end; ++it) {
13500  auto const& elem = *it;
13501  auto const& mv = elem.message();
13502  auto const& cbs = const_buffer_sequence(mv);
13503  std::copy(cbs.begin(), cbs.end(), std::back_inserter(buf));
13504  handlers.emplace_back(elem.handler());
13505  }
13506 
13507  if (h_pre_send_) h_pre_send_();
13508 
13509  socket_->async_write(
13510  std::move(buf),
13511  write_completion_handler(
13512  shared_from_this(),
13513  [handlers = std::move(handlers)]
13514  (boost::system::error_code const& ec) {
13515  for (auto const& h : handlers) {
13516  if (h) h(ec);
13517  }
13518  },
13519  iterator_count,
13520  total_bytes
13521  )
13522  );
13523  }
13524 
13525  void do_async_write(basic_message_variant<PacketIdBytes> mv, async_handler_t func) {
13526  auto self = shared_from_this();
13527  // Move this job to the socket's strand so that it can be queued without mutexes.
13528  socket_->post(
13529  [self = std::move(self), mv = std::move(mv), func = std::move(func)]
13530  () {
13531  if (!self->connected_) {
13532  // offline async publish is successfully finished, because there's nothing to do.
13533  if (func) func(boost::system::errc::make_error_code(boost::system::errc::success));
13534  return;
13535  }
13536  self->queue_.emplace_back(std::move(mv), std::move(func));
13537  // Only need to start async writes if there was nothing in the queue before the above item.
13538  if (self->queue_.size() > 1) return;
13539  self->do_async_write();
13540  }
13541  );
13542  }
13543 
13544  static constexpr std::uint16_t make_uint16_t(char b1, char b2) {
13545  return
13546  static_cast<std::uint16_t>(
13547  ((static_cast<std::uint16_t>(b1) & 0xff)) << 8 |
13548  (static_cast<std::uint16_t>(b2) & 0xff)
13549  );
13550  }
13551 
13552 protected:
13553  bool clean_session_{false};
13554 
13555 private:
13556  MQTT_NS::optional<MQTT_NS::socket> socket_;
13557  std::atomic<bool> connected_{false};
13558  std::atomic<bool> mqtt_connected_{false};
13559 
13560  std::array<char, 10> buf_;
13561  std::uint8_t fixed_header_;
13562  std::size_t remaining_length_multiplier_;
13563  std::size_t remaining_length_;
13564  std::vector<char> payload_;
13565

13569

13574  puback_handler h_puback_;
13575  pubrec_handler h_pubrec_;
13576  pubrel_handler h_pubrel_;

13583

13590  v5_pubrel_handler h_v5_pubrel_;
13591  v5_pubcomp_handler h_v5_pubcomp_;

13594  v5_unsubscribe_handler h_v5_unsubscribe_;

13600  close_handler h_close_;
13601  error_handler h_error_;
13602  pub_res_sent_handler h_pub_res_sent_;
13603  serialize_publish_message_handler h_serialize_publish_;
13604  serialize_v5_publish_message_handler h_serialize_v5_publish_;
13605  serialize_pubrel_message_handler h_serialize_pubrel_;
13606  serialize_v5_pubrel_message_handler h_serialize_v5_pubrel_;
13607  serialize_remove_handler h_serialize_remove_;
13608  pre_send_handler h_pre_send_;
13609  is_valid_length_handler h_is_valid_length_;
13610  Mutex store_mtx_;
13611  mi_store store_;
13612  std::set<packet_id_t> qos2_publish_handled_;
13613  std::deque<async_packet> queue_;
13614  packet_id_t packet_id_master_{0};
13615  std::set<packet_id_t> packet_id_;
13616  bool auto_pub_response_{true};
13617  bool auto_pub_response_async_{false};
13618  bool async_send_store_ { false };
13619  bool disconnect_requested_{false};
13620  bool connect_requested_{false};
13621  std::size_t max_queue_send_count_{1};
13622  std::size_t max_queue_send_size_{0};
13623  mqtt_message_processed_handler h_mqtt_message_processed_;
13624  protocol_version version_{protocol_version::undetermined};
13625  std::size_t packet_bulk_read_limit_ = 256;
13626  std::size_t props_bulk_read_limit_ = packet_bulk_read_limit_;
13627  static constexpr std::uint8_t variable_length_continue_flag = 0b10000000;
13628 };
